title: P"m"P.10: Rooftop Hidden Gem* Incredible City view

title: 6.Luxury Big Studio- Infinity Pool/Gym in Center

title: Funky Studio M above Craft Coffee by Circadian
description: Newly built, launched in Dec 2023!Located in a quiet alley in downtown Saigon, our cozy studio combines a unique design with whimsical charm.  Amenities include fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with rain shower, Netflix & blazing fast wifi .At ground, you can enjoy a snack or coffee at the Hai Cai Tay Cafe. We also have a washer/dryer for our in-house guests.We are right next to the Wink Hotel & in walking distance to many restaurants, cafes, and bars.The spaceOur professionally designed apartment has been designed for your convenience and comfort.There's a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable sofa, dining table, bathroom with rain shower, and work desk and chair. Amenities include:-  LG Smart TV with Netflix-  Bluetooth speaker-  Ultrafast wireless internet-  Complimentary coffee and tea bar with several coffee and tea makers, and fresh Arabica beans and tea leaves-  Filtered drinking water-  Queen bed with 4 pillows-  Hotel-quality bed linens and towels- 2-seated sofa-  Full kitchen>>> Refrigerator with freezer>>> Stove, microwave and water kettle>>> Complete set of pots and pans, plates, bowls, cups and utensils>>>Basic condiments-  Ensuite bathroom with>>>Rain shower with hand spray>>>Bidet toilet>>>Toiletries provided including toothbrush, soap and shampooOn the ground floor, guests can enjoy a snack or delicious drink at the beautifully designed coffee shop. The cafe has a chill and cozy vibe.In addition, all guests can use the front-loading washer and dryer on the ground floor. Please note this unit is on the mezzanine floor, opposite a sitting area of the cafe. If you are very sensitive with noise during the daytime, we suggest you choose one of our units on the higher floors.Our unit is one of seven units in the building. Access is via stairsThe building is in a quiet alley in central Saigon next to the Wink Hotel.You will find many cafes, restaurants, shopping and bars on the nearby streets of Nguyen Van Thu and along the canal street (Hoang Sa).If this room is not available for your dates, we have 6 other units at this location. Please contact us directly and we can help you book a stay.Guest accessGuests will have the entire unit to themselves, including bathroom, kitchen and coffee bar. The only shared amenity is the washer/dryer which is located on the ground floor.Other things to notePlease note there is a construction in the area until the end of November. Work is from 7AM - 5PM (break 12-1PM). The heavy stage is done, and the rest is mostly lighter work. So far, we haven’t received any guest complaints, but it would be nice to keep you informed. We also provide earplugs and white noise if needed, please don’t hesitate to let us know.Please message us first if you are interested in having a photoshoot at our unit.Our building has a ground, a mezzanine and 3 floors above. Access is via stairs. Guests will walk through the cafe to get to the stairs. Please note this unit is on the mezzanine floor, opposite a sitting area of the cafe. If you are very sensitive with noise during the daytime, we suggest you choose one of our units on the higher floors.The building is open 24 hours a day.There is no elevator. If you need assistance with luggage, please inform our hosts.This is one of 7 units in the building.

title: B11: 1BR City Center - w Balcony
description: At this modern and functional studio, you will discover aesthetic minimalist design with a spacious private space and arrangement of functional furnitures and organisers that are carefully studied to offer you a convenient and scientific living.The spaceTucked away at the end of a very quiet alley of a bustling street in District 1, our building is newly built, open to all guests from April 2024. No matter it’s work or vacation, our beautiful interiors are designed for style, comfort and function so you will feel at home in no time. You will love the open space and natural sunlight that the studio apartment has to offer.Like every amenity in our property, your suite is designed and run by us with great care. With mattress and topper featuring design informed by sleep and posture research, gentle to touch bath towels and 90+ CRI lighting, these spaces are set up to offer indulging relaxation.Guest accessSEAMLESS CHECK-IN/OUTEnjoy a quick and simple arrival as you can self check-in to the studio apartment 24/7. Door code will be provided prior to check-in date.AMENITIES & SERVICESThe studio apartment comes with:- Fully equipped kitchen- 90+CRI rating lighting with non-flickering Samsung COB LED chip- Smart TV with Netflix- High-speed WiFi (300+ Mbps)- Ensuite bathroom with strong 2.5 bar water pressure, bidet toilet and bath essentials - The best pillows, mattresses, topper and linens- Weekly free room service- Working desk with chair- Full size clothes closet with safe - Private BalconyShared spaces include: - Laundry room on ground floor: 2 sets of washing machines, dryers, steam and conventional iron and ironing board. Complimentary use for in-house guests - Free parking space for your motorbikes on the ground floor inside the building- Rooftop balcony on top floorOther things to note- Our building has a ground floor and 3 floors above. Shared laundry room will be on the ground floor and top floor will be a shared rooftop balcony. This unit is on the third floor accessible by stairs. The building is open 24 hours a day and self check-in is available. - We do not have elevator but rest-assured, if you need assistance with luggages during check-in and check-out, please inform us. Our staff will be on duty 24/7 to help you. - If you arrive earlier than check-in time, you can store your luggage with us. - Please note that we are not able to accept bookings for photo shooting, filming purposes or use of prohibited items.- Strict no-smoking policy in the studio apartment and shared spaces inside the building. - ID/Passports will be required for registration as per local regulations.- If this studio apartment is not available for your requested date, please kindly message us and we will help you book other studio apartments in the same building. We have altogether 8 units in this building.

title: 11:11 Mustang Boutique @BenThanh
description: Not for Everyone. Only for Those Who Know.Center City : 400m to Bến Thành. 150m to Bánh Mì Huỳnh Hoa. 300m to Bùi Viện.Comfortable Apartment: 40m² with balcony, bathtub (hot water), Netflix, free laundry, basic kitchen, air-conFree Vietnamese iced coffee. Soft bed. Fast Wi-Fi.Not a party house—just charm, stillness, and soul.For those who travel to feel, not just see.Welcome. You found it.The space🌟 Not for Everyone. Only for Those Who Know.Tucked in the pulse of Saigon, exactly 400m from Bến Thành Market, 150m from Bánh Mì Huỳnh Hoa, and a lazy 300m stroll from Bùi Viện, this isn't just a place to crash. It's a curated experience for the rare kind — the vintage souls, the bathtub philosophers, the balcony coffee poets.🏠 Three Rooms, One Story⚠️ PLEASE NOTE: There are 3 rooms available. Both rooms are identical for 201 and 301. Room 401 has a smaller room but a huge outdoor balcony with an outdoor bathtub. Please see the last 14 photos for room 401. You would need to talk to us, as it's subject to availability. If you did not specify the room upon booking, a random room of the 3 rooms will be assigned to you. Why This Place Matters📍 Location That Speaks: You're not just in the center — you're in the right center. Five minutes on foot to Ben Thanh's organized chaos. Fifteen minutes to Pham Ngu Lao's backpacker symphony. Everything flows from this wide, safe alley where middle-class locals have called home since Saigon's independence. Senior citizens with stories, boutique shops with character, and the kind of neighborhood warmth that money can't manufacture.The Space That Understands: Your own 40m² sanctuary in a newly renovated building. A balcony where sunlight spills like gold and the city hums beneath you. A bathtub with real hot water — because some days demand disappears completely. A bed soft like regret after 3 AM texting. Netflix is ready for your drama, comedy, or existential documentary of choice.The Price That Makes Sense: While other Airbnbs in this location cost double, we believe luxury should be accessible to those who truly appreciate it.✨ What Awaits YouThe Essentials, Elevated:• ☕ Vietnamese iced coffee every morning — on the house. Sweet, strong, unapologetic like the city  • Free 50Mb/s WiFi (fast enough to stream, Zoom, or stalk your ex in 4K)  • Full kitchen with refrigerator, electric stove, and all cooking essentials  • Free laundry service (because clean shirts shouldn't cost your soul)  • Air conditioning for Saigon's passionate climate  The Experiences:• 🎬 Hollywood movies and Netflix Premium on our Dolby Vision projector  • Soak in our bathtub while watching films — romantic movie nights, redefined  • 🍷 Our curated wine list available at honest prices for evening wind-downs  • Explore local Vietnamese life scattered around the city center  The Details That Matter:• Accommodates up to 3 guests (2 on a bed, 1 on a quality floor mattress 1.2m x 1.8m). Please let us know in advance if you need the extra mattress so we can prepare it for you.• Complete toiletries: wipes, toothpaste, toothbrush, shampoo, shower gel  • Hair dryer and premium bath amenities  • Walking distance to Reunification Palace, Japanese Town, Vincom Plaza  This Is For You If...You notice how light hits old wood. You crave a good soak and quiet nights more than neon cocktails. You understand that "center city" means convenience and elegance, not chaos. You see beauty in worn tiles, value space over selfies, and travel not just to see, but to feel.This is not a party house. It doesn't do glow sticks or foam. But it does charm. It does slow mornings, silk robes, and handwritten notes. It does the authentic Saigon experience, where you'll never go hungry (local food available 24/7) and you'll always feel safe.So if you're someone who travels with intention, who appreciates the curated over the commercial — welcome. You found it.Like what you see? Book now and discover why those who know choose this place.Guest access- Guest access is available 24/7.  - Self-check-in is easy with a smart lock, allowing you to check in and out at any time without worry.  - There is an elevator for you- The property is located in a newly renovated private building, centrally situated in Ho Chi Minh City. Please note that it is not a 5-star luxury condo.Other things to note**All bookings are strictly non-refundable. Airbnb has given plenty of notice when you're paying and accepting the terms and conditions. Please verify your booking details before booking. Thank you. **Due to popular demand, we are offering additional services to help our guests and, for your convenience, with low prices.1. Bus Or Train Ticket Purchase ( Mui Ne, Nga Trang, Da Lat, Danang )2. Motorcycle Rental 3. Airport Pickup Service ( They will wait for you until you arrive and bring you to our doorstep ) 4. Tour Package ( 1 day - 3 days tour, Food Tour, Walking Tour )5. Personal tour guide ( experimental service). We offer a tour guide who will follow you around for 6 hours and he will translate everything between you and food vendors and shop owners or anyone basically and ensure you’ll get good prices and not be cheated. This service is based on feedback from our constant guests being overcharged especially if you’re a Westerner. Please send us a message and we will arrange everything for you. It’s part of our service to provide you with an easy, budget-friendly, and relaxing trip - you don’t have to worry about anything.

title: Xi-Măng Studio near Buivien street | Em’s Home 2
description: Welcome to Em’s Home, where you can experience Saigon at its best. Our stylish studio is located right in the central of Saigon and has been fully and beautifully renovated. The apartment situated on a small alley with windows of full natural light. The design of studio inspired by the hustle and bustle of city, a never-sleep dynamic Saigon city. Besides, we trying to bring the nature closer to your stay through windows filled with lush greenery. We hope you feel at home when staying here.The space-Check-in: 14:00/ Check-out: 11:00 (Local time).-Queen size bed with comfortable mattress and 4 pillows.- An air-conditioner, a private bath, a kitchen and a 55-inch Google wireless TV  with high-speed Wi-Fi, Netflix are included.-A wash/dry machine also ready.-2 bottles of water are free in the fridge for guests. -Just a short walk to Bui Vien street, Ben Thanh market. There are many coffee shops and restaurants around the apartment. The apartment is just a few minutes away from many of the city’s main tourist attractions, especially Bui Vien Street. Take your time to enjoy some essences of the city and see you around!Guest access-This is self check-in/check-out apartment. House key code will be provided before the trip.Other things to note-The house consists of a ground floor and a first floor. The music of the coffee shop is chill and not too loud. It can also be a place for you to wait before it’s time to check in.

title: 【NEW SALE】 Suite 1BR With Open View on 49F

title: Modern Hotel & Serviced Apt in Phu My Hung Center
description: ✯ Just 5 minutes to SECC Exhibition Center by Grab (~$1.5) or taxi (~$2.5).✯ Located in Phu My Hung, District 7, on Bùi Bằng Đoàn street – ideal for short & long-term stays.✯ Steps from SkyGarden residential area & WinMart supermarket for convenient shopping.✯ Western, Korean, & Asian restaurants nearby – just a few steps✯ Close to Vivo City & Crescent Mall – perfect for shopping, dining, & entertainment.✯ Modern hotel-style serviced apartment, fully furnished for comfort & convenience.The spaceThis cozy PRIVATE SUITE is located at Phu My Hung, Dist.7, Ho Chi Minh City. Clothes return by next day from 1pm to 5pm (apply for at least 3 nights for return clothes).

title: Central City • 2BRZenity • 2WC/Pool & Free Gym

title: Central Hideaway, Local Retreat | There Space
description: Step into a hidden gem in the heart of historical Saigon. Here, you can experience authentic local life while being just steps away from the tourist landmarks such as Independence Palace and Notre Dame Cathedral.The interior design blends natural, traditional and modern elements, featuring wooden beams and handcrafted décor sourced from different provinces of Vietnam.The spaceThe past comes to life in this charming loft-style apartment. Recently renovated, it combines elegant nostalgic aesthetics with modern comfort. The layout includes a large window overlooking a quiet alley and a cozy patio corner — perfect for morning coffee with a friend or two.Located in a peaceful neighborhood that reflects the authentic rhythm of Saigon life, the apartment offers plenty of local food options, yet lots of tourist attractions are within just a few minutes’ walk.There is a variety of restaurants nearby serving local Vietnamese dishes as well as Western, Thai, Korean, Japanese, and Indian,... cuisine. Banks, currency exchange spots, convenience stores, cafés, spas, and bakeries are all within walking distance.We’ll also send you some local tips via Airbnb before your check-in.Note: Please excuse for some daytime noise due to ongoing renovation work at a neighboring area.Guest access- Quiet, clean alley just steps from the main street.- Pet-friendly space- Comfortably accommodates 2 adults.- Queen-size bed with a comfortable mattress.- Smart TV with YouTube and Netflix available.- Natural light through a large glass window.- Refrigerator, microwave, and dinnerware for warming up meals.- Private bathroom with shampoo, shower gel, hot water, towels, and a hair dryer.- Nearby laundry shops and convenient pick-up laundry services (details available on request). *Please bring your own toothpaste and toothbrush.

We’re always happy to chat and interact, but we’re just as happy to give you space if that’s what you prefer. However, for guests staying 7 days or more, a weekly cleaning is included in the price of the room. If you’d like additional cleaning during your stay, it is available upon request for an extra fee.

title: Cozy Vietnamese home Bui Vien Nightlife, Ben Thanh
description: ** Welcome to Cozy Vietnamese Home – Live the warmth and culture of a true Saigon home** Free one-way airport pickup for bookings over 7 nights** Free Saigon tea, coffee & traditional sweets A cozy Vietnamese home tucked in a quiet alley by Bui Vien nightlife, Relax in a handcrafted wooden bathtub, sip local tea on the rooftop with city view+ 5 mins to Ben Thanh Market Saigon’s iconic hub of street food, spices, and smiles+ 6-8 mins to Nguyễn Huệ Walking Street & Independence PalaceThe spaceWelcome to Mélodie Saigon Maison by Bui Vien Nightlife, Rooftop viewA peaceful Vietnamese home — where city lights fade and Saigon’s warmth begins. Full of stories, soul, and gentle local charm.🆓 Enjoy a FREE taste of local Saigon tea & coffee — a warm gift from our home and culture🪑 LIVING & LOUNGE   - MORNING & RELAXATION – TEA, SUNLIGHT & SLOW MOMENTS    + Wake up the Vietnamese way — let the soft sunlight drift through the window, warming the room as Saigon gently awakens.    + Savor local Saigon tea, coffee, and traditional sweets — thoughtful little treats that bring a taste of home and nostalgia.🛁 WOODEN BATHTUB RETREAT      + Unwind in your handcrafted wooden bathtub.     + The scent of wood and oil fills the air as you slow down, watching banana leaves sway softly beyond the Vietnamese bamboo curtain — calm, simple, and full of soul🛏️ BEDROOM COMFORT – LIKE COMING HOME     + Wake up to soft morning light spilling across your 2m x 1.8m bed.     + Enjoy cozy movie nights with the projector and Netflix.Every detail — from the scent to the stillness — is cared for like a room prepared for a loved one’s return.🌆 ROOFTOP & RELAXATION – WHERE CITY LIGHTS MEET STILLNESS     + Sip tea on the rooftop and watch Saigon unfold — charming houses beside the glowing Bitexco Tower.     + At night, city lights shimmer close and calm; a quiet spot to chill, breathe, and feel the city’s gentle soul.🚿 REFRESHING BATHROOMFreshen up with a warm shower, soft towels, and fragrant essentials — a simple touch of spa comfort at home.🏮 THE EXPERIENCEWake up to Saigon’s gentle rhythm — the scent of coffee, friendly smiles, and the sound of life in small alleys.Wander through local streets, taste the city’s flavors, then unwind on the rooftop with tea and soft city lights — where Saigon feels truly close.✨ Book your stay and feel Saigon’s soul — where comfort, culture, and warmth come together.Guest access☕ Free local Saigon tea & coffee to enjoy anytime — a warm gift from our home.📶 Free 200 Mbps WiFi for work & streaming📹 24/7 security cameras for peace of mind☕ Local shops, cafés & pharmacies just steps away for daily needs🎬 Complimentary Netflix & YouTube entertainment🔑 Easy self check-in via secure lockbox🧴 Fresh towels, toiletries & essentials provided🌆 Rooftop access — enjoy morning sunlight or relax under the city’s night lights.

title: Best Location | Clouden @ Cozinema | Skyview |Lift
description: Clouden — a minimalist urban retreat in the heart of Saigon’s District 1. This stylish studio offers skyline and garden views, a 100” 4K projector, full kitchen, laundry, and super-fast WiFi. Just steps from Bui Vien and Ben Thanh Market, it’s central yet peaceful. description: Loft Penthouse 19.3 on 19th floor/22nd floor of The One Sai Gon Buidling - the best choice to enjoy your trips in Ho Chi Minh city with comfort and convenience.∙ Super Central Location (5 mins to Ben Thanh Market)∙ 82m2 LOFT PENTHOUSE APARTMENT with City View∙ 24/7 online and offline support, 24/24 security guard.The spaceThis PENTHOUSE Apartment is located on 19th floor of  Ben Thanh Tower (other name: The One Saigon building), comes equipped with everything you need for a pleasant stay:-	 High-floor Apartment with City View-	A firm but comfortable QUEEN-SIZED BED-	A WORK-DESK-	A KITCHENETTE with a dining table-	An EN-SUITE BATHROOM  includes hot water, shower, mirror, towels, soap, toilet paper, shampoo and hair dryer-	You also have your own WASHING MACHINE to do laundry at your own place, we prepare a iron and the iron board, include the clothes horse to dry the clothes in room/balcony.-	Free Wi-Fi, cable TV and coffee & tea.-	The KITCHENETTE with a dining table, burner stove, microwave, refrigerator, ample storage, cooking pan, glasses, plates and utensils.A modern, well-equipped and spacious building literally just a few mins from Ben Thanh Market, with a great view overlooking the city center.Everything you need is nearby. title: 2| Central D1 | Minimalist Apt | Big Balcony
description: Me House N02: A combination of unique design with gorgeous, private balcony and great location.Located on the 4th floor of an ancient building (don’t have elevator) in the center of District 1:  just a few steps to visit famous spots such as Sai Gon Opera house, Independence Palace, Ben Thanh market,... and surrounded by coffee shops, convenience stores.....Staying at big Street (Ly Tu Trong) so it is really easy for you to hop in hop off taxi at the entrance of the buildingThe spaceMe House is staying at the ancient building which was built  by American before 1975 (so the outside of the apartment will old and not look like a fancy building and a lot of locals living there but very security , and The apartment is upgraded, really tidy and nice as pictures)With three special things that make Me house stand out:+ Design: It is a beautifully presented apartment in an old building and it has been thoughtfully and tastefully renovated into a large, airy and thoroughly modern space with a couple of nods to the history of the building.+ View:  It is filled with natural light during the day through a big balcony and a good curtain to help you have a good sleep. At night, you can chill out with your partner at the balcony.+Position: Stayed at the heart of District 1,  the same position with a lot of luxury hotel like JW Marriott Hotel, Norfolk Mansion. so you just only spend some minutes to go to tourist spots by walk but also experience the hustle and bustle of the biggest city in Vietnam just outside the entrance of the building, such as: * 3 minutes to Sai Gon Opera house.* 3 minutes to Notre dame cathedral (Duc Ba Church)* 5 minutes to Independence Palace* 5 minutes to HCM City Museum.* 5 minutes to Nguyen Hue Pedestrian........Me House is equipped with basic amenities: (Pls self-prepare toothpaste and toothbrush)There is a microwave and some bowls help you warm up the foods when you need.There is a laundry shop near by and some pick up laundry service that will be more convenient for you if you want to stay long term (I will give you details if you need).......Especially, Around Airbnb has a lot of restaurants that not only Vietnamese cuisines but also Korean, Japan, Indian,... cuisines.I will send some tips around airbnb for you once you are about to check in.......I also have 4 apartments at the same position, so If you want to book longer but this apartment is not available, pls let me know, I will check the calendar and send you my another apartment.Guest accessWe will give you further instructions upon your arrival.Easy self-checkingOther things to note+Because the apartment stayed in the ancient building, so it do not have elevator, pls use the stairs, if you have huge luggages, pls considering.+ The stairs and outside the building is out of my control, so hope you give me a sympathy.+ The city noise: Cause HCM is a busy city, especially District 1 and my apartment staying the main street at the central area, so your apartment will not completely silent, Please note that some noise might be audible, but most of my guests find it manageable (with me it is totally fine), but if you are sensitive with the noises or light sleeper, pls consider and I have prepared earplugs incase you need.+ The bathroom: the shower and toilet are in the same room. We use a curtain (couldn't see throw) at the bathroom position instead of door, it still keeps the private, clean and helps to avoid too much door.+ Check-in before the check-in time is possible if our place is available. If not, you can always enjoy a cup of coffee at a local coffee shop just a few steps away.Please do not hesitate to contact us for any necessary support. And we will be happy to see you .

title: A&VHome#3_The Simple Living/01 Guest/No Elevator
description: When we moved out, we chose to keep this home’s spirit alive by sharing it with fellow travelers. With mid-century design touches and our lucky color Yellow, A&VHome is a cozy space that feels personal, warm and full of memory.Our home sits outside the tourist zones, tucked into a lively Saigon alley where the sounds and spirit of daily life surround you. It’s a great fit for longer stays, especially for those who want to trade landmarks for local markets, and snapshots for real experiences.The spaceA&VHome#3 is located at level 3 and only accessed by climbing stairs. The room is purposely designed for the comfort and convenience of Solo Guest (Single Room for 1 Guest). Due to its small size (12m2), the chosen furniture has monochrome color which aims to emphasize the simple living concept. The big window with full of sunshine will be a plus.   This place could be your choice if you’re looking for a budget stay. It is fully equipped and appointed with everything you need during your stay. There are a single bed (1,2m x 2m), 43-inch Samsung smart TV (Netflix available), air-conditioning and mini-fridge. The bathroom is private and attached to the room. Moreover, there’s a working desk inside the room which is suitable for business trips.Guest accessA&VHome offers many shared common areas that meet the guest’s needs. - Free Motorbike parking (4 slots available)- Locker to store luggage at groundfloor. - Free Laundry (self-service) - Free Shower (after checkout time) before heading to airport - Full Kitchen & dining area. Water Purifier is provided for drinking & cooking. - Living room for Movie time (Netflix available)- Reading room.During your stayIf you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us anytime!We are happy to provide guests travel tips, tourist attractions, recommendation of restaurants, coffee shops, bars, clubs etc.*Note: We aren't living in the house, but we often visit during daytime and our housekeepers will be there everyday for cleaning.Other things to noteThere’s no car/taxi access to the entrance. You need to walk about 50m from drop-off point.Room #3 is designed for single occupancy (01 GUEST) only. Bookings for more than one guest are not accepted.This room is one of 4 rooms at A&VHome. If it’s not available for your date, do not hesitate to contact us for further support.There's no Elevator at our Home. We'll provide private Locker at groundfloor, which is helpful if you don't want to carry your luggage to the room. Room #3 is at level 3 and has a big window, therefore you may hear the sound of motorbike, neighbor talking outside. If you are sensitive to noise or looking for quiet room, our place may not suitable for you. There's no daily room cleaning service. We only provide once before you check-in. You can change new towels and bedsheet by yourself in the laundry room. If you require cleaning service, the supplement is 100,000vnd/time.*NOTE: We offer free cleaning service once per week for long stay bookings (more than 7 days).

title: 1-1BR, 5mins to Notre-Dame Cathedral Dist.1
description: Our 50m² 1-bedroom apartment on the 1st floor is located in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City, Dist. 1. Just a few minutes' walk from the apartment, you can easily reach some of the city's most iconic landmarks- 800m (0.5 miles) to Independence Palace- 1km (0.62 miles) to Notre Dame Cathedral in SG- 1,4km (0.87 miles) to Saigon Opera House- 1,8km (1.12 miles) to Ben Thanh market- 700m (0.43 miles) to the shopping center and all famous youth play areas- Steps to cafes, restaurants, and spasThe space- Living room and kitchen: The living room is filled with natural light, featuring a comfy sofa, a small minibar, and a fully equipped kitchen with everything you need for a convenient stay.- Bedroom: a cozy queen bed and a small tea table by a large window, offering a peaceful space to start your day. It is also equipped with a smart TV featuring Netflix and YouTube, allowing you to relax and enjoy your favorite shows.Balcony: The balcony from the living room overlooks a quiet alley in the heart of District 1, a perfect spot for you to relax.Bathroom: The bathroom is clean and separated from the toilet, ensuring your privacy.Laundry: A washing machine with detergent is available in the apartment, and you can use the dryer located on the ground floor.Safety: The building is equipped with a fire protection system and security cameras are installed at the entrance gate and in the hallway of each floor to keep you safe.- Parking: Free parking for one motorbike, convenient for exploring the city.Guest access- Full Access: This apartment is totally private. You can use all amenities in the apartment.- 24/7 Entry: Come and go anytime with 24/7 access.Other things to note- Floor System: Our apartment is on 1st floor. There is no elevator in the building.- Check-in: Provide information for legal registration before check-in- We have 2 apartments in the same building. If the date you are booking is not available, please message us, and we will check the availability of the other apartment for you

title: MG Daisy - Wabi Sabi 2 @Ben Thanh
description: Escape to our serene Wabi Sabi-inspired haven nestled in the heart of the city's most peaceful residential area. This thoughtfully designed space sits just moments from Ben Thanh Market (5 minutes) and your morning coffee fix at Starbucks (1 minute away). Unwind with our impressive 100-inch projection system featuring premium Netflix access. Located in a beautifully renovated building with elevator access, you'll enjoy complete privacy and security in this safe, middle-class neighborhood.The spaceFour Distinct Rooms Available - Choose Your Perfect Match!*Ground Floor: Bigger room space with a skylight and a bathtub*1st, 2nd & 3rd floor: The same except that a bathtub is inside the room.IMPORTANT: PLEASE SPECIFY YOUR PREFERRED ROOM WHEN BOOKING (SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY). WITHOUT A REQUEST, OUR SYSTEM WILL RANDOMLY ASSIGN YOUR ACCOMMODATION. **You'll be walking through a laundry store to enter our place. Don't worry, it's 100% safe. You can have your clothes washed there, too!**What Makes This Property Irresistible?Three compelling reasons to choose our accommodation: UNBEATABLE LOCATION, COMPLETE COMFORT with family-friendly amenities, and the MOST COMPETITIVE PRICING for this prime location with private apartment living.✔ PRIME LOCATION: Strategically positioned in Ho Chi Minh City's vibrant heart. Just 5 minutes walking distance to Ben Thanh Market and 15 minutes to Pham Ngu Lao (Backpacker Central). Situated on the main thoroughfare, where everything is within easy reach. Perfect for tourists looking to minimize transportation expenses while maximizing accessibility.✔ ULTIMATE COMFORT: Recently renovated building nestled in a tranquil alley that's been home to middle-class residents since Saigon's liberation. The alley is spacious, brief, and completely secure. Mostly elderly neighbors who are incredibly welcoming and supportive - you'll genuinely feel protected. Two charming boutique stores share the same alley.You'll have exclusive access to the entire apartment, giving you an authentic Saigon experience - isn't this why we travel? To understand local lifestyles and connect with the community, they're exceptionally warm and accommodating. Remarkably peaceful for a property positioned directly in the city's epicenter.✔ EXCEPTIONAL VALUE: Surrounding Airbnbs charge double our rates guaranteed :) Feel free to research comparable pricing in the area. Want entertainment? Stream movies on our projector with Android TV and Netflix or YouTube using our Dolby Vision system, or relax in our stunning bathtub.Maximum Occupancy: 2 GuestsBUILDING FEATURES ELEVATOR ACCESSPremium Amenities:▶ Extensive Hollywood movie collection with complimentary Netflix Premium and Dolby Vision Projector. Perfect for romantic movie nights while soaking in the bathtub▶ Luxurious bathtub for unwinding after busy exploration days, complete with a hot water systemCurated Wine SelectionInquire about our wine menu. We can arrange any wine variety at reasonable prices to help you relax after adventurous days with ambient background music.▶ Complimentary 50Mb/s High-Speed Internet with WiFi & Climate-Controlled EnvironmentAdditional conveniences include:Toilet papers, toothpaste, and toothbrushes (*)Shampoo and body wash (*)Professional hair dryer▶ Abundant local cuisine options available around the clock. Hunger will never be an issue here.▶ Full-size refrigerator▶ Immerse yourself in authentic Vietnamese culture scattered throughout the city center, absorbing the rich sights and sounds of local traditions.▶ Walking distance to Ben Thanh Market, Japanese Quarter, Reunification Palace, and Vincom Plaza (20-minute stroll), while other attractions are approximately 10 minutes away (on foot, roughly 500 meters).▶ Discover local landmarks and enjoy the tropical climate.Impressed with what you've seen? RESERVE NOW AND EXPERIENCE OUR OUTSTANDING HOSPITALITYGuest access- Guest's access is 24/7. - It is a self-check-in homestay. Entering your house will use a smart lock. This ensures you can check in and out anytime without worry - There is no curfew, either.- It is located in a newly renovated private building, but very central to HCM City. Please don't expect a 5-star luxury condo.Other things to note**All bookings are strictly non-refundable. Airbnb has given plenty of notice when you're paying and accepting the terms and conditions. Please verify your booking details before booking. Thank you. **Due to popular demand, we are offering additional services to help our guests and for your convenience at low prices.1. Bus Or Train Ticket Purchase ( Mui Ne, Nga Trang, Da Lat, Danang )2. Motorcycle Rental 3. Airport Pickup Service ( They will wait for you until you arrive and bring you to our doorstep ) 4. Tour Package (1-day - 3-day tour, Food Tour, Walking Tour )5. SIM Card Purchase ( Unlimited 4G and Calls)6. Personal tour guide ( experimental service). We offer a tour guide who will follow you around for 6 hours, and he will translate everything between you and food vendors and shop owners or anyone basically, and ensure you’ll get good prices and not be cheated. This service is based on feedback from our guests who are constantly being overcharged, especially if you’re a Westerner. Please send us a message and we will arrange everything for you. It’s part of our service to provide you with an easy, budget-friendly, and relaxing trip - you don’t have to worry about anything.

title: 50m2 Whole Floor Balcony Washing Machine District1
description: Experience Saigon like a local in this peaceful private studio, the entire top floor of a decades-old Saigon house full of character. Just 20m from Trần Đình Xu main street yet quiet and hidden in a small cul-de-sac. Enjoy a queen bed, sofa bed, AC, kitchenette, balcony, and washing machine. Self check-in with smart lock. Downstairs, Chi Tư Spa offers 10% off herbal treatments — a true old-Saigon gem in the heart of District 1.The spaceThis is a true old Saigon house, full of charm and history — not brand-new or hotel-style. You may notice some vintage details, which are part of its character. The neighborhood is safe, quiet, and local, with friendly residents.Please note:	•	Access is via stairs only (no elevator).	•	The automatic gate and smart locks make check-in easy anytime.	•	Chi Tư Spa downstairs offers 20% off herbal treatments for guests — it’s perfect for relaxing after exploring the city.	•	Free washing machine use is available on the same floor.If you love spaces with personality, natural light, and a touch of old Saigon soul — this place will feel like home. Step into a peaceful hideaway right in the heart of District 1 — a spacious private studio on the top floor of a decades-old Saigon house, lovingly kept to preserve its charm. Tucked just 20 meters from Trần Đình Xu main street, this quiet cul-de-sac feels worlds away from the city’s buzz, yet only minutes from the central fun area of Bùi Viện, surrounded by cafés, bars, and eateries.Your stay includes the entire second floor — completely private — with a cozy queen bed, a comfortable sofa bed, air conditioning, a kitchenette, a dining area, and a balcony where you can enjoy a morning coffee or the evening breeze. The studio has two large windows and one small window, filling the space with natural sunlight, while thick blackout curtains keep it cool and peaceful whenever you wish. Guests can use the washing machine, and access is fully self check-in with smart locks for your convenience.Downstairs is Chi Tư Spa (it's mine also :D), where Airbnb guests enjoy 20% off all herbal spa treatments — perfect for relaxing after a day exploring the city.This house isn’t new or polished like a hotel — it carries the spirit of old Saigon: spacious rooms, high ceilings, patterned tiles, and a simple, lived-in warmth that tells its own story.Come stay and experience a slice of real Saigon life — very close to the lively center yet quiet, full of sunlight, and rich with character. As a Superhost with other well-rated stays, I’ll make sure you feel comfortable and cared for throughout your visit.Guest accessGuests have the entire second floor to themselves — completely private and separate from the spa below. Access is through the main front gate with a smart lock code, then up the shared stairway to your private studio floor.You’ll have:	•	Your own entrance door with smart lock	•	Private kitchenette, balcony, and bathroom	•	Washing machine available on the same floor	•	No shared spaces — your stay is fully independentDownstairs is Chi Tư Spa, open daily, where Airbnb guests enjoy a 20% discount on all treatments (my treat! Please come through the front door =D)Other things to noteElectricity is not included if you stay more than 27 days. It’s charged at only 4,000 VND per kWh, with an individual meter set up for each room.Please note that only authorized guests are allowed in the house. For safety and compliance with local regulations, visitors or unauthorized guests are not permitted. This rule is strictly enforced to protect everyone’s comfort and security.

title: ĐaKao Vibe: Retro Studio GB in Center by Circadian
description: Launched in Jan 2025!This unique retro studio is inspired by the history of Đa Kao Ward, famous in the 1960s for its tailors and áo dài dressmakers.Our stylish unit features high ceilings and a big window with lots of sunlight.It includes:-Platform queen bed-Small sofa+coffee table-Smart TV+soundbar+Netflix-Full kitchen-Complimentary coffee+tea bar-Big bathroom+rain showerOur building is nestled in the city center, just 5 min from the zoo and 10 min from the  Notre Dame Cathedral.The spaceWelcome to Đa Kao! Our retro studio takes inspiration from the history of our neighborhood. In the 1960s, the Đa Kao Ward was known for its high-end tailors and áo dài dressmakersOur whimsical interior calls back to an old-school tailor shop. The studio has a fully equipped kitchen, and a big, beautiful bathroom. The high ceiling and big window fill the space with natural light.We also have every amenity you could want for a short or long-term stay:-  Queen platform bed with 4 pillows-  Hotel-quality bed linens and towels-  Sofa and coffee table-  Smart TV with Netflix-  Ultrafast 400Mbps wireless internet-  Complimentary coffee and tea bar with several coffee and tea makers, and fresh Arabica beans and tea leaves-  Filtered drinking waterFull kitchen including:- Refrigerator with freezer- Stove, microwave and water kettle- Full set of pots and pans, plates, bowls, cups and utensils- Basic condimentsThe ensuite bathroom features:- Rain shower with hand spray- Toilet with hand spray- Toiletries provided including toothbrush, soap and shampooOn the roof top of the building, you will have access to an open air patio and washer & dryer that is shared with other guests.Other amenities are available upon request including:-Toaster-Rice cooker-Blender-Baby crib, monitor and other devicesPlease note this unit is on the ground floor. Our unit sits in a small alley near the city center,  only 5 min from the zoo and 10 min from the  Notre Dame Cathedral. You will find many cafes, restaurants, and bars on the nearby streets of Nguyen Van Thu and Dinh Tien Hoang.If this room is not available for your dates, we have 6 other units at this location. Please contact us directly and we can help you book a stay.Guest accessGuests will have the entire unit to themselves, including bathroom, kitchen and coffee bar. The only shared amenities is the washer/dryer located on the rooftop, accessible by stairs.Other things to notePlease note there's a street construction project by the local authority taking place next to the building. The heavier work is expected during the first 7 days, and it should become much less disturbing afterward. Work hours are from 7AM to 6PM daily (with a break from 11AM to 1 PM) and the project is expected to finish by November 20th. The entrance may be slightly affected during this time, please let us know if you need any support with your luggage. We appreciate your understanding. If you have any questions or need support during your stay, please don’t hesitate to message us.This unit is on the ground floor. The building is open 24 hours a day (no curfew). There is no elevator.Please message us first if you are interested in having a photoshoot at our unit.

title: Best Location/2' Bui Vien/Balcony/Laundry/Netflix
description: Our studio is only 2 mins walk to Bui Vien, 5 mins to Ben Thanh & MRT. Most hotspots, cafes and restaurants are nearby. Suitable for guests who want to explore the city centre on foot.Why you’ll love it:🌆 Large balcony bar with high chair and table setup for working and chilling outside💻 Smartdesk and super fast Wi-Fi (always above 500 Mbps)🌀Private washer and dryer, plus drinking water purifier🎬 100” projector with Netflix, YouTube & 48” TV as an extra screenThe space- Fits up to 4 guests with 1 queen bed and 1 queen sofa bed (160x200)- Extra sheets and linens provided for a cozy stayCHILL & WORK SPACE:- 100-inch projector with auto rolling screen: perfect for movie nights (Netflix, YouTube, and films included)- 48” Smart TV with HDMI cable for extra viewing or gaming- Smart desk with adjustable height for getting things doneBALCONY VIBES:- Private balcony overlooking the street- Setup with a mini bar, ambient lights, high chairs, and a table for 4: ideal for morning coffee or evening drinksBATHROOM ESSENTIALS:- Hot shower available 24/7- Free amenities: toothbrush, shampoo, body wash, hand soap, and toilet paperEXTRA CARE TO OUR GUESTS:- New water purifier machine for safe drinking: say bye to bottles of water (setup time: Sep 2025)- Washing machine, dryer, and detergent provided. Completely private, only for youGuest access- 24/7 self check-in via smart lock- CURFEW after midnight (00:00 AM), the main gate is closed until 6:00 AM, you can still go out and come back. One late entry is free, and for any extra times the guards open the gate for a small fee of 50,000 VND (~$2), as they need to open the gate during their rest hoursOther things to noteOur cozy studio is on the 3rd floor of a vintage local building. There is no lift, and it might be difficult for senior guests. Step outside and you’re only minutes from Bui Vien Walking Street, Ben Thanh Market, MRT. Inside, you’ll find a peaceful hideaway with warm beds, chill lights and balcony bar.We look forwards to welcoming you!

title: 1BR apt w Rooftop Kitchen - 5’ to Hop ON/OFF bus
description: Minimize your traffic fee when staying in our romantic apartment with outdoor terrace and surrounded by the CBD. 5’ walk to Post Office/Independence Palace/Hop On Hop off bus spot.Perfect for young couples, this cozy, but spacious 80 sqm apartment offers a warm bedroom and a rooftop kitchen with fairy lights and greenery – an intimate oasis above the city.Kindly note: The apartment is situated on the 3rd floor of the building, and there is no elevator available. title: Hoi An Studio | Bathtub |  5★ Views by CIRCADIAN
description: Our studio is perfect for your next stay in Saigon! The tropical interior is inspired by the famous architecture of Hoi An.Located in central Saigon, it's a short 10 minutes walk from the backpacker area. Enjoy heavenly views of downtown Saigon, especially at night.Includes full kitchen and bathroom w/ rain shower & standing bathtub!Amenities include:o	hotel-quality king bedo     TV w Netflixo	Marshall bluetooth speakero	fully-stocked coffee baro	front-loading washero	toilet w/ bidetThe space*Renovated in May 2024*Inspired by the famous yellow houses of Hoi An, this stylish studio is the perfect getaway for solo travelers or couples. title: Urban Hideout w Bathtub & Projector @Bui Vien

You can view it in the last photo. ⚠️ IMPORTANT WARNING BEFORE BOOKING ⚠️This place is not suitable for:	•	People with bone or joint problems	•	People who had surgery	•	People who cannot climb stairs easily🚫 NO ELEVATOR AVAILABLEThere are many stairs. Airport Pickup Service ( They will wait for you until you arrive and bring you to our doorstep ) Please send us a message and we will arrange everything for you. title: Hideaway [4] — Quiet retreat on famous Pasteur St.
description: The LOFT is located in downtown central Saigon on famous Pasteur street. (3rd floor )The design is comprised of natural artefacts featuring wood log beams brought in from the central provinces of Vietnam; all this high quality furniture was handmade from pure copper, steel and wood materials. Several cactus plants and succulents bring a fresh, green and eco-friendly feeling to the place. It all comes together to create the feeling of a cozy, loft apartment.The spaceI've lived in HCMC for 28 years, and this is by far my most favourite apartment. Partly it's the location which allows you to get to most of the tourist attractions and scrumptious dining places in just minutes of walking.Moreover, the French colonial building and interior furniture may bring you back in time for a never-sleep dynamic Saigon city as of ‘the Pearl of the Far East’.- Stay in my apartment that is on the 3rd floor, in a quiet clean neighborhood.- Visit the Secret Garden Restaurant (4th Floor) for 10% discount off your bill.[ traditional Vietnamese home-cooked ]- The apartment can comfortably accommodate 2 adults but can be up to 3 if using the sofa.- Queen size bed with comfortable mattress. ( 4 pillows)- An Android TV 53 inches with a nice speaker system brings you good ambience for films or to relax by music at night. Chromecast and Apple TV are available for your use.- The kitchen is fully stocked with coffee, tea and kitchen appliances to allow for home cooked meals with dishes, plates, knives , forks..Guest accessTransportation to my place:- Taxi: from Tan Son Nhat International Airport, you take a taxi to 158 Pasteur Street (downtown district 1, HCM City) . The alley that leads to my place is full of boutique coffee shops and restaurants. Take your time to enjoy some essences of the city.- Bus: if you consider using public buses, proceed to Bus 109 and arrive at Ben Thanh Station then it’s about 5 minutes walking to my place.All equipment and facilities are provided for your usage.Other things to note- My staff or I will pick you from outside of the building to welcome you to the apartment. ( we also help you carry on your bags up to the house )-  the Apt is located on 3rd floor WITHOUT elevator. My neighbours and I have restored the building preserving as much as possible the original structure and decoration details.

title: Stay chill 602H – Netflix and near Ben Thanh market

title: 1BR-65sqm-Balcony IN BEN THANH
description: Location,  location ! 68 Huynh Thuc Khang-Ben Thanh-District 1Our 1 bed apartment is designed for you to relax with all the amenities and feel at home. while experiencing the local lifestyle in a historic French apartment building in the heart of Saigon with the buzzing and vibrant streets within footsteps of your front door. Enjoy everything from local street food to modern fine dining, bargain to upscale shopping, historic and cultural attractions, and much more right outside your doorstep.The space400m or 5 minute walk to Ben Thanh Market.350m or 4 minute walk to City Opera House.200m or 2 minute walk to Nguyen Hue Walking Street.150m or 2 minute walk to Saigon Center and Saigon Square shopping centersMany other restaurants and local eateries, cafes, and sights such as Notre Dame Cathedral, Museum of Fine Arts, War Remnants Museum, etc within 5-10 minutes walking distance.This decades-old French building is full of character and is part of Ho Chi Minh City’s history. While much of the original structure remains today, most of the interior units have been renovated into modern living spaces for locals and tourists, small businesses, coffee shops, and more.Guest accessYou will have access to this entire renovated modern and minimalist second-floor 1 bed apartment equipped with everything you need to recharge after a full day of sightseeing or a night in with a beer and movie.Bedroom window view overlooking Takashimaya  building, balcony overlooking Huynh Thuc Khang streetA  queen sized bedWasher with detergent provided - Ceiling fans and strong AC to keep you coolA private bathroom with soap, shower gel, shampoo, fresh towels, and a hairdryerA kitchen equipped with a full-sized refrigerator, stove, microwave, basic cooking utensils and spices/condiments, storage, dishes, electric kettle, coffee and tea, and light snacksHighspeed Wi-Fi internet connection.Air conditioning.Many other restaurants and local eateries, cafes, and sights such as Notre Dame Cathedral, Museum of Fine Arts, War Remnants Museum, etc within 5-10 minutes walking distance.Other things to note- All equipment and facilities are provided for your usage and the apartment's keys upon arrival for 24/24h access.- Part of the charm of staying in a historic building is that there is no elevator lift.*** Our S'home apartment is on the 2nd floor of a heritage building that housed in the 1975s. We have completed renovated the interior but kept the structure intact, but we will be happy to help with your bags if you need assistance.- Please feel free to contact us in advance for any special requests or inquiries, check-in/out times, etc. We will be happy to assist in having the very best and most comfortable stay in Saigon!

title: 6 |Central D1 Minimalist | Bathtub & Open Terrace

Tu Trong) so it is really easy for you to hop in hop off taxi at the entrance of the building.The spaceMe House is staying at the ancient building which was built  by American (so the outside of the so fantastic.+Position: Stayed at the heart of District 1,  the same position with a lot of luxury hotel like JW Marriott Hotel, Norfolk Mansion. so you just only spend some minutes to go to tourist cathedral (Duc Ba Church)* 5 minutes to Independence Palace* 5 minutes to HCM City Museum.* 5 minutes to Nguyen Hue Pedestrian........Me House is equipped with basic amenities: (Pls self-prepare know, I will check the calendar and send you my another apartment.Guest accessWe will give you further instructions upon your arrival.Easy self-checkingOther things to note+Because the apartment stayed in the ancient building, so it do not have elevator, pls use the stairs, if you have huge luggages, pls considering.+ The stairs and outside the building is out of my control, so hope you give earplugs incase you need.+ Check-in before the check-in time is possible if our place is available. title: Bamboo Hideout Studio in Saigon’s Heart, Ben Thanh
description: ** Welcome to Bamboo Hideout Studio in Saigon’s Heart, Ben Thanh+ Just 5m from Ben Thanh Market** Stay 5+ nights for a FREE airport pick-up one-wayYour cozy retreat in the true heart of neighbors chatting, motorbikes passing, and the soft hum of Saigon mornings.🪑 LIVING & LOUNGE – MORNING LIGHT & LOCAL MOMENTSStart your morning the Vietnamese way — sunlight filters softly through neighbors — the everyday rhythm of Saigon life flowing peacefully around you.🍳 KITCHENETTE – SIMPLE COMFORTS, LOCAL FLAVORSA small, thoughtful kitchen with an induction stove, kettle, and microwave — perfect for a quick homemade meal or a slow breakfast.All essentials are ready, so you can cook, sip, and enjoy your stay at your own pace — just like a local.🛏️ BEDROOM COMFORT – YOUR SAIGON NESTRest on a soft queen bed wrapped in natural linen tones.At night, let the gentle glow of the projector fill the room as you wind down in calm stillness.Every detail — from texture to lighting — is prepared with care, like a home waiting for your return.🌆 ROOFTOP RELAXATION – WHERE LIGHTS MEET STILLNESSSip tea on the rooftop and watch Saigon unfold — humble Vietnamese houses beside the glowing Bitexco Tower.At night, city lights shimmer close and calm; a quiet spot to chill, talk, or simply breathe above the lively streets.🚿 REFRESHING BATHROOMFreshen up with a warm shower, soft towels, and explore nearby Ben Thanh Market and Bui Vien Street, then return to your bamboo hideout — peaceful, warm, and full of soul.✨ Book your stay and feel Saigon’s heart — where comfort, culture, and stillness meet.Guest access📶 High-speed WiFi (150 Mbps) — perfect for remote work or streaming your favorite shows.🎬 Complimentary Netflix & YouTube on the projector for cozy movie nights.☕ Free local Saigon tea & coffee to enjoy anytime — a warm gift from our home.🍳 Private kitchenette with induction stove, kettle, and microwave for light cooking.🌆 Rooftop access — enjoy morning sunlight or relax under the city’s night lights.📹 24/7 security cameras in shared areas for safety (no cameras inside your room).🔑 Easy self check-in with secure lockbox at the gate.🧴 Fresh towels, toiletries & essentials provided for your comfort.🏪 Local cafés, shops & pharmacies just steps away for your daily needs.

title: Majestic 2Br Apt Penthouse | Skyline & River Views
description: HN HOMES - Yen Binh Oasis Middle of Saigon Center Private Two-Bedroom Space, As a Quiet Oasis in the Heart of Ho Chi Minh City. Natural light fills the apartment, creating a warm and pleasant feeling. Beautiful view of Thi Nghe River, where the calm water flows through, bringing absolute relaxation. The interior is luxurious, sophisticated, but still close, helping you to find peace and relaxation in each moment.The space- The building has elevator and motorbike parking. - Open space, full of natural light The apartment is designed to be open, making the most of the natural light through the big windows. Every morning, let the gentle sunshine awaken you, accompanied by the cool breeze from the river, bringing relaxation and fresh energy. - Romantic view by the window - Riverside park with many green areas and full sports equipment to help you have energetic stays - You will see the gentle river, where each boat winds by as peaceful touches in the heart of the vibrant city. This is the perfect space to sip a cup of coffee, read a good book simply to let yourself in the quiet moments. - The space is very suitable for you to have long business trips, bringing creativity with work efficiency when staying. - HN HOMES is located in a prime central location, easy to move, just a short distance from famous attractions: • BenThanh Market ~3 km • Independence Palace ~2.5km • Notre Dame Cathedral of Saigon ~2 km • Saigon Central Post Office ~2km • Nguyen Hueệ Walking Promenade ~3 km • War Remains Museum ~2.5 km• Bùi Viện Street ~4 km • Botanical Garden Saigon ~2 km • Landmark 81 ~5 kmGuest accessAt Penthouse HN HOMES, you will enjoy a luxurious, spacious and fully-furnished living space, offering the utmost comfort for your vacation or business trip.Amenities you are used at the HN HOMES penthouse:	• Spacious 2 bedrooms apartment with smart design, separating the kitchen, creating a private and comfortable living space. The large windows and private balcony provide a stunning panoramic view of the Thi Nghe River and the city, creating an ideal relaxing space.	• A master bedroom with a soft full-sized bed, a spacious closet, along with a high-class interior system, full of clean pillows and blankets.	• Private work desk at quiet space, ideal for work and rest.	• 1.9m long sofa that can be reclined into a bed, suitable for children or extra guests.	• Modern bathroom with hot and cold water system using solar energy, soap, shampoo, towels and necessary personal effects.	• Fully equipped kitchen: induction cooker, fridge, microwave, electric cooker, kettle and full cooking utensils, making it easy to prepare cozy meals right at the apartment.	• In-room washing machine, an airy window hanging area, and a convenient vacuum cleaner in the kitchen cabinet.	• Other utility equipment such as iron, hair drier, clothes hanger are available in the cupboard.	• Tea, coffee and instant dishes are prepared, providing a convenient and enjoyable experience right in the apartment.	• Modern entertainment: Smart TV connecting Netflix, high-speed Wi-Fi, cool, open air conditioning system, make sure you feel comfortable at all times.	• Free motorcycle parking at the ground floor (G) that easy for you to navigate the area.Other things to note- Be sure to keep the door secure whether you are inside or out of the house. You can take the set of keys with you for the duration of your stay.The lock set you have: Room card, roller door lock. - The automatic rolling door will be closed after 24:00 hours at night, if you check in later, let me know the schedule clearly, I will support you- If you have a motorbike, leave it on the G floor of the building (the parking lot is completely free) and lock the door carefully.- You respect our house, our neighbors. To ensure an enjoyable stay and not affect the local.- After 22pm is quiet time, you help us not to talk too loudly. Local residents sleep early to prepare for the next early morning.- Please send an image of your ID (Cccd/passport) upon arrival so that we can register your stay. This is the law, but also for your own safety.- Do not smoke and use banned substances at the room.- Please clean up cooking utensils after use.- In case you damage, lose or damage the property or its contents. Customers are kindly requested to compensate the apartment with the exact value of the damaged property at the time of the damage.

title: Easygoing Home - Cozy Nest Room in the City Center

Located in the city center, just a short walk to Ben Thanh Market and Bui Vien Walking Street, with a direct bus to the airport right in front of the house. However, I am always happy to assist you as soon as possible to make sure your stay is comfortable and enjoyable.

title: Hidden Bar Styled Studio @ Saigon Alleyway

Hairdryers and irons are also available.- FREE INFINITE SWIMMING POOL on the 16th floor for free.- FREE WIFI with high speed- Overlooking the river- Hairdryer- Essential items (Towels, bed sheets, soap, shampoo, shower gel and toilet paper)- Washing machine- Tableis - TV with Youtube- Air conditioner- Fridge- Microwave oven- Dishes and dishes- The entire apartment view looks towards the river, southeast direction, very warm sunlight. You can enjoy sitting on the bed watching Netflix & movie from smart big screen TV 43 inch.- Nice Gym and an additional swimming pool on the ground floor along with a series of other amenities such as billiards, air-conditioned common office, skateboarding area, sauna, etc.- You don't need to buy anythings extra when stay in my place. All necessary amenities are available in the apt.Guest accessGROUND FLOOR - Outdoor Facilities1. Parking Lot2. Guardhouse3. Security Gate4. Relaxing Hammocks5. Green Mulfi-purpose Area6. Skate Plaza7. Outdoor Working Space8. Lap Pool 50m9. Jacuzzi10. Pool Deck11. Pool Bar12. Kid's Pool13. Kids Slide Tube14. Musical Play Park15. Outdoor Shower16. Picnic LawnINDOOR FACILITIES17. Sync Space (Co-Working]FLOOR 14Indoor Faeilities1. Changing RoomOutdoor Facilities2. Celestial Garden3. Symphony Stairs4. Sky Theatre5. Zen Gardern ROOFTOP.Outdoor Facllities6. Jazz Pool7. Sky Jacuzzi8. Suweet Daybed9. Jazz Terrace10. Sun Bed11. Tea Pavilion12. Outdoor Shower13. Pool Cabana14. Duet Hammoek15. Vertical Garden16. Tranquil AreaOther things to note★ This is a Homestay, NOT a hotel.We will try our best to bring you enjoyable experiences, but we cannot do the same as hotels.We do not change towels or clean daily.Instead, there is a washing machine inside the apartment, you can wash and reuse towels.We offer 1 free cleaning service per week for stays from 7 days.For subsequent cleaning requests, an additional fee will be charged.★ Do not use drugs or engage in any illegal activities in the house.Thank you for your understanding^^## USEFUL Q&A Q&A:Question: Where to exchange money or withdraw Vietnamese Dong?Answer: You can exchange money right at the airport.Question: How many minutes by taxi from the apartment to the airport & how much does it cost?Answer: About 30 minutes and 8.5 USD ≈ 200,000 VND (Please choose an official taxi brand such as Mai Linh, Vinasun and Grab)Q: Late check-in and early check-in?A: Please let us know your expectations and I will fully cooperate with you.Q: How to buy a mobile SIM card?Answer: You can buy it at the airport in Vietnam.Please message me if you have any other questions

title: 1 | D1 Minimalist Apt | Secret Rooftop & View.
description: Me House N01: An  apartment that is renovated in an ancient building. There are two floors inside. Floor 1 is kitchen and bathroom, Floor 2 is bedroom and private fabulous terrace.Located on the 4th floor of the building (don't have elevator) in the center of District 1:  just a few steps to visit famous spots such as Opera house, Independence Palace, Ben Thanh market,... Staying at big Street (Ly Tu Trong) so it is really easy for you to hop in hop off taxi at the entrance of the buildingThe spaceMe House is staying at the ancient building which was built  by American before 1975 (so the outside of the apartment will old and not look like a fancy building and a lot of locals living there but very security , and The apartment is upgraded, really tidy and nice as pictures)With three special things that make Me house stand out:+ Design: It is a beautifully presented apartment in an old building and it has been thoughtfully and tastefully renovated into a large, airy and thoroughly modern space with a couple of nods to the history of the building.+ View: there are a secret Rooftop (terrace) is connected to the bedroom (only this apartment is capable to access this rooftop) and a small balcony at the kitchen area, so the place will have a spectacular view ever, which is filled with natural light during the day and at night it will like as a twinkle picture. Moreover, in the morning there are two loungers at the rooftop, so you could enjoy sunbath there and in the evening, you can chill out with your partner enjoying the view of the city at the rooftop and even at your bed, it will be so fantastic.+Position: Stayed at the heart of District 1,  the same position with a lot of luxury hotel like JW Marriott Hotel, Norfolk Mansion. so you just only spend some minutes to go to tourist spots by walk but also experience the hustle and bustle of the biggest city in Vietnam just outside the entrance of the building, such as: * 3 minutes to Sai Gon Opera house.* 3 minutes to Notre dame cathedral (Duc Ba Church)* 5 minutes to Independence Palace* 5 minutes to HCM City Museum.* 5 minutes to Nguyen Hue Pedestrian........Me House is equipped with basic amenities: (Pls self-prepare toothpaste and toothbrush)+TV is connected with a lot of channels and youtube , air conditioner, Wi-Fi.+ A small kitchen with some basic Kitchen utensils: refrigerator,  Infrared Stove, pot, pan, chopsticks, spoon to have you make a meal at your apartment.+  A microwave.+ Private bathroom with shampoo, shower gel, hot water, towel, hair dryer...+There is a laundry shop near by and some pick up laundry service that will be more convenient for you if you want to stay long term (I will give you details if you need).......Especially, Around Airbnb has a lot of restaurants that not only Vietnamese cuisines but also Korean, Japan, Indian,... cuisines.I will send some tips around airbnb for you once you are about to check in.......I also have 4 apartments at the same position, so If you want to book longer but this apartment is not available, pls let me know, I will check the calendar and send you my another apartment.Guest accessWe will give you further instructions upon your arrival.Easy self-checkingOther things to note+Because the apartment stays in the ancient building, so it do not have elevator, pls use the stairs, if you have huge luggages, pls considering.+ The stairs and outside the building is out of my control, so hope you give me a sympathy.+ The city noise: Cause HCM is a busy city, especially District 1 and my apartment staying the main street at the central area, so your apartment will not completely silent, Please note that some noise might be audible, but most of my guests find it manageable (with me it is totally fine), but if you are sensitive with the noises or light sleeper, pls consider and I have prepared earplugs incase you need.+ The bathroom: the shower and toilet are in the same room. We use a curtain (couldn't see throw) at the bathroom position instead of door, it still keeps the private, clean and helps to avoid too much door.+ Check-in before the check-in time is possible if our place is available. If not, you can always enjoy a cup of coffee at a local coffee shop just a few steps away (you could keep the luggages at my neighbor after check out, before check in or I will introduce service store)Please do not hesitate to contact us for any necessary support. And we will be happy to see you .

title: B House Outer Balcony 402
description: Other things to note- The room is still filled with furniture and facilities as shown in the picture, but without decoration. - Our Airbnb only has one cleaner and provides room cleaning services for guests who book for 3 nights or more. Please keep your public space and room clean. If there is any damage to the room, we will charge a cleaning fee and compensation fee. - The apartment area is only for motorcycle storage. If you use a car, you can charge a day and night fee of about 100 meters at the nearby parking lot. - Please be careful to close the door before entering during free time. Quiet residential area, please reduce noise after 11pm. - BHouse is an affordable homestay where we strive to provide the best experience. If you need services and facilities such as hotels, we are sorry that we cannot assist you. - We have scented candles, please contact us if needed

title: Stylish Room #304 in a Bookstore at City Center
description: Stylish room at central location.Downstairs is the famous Domino bookstore and coffee bar. You could enjoy a cup of Vietnamese coffee there.The house is in a quiet residential neighbourhood right in the central area. Many shops and restaurants around. Most attractions are nearby. Pham Ngu Lao, Ben Thanh market, museums, tour agencies, bus...★ Note that this room uses communal bathroom. If you need a room with private bathroom, please check out Room 201, 202 or 101 ★The spaceThe room is stylish and cozy, with curtained glass walls on two sides, and some greeneries that I think you will love. :)You will stay on the top floor of a very cool pre-war house that our family just renovated. It is the 2nd floor (or 3rd floor if you follow American system).You will use a communal bathroom, shared with 3 other rooms. It has a separate shower room, toilet and washing area, and I try my best to keep it clean and neat.Guest accessOn the top floor there is a common lounge that you could relax and and chit chat with other travellers.There is a chill balcony on the first floor; in the morning you should come here, grab a coffee and listen to the city waking up.On the ground floor is the famous Domino bookstore (mostly Vietnamese books for now), and a coffee bar where you could try the famous Vietnamese coffee.During your stayI'm Phung. Me and my husband (Viet) stay in the house sometimes. When we are not around, our family or friend will show you around and give you the key.We're on the phone 24/24, so please call us or message us on Airbnb if you need any help.

title: 20% OFF Netflix + Projector @District 1
description: Our apartment is located right in the heart of the city, tucked away in a quiet, safe, middle-class neighborhood. Surrounded by delicious local street food, it’s the perfect spot to explore Saigon like a local.Inside, you’ll enjoy an 80" projector with Netflix — perfect for couples looking to relax and unwind. The apartment is in a private building and 100% safe.This is a no-frills, cozy hideaway for travelers who just need a simple, clean place to rest. Come crash with us! ✨❤️The space⚠️ Before Booking, Please Note ⚠️🚶‍♂️ There is no elevator, and you’ll need to walk up and down stairs to reach the room. The property may not be the best choice for guests who have difficulty with stairs, bone or joint concerns, or are recovering from surgery.🌙 The room is without a window.🍴 There is no kitchen available.💖About the Rooms:This listing has 3 similar rooms. The 1st and 2nd floor rooms are identical, while the 3rd floor room is slightly more spacious. The last 10 photos show the 3rd-floor room. You can request your preferred floor (subject to availability); otherwise, we’ll assign the default room.Why Choose This House?✅ Perfect Location:Right in central Ho Chi Minh City — just 15 mins to Ben Thanh Market and 5 mins to Pham Ngu Lao Street by motorbike. Save time and money on transport!✅ Comfort & Local Experience:Newly renovated apartment in a safe, quiet alley with friendly local neighbors. You’ll get the entire apartment to yourself — a true Saigon experience.✅ Best Price in the Area:Comparable listings cost nearly double! Enjoy your stay with Netflix & YouTube included.Amenities Include:❗Queen bed (max 2 guests)❗High-speed WiFi (50Mb/s), AC❗Free in-house laundry❗Toiletries, towels, hair dryer❗Local food available 24/7❗Free Netflix, Hollywood movies✴️BOOK US NOW AND ENJOY OUR CUSTOMER SERVICE✴️Guest access❗Guest access is 24/7 with self check-in via a smart lock, so you can check in or out anytime, stress-free.❗No curfew – come and go as you please.❗The apartment is in a newly renovated private building, right in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City.❗Please note: this is a simple and comfortable stay, not a 5-star luxury condo.Other things to note**All bookings are strictly non refundable. Airbnb has given plenty of notice when you're paying and accepting the terms and conditions. Please verify your booking details before booking. Thank you. **Due to popular demand, we are offering additional services to help our guest and for your convenience with low prices.1. Bus Or Train Ticket Purchase ( Mui Ne, Nga Trang, Da Lat, Danang )2. Motorcycle Rental 3. Airport Pickup Service ( They will wait for you until you arrive and bring you to our doorstep ) 4. Tour Package ( 1 day - 3 days tour, Food Tour, Walking Tour )5. SIM Card Purchase ( Unlimited 4G and Calls)6. Personal tour guide ( experimental service). We offer a tour guide who will follow you around for 6 hours and he will translate everything between you and food vendors and shop owners or anyone basically and ensure you’ll get good prices and not be cheated. This service is based on feedbacks from our guests who are constant being overcharged especially if you’re a westerner. Please send us a message and we will arrange everything for you. It’s part of our service to provide you an easy, budget friendly and relaxing trip - you don’t have to worry about anything.

title: A Vintage Bedroom in District 1
description: Try hard, rest hard at La Sol Home in District 1!Address: 54/16 Nguyen Cu Trinh Street, Pham Nguyen Lao Ward, District 1Prime Location – Explore City Highlights in Minutes!- 2 mins to Bui Vien Walking Street - 4 mins to Ben Thanh Market - 5 mins to Saigon Center & Saigon Square - 6 mins to Independence Palace - 7 mins to Nguyen Hue Pedestrian Street & Opera HouseThe spaceIntroduction to La Sol HomeNestled on the tranquil 3rd floor in a clean and quiet neighborhood, La Sol Home offers a unique and peaceful retreat in the heart of a bustling city. This serene setting ensures a peaceful sleep, making it the perfect haven for those seeking rest amidst the urban hustle.Convenient LocationLa Sol Home is strategically located close to popular tourist attractions, allowing you to easily explore the vibrant city's sights and sounds. Whether you're interested in history, culture, entertainment, or simply experiencing the local lifestyle, our location provides unparalleled convenience.Work and LeisureFor those needing to catch up on work or enjoy some quiet time, we've thoughtfully included a long wooden desk for your convenience. This dedicated workspace is perfect for productivity or simply a quiet corner to unwind with a book.AccommodationsOur apartment is designed to comfortably accommodate up to 2 people, featuring a King-size bed for a restful night's sleep. Additionally, you'll have access to a private balcony complete, overlooking a serene green space. This tranquil outdoor area invites you to relax, rest, and immerse yourself in the peaceful atmosphere of the city.Culinary DelightsIf you enjoy cooking, you'll appreciate our well-equipped kitchen, stocked with all the necessary tools to prepare your favorite meals. Whether you're a culinary enthusiast or simply prefer the convenience of a home-cooked meal, you'll find everything you need right at your fingertips. Our kitchen is designed to make meal preparation a joy, allowing you to dine in comfort and style.ConclusionLa Sol Home is more than just a place to stay; it's an experience. Combining the tranquility of a peaceful retreat with the convenience of a central location, we offer the perfect blend for your city getaway. Whether you're here for work, play, or simply to unwind, La Sol Home welcomes you to a unique and memorable stay.Guest access- Private balcony with greenery;- One unique King size bed with handheld steam iron- Private bathroom with soap, shower gel, shampoo, conditioner, fresh towels and hair dryer- Kitchen equipped with refrigerator, induction cooker, microwave, dishes, electric kettle, rice cooker, bowls, chopsticks, spoons, pots, pans, etc.- High speed Wi-Fi internet connection, Air conditioning.- A projector (Netflix connection) and projector screen to watch your favorite shows and movies.Other things to note- We also offer room cleaning service during your stay with us if you request (only applies to minimum 6-day reservation).- No Elevator: Please be aware that our charming building is older and doesn't have an elevator. Our apartment is located on the 3rd floor, so there will be stairs to climb.- Please let us know if you have any heavy luggage that we can help you with. We’re happy to come down to the entrance and assist you with carrying your bags up to the unit.

title: P"m"P.25: Attic loft* magical stained glass frame
description: From the moment you step into this unique Hidden Gem , you'll be greeted by a space that exudes character and charm, featuring some antique furniture, cozy nooks , old tile roof with angled ceiling and special stained glass frames . This place is a perfect romantic hideaway for a couple in the middle of the cityThe space- This unit is on 4thFloor of the building with No ELEVATOR. Access is via stairs , If you need assistance with luggage, please inform us in advanced .- Located in the heart of city ( D1 ), this apartment  has everything you will need for a comfortable stay , only minutes walking away from the hustle and bustle of Bui Vien walking street , Ben Thanh Market,  BUS station,  nice restaurants and bars.- This  apartment has been designed for short to medium-term stays. ==> What things you will love about our loft :- the beautiful bedroom with special stained glass frames connected to open-space luxurious bathtub that is a perfect place for guest to relax and unwind after a long travel day - The high ceilings and large windows kitchen with lots of natural light is perfect for whipping up delicious meals. - the secret cozy balcony with gorgeous city view , completely private, perfect for enjoying the sun with  cup of coffee  or an Ideal for a candle lit dinner with wine on balmy nights ==> Amenities include:-  Smart TV with Netflix- Great Marshall  Bluetooth  speakers - Ultrafast wireless internet- A modern kitchen completed with fully stocked with coffee, tea, and top-of-the-line appliances for preparing delicious meals. - Drinking water- Hotel-quality bed linens and towels- Full kitchen with  Refrigerator with freezer, Stove, microwave , water kettle , Complete set of pots and pans, plates, bowls, cups and utensils and Basic condiments- Ensuite bathroom with Toiletries provided including toothbrush, toothpaste , shampoo and body wash.- On the ground floor, guests can use the free washer and dryer - if you have heavy luggage and need assistance , just let us know . We will help you to bring them upGuest accessAll equipment and facilities are provided for your usage and the apartment's keys upon arrival for 24/24h access.Other things to note-- This house is in the alley that take you 2minutes to get to the main street ( 150meters)--Our building has a ground floor and 4 floors above. This unit is on the 4th floor accessible by stairs and there is no elevator. If you need assistance with luggage, please inform us in advanced .--This is one of 7 units in the building.
