title: NU Rooftop Oasis Tent • Pool & Gym • HCM D1
description: Camping vibes – city skyline! Nestled on the rooftop of the NU building (137/34 Tran Dinh Xu, District 1), the spacious canvas tent (2 × 3 m) offers an urban glamping experience: sleeping under the city lights, but still enough swimming pool, gym & elevator facilities

title: Japan Street/45m2 - Dist 1/ Wide window 55inch TV
description: Unwind in spacious 45m2 stylish 1-bedroom hideaway for two, featuring a wide-view balcony right in vibrant Japan Town, just 5 minutes from Saigon’s center.Surrounded by restaurants, bars, cafés, massages, and 24/7 convenience stores — all just a few steps away.Perched on 1st floor, this Japandi-inspired retreat is fully equipped for comfort. 55-inch smart TV for epic movie nights with Netflix & Youtube, whip up your favorites in the kitchen, and freshen up in a sleek, hotel-style bathroom.The spaceStep into this beautifully designed sanctuary, filled with thoughtful touches that make you feel instantly at home — perfect for both leisure and business stays.Drift into comfort on the 1.6m queen bed, with a roomy wardrobe, hanger stand, and steam iron to keep you fresh and ready.Draw the curtains and sink into a cinematic escape on the 55-inch smart TV — your very own home theater.Need to get things done? The work desk by the large window is drenched in natural light and framed by a lovely city view, with fast WiFi keeping every call smooth and clear.Cook, reheat, or simply enjoy — the fridge, kettle, and microwave are ready for all your cravings.And because comfort matters, you’ll find a washing machine, hair dryer, fresh towels, and full toiletries waiting to make your stay effortlessly easy. 🌿Guest accessJust a quick instructions to reach our home:The taxi will drop you in front of the alley No.26 Le Thanh Ton street (next to Pasteur Street Brewing). You go to the end of the alley just about 20m, then turn right and walk 10m. You can see our house on your left side.Common Ground: is a Japanese hair salon name “Grow Tokyo”, you can walk right through to the stair behind and climb to 1st floorOther things to note****SELF-CHECKIN APARTMENT****We will provide self-check-in instruction once confirmation and get your ID card/passport to create the most private & flexibility during your stay.Other notes: 1. Please send your ID card/passport at least 24h before check-in then you will get the password of property.   2. Carefully note that my apartment on 1ST FLOOR with NO ELEVATOR. And the stair is wide and gentle enough 😁3. No smoking in the apartment please, you can step down the alley in front of our apartment 4. Bike Parking: For parking, please go to nearby parking lot We are not responsible for any loss if you leave your bike unattended outside the building.

title: Cozy Studio with bathtub
description: The modern stylish apartment along with meticulousness in each interior creates a warm living space. Join your day's Oasis " F5" with a comfortable layover bath. Wherever the place is, Oasis always makes you feel comfortable, comfortable like home. Oasis is close to the center, a few minutes ride to District 1, District 2, the surrounding area has many restaurants, coffee shops, convenient stores,...The building is equipped with an elevator, with a motorbike basement, located on the main street at 66  Huynh Man Dat, easily accessible car.

title: 8th floor 2BR Opera Metropole | Central City View
description: Welcome to our upmarket apartment at The Metropole Opera Residence, one of Ho Chi Minh City's newest and most luxurious apartment blocks. We are proud to offer you a hotel-level resort experience, combined with the comfort and amenities of a private apartment.Our apartment is suitable for both business and tourist, whether you come to Saigon for the first time or are already a regular. We are committed to bring you a memorable holiday.The spaceLiving room: Comfortable sofa, TV, dining table and coffee table for you to relax and enjoy.Master bedroom: King size bed with high-class bedding, comfortable dressing table, spacious storage closet.Extra bedroom: King size bed with high-class bedding, spacious storage closet.Kitchen: Fully equipped with stove, oven, dishwasher, cooking utensils, pots and pans.Bathroom: Hair dryer, shampoo, shower gel, hand wash gel, towels, bathroom mats, brushes and toothpaste.Other facilities: Free Netflix, washing/drying machine, Samsung AirDresser wardrobe, high speed Wifi.Guest accessSaigon riverbank park.Beautiful view of District 1 City Center and beautiful fireworks view.Indoor parking lot.Security 24/7.Co-working space with free high speed wifi.Kids playground.Other things to noteLocation:5 mins to Bach Dang Wharf and Nguyen Hue Walking Street.10 mins to Independence Palace, Notre Dame, Opera House, Central Post Office and Ben Thanh Market.10 mins to Landmark 81, Takashimaya, Saigon Square and Vincom.15 mins to Bui Vien Street.Note:Please let me know if you have special requests or need an early check-in.No smoking inside the apartment, including on the balcony.Check in process:We have two convenient check in options for you.Details will be provided before check in date.Check - in and check - out time:Check-in: 2:00 PMCheck out: 12:00 PMWe hope you will have a wonderful stay at our apartment!

title: Skyline Corner RiverView CBD Level 2x by ChiHome
description: Luxury 5* The Opera Residence by ChiHome - River View CBD District 1, SkyVilla Corner Apartment -  Tower A Level 2x.03A, 70m2, 2 Room. The Opera Metropole Thu Thiem- Tower A, Massimo, Level 2x unit 03A- Size: 70m2 (corner unit)- Includes 2 bedrooms, 2WC, comfortable to stay from 2-4 people.- 65inch Smart TV with Netflix and YouTube- Sofa, Armchair, tea table.- Dining table 4 chairs- Full cooking utensils- High speed wireless internet available• Air conditioning for entire house- 24/7 access to the buildingThe spaceAttention: The picture is taken in fact, making sure you experience the space 100% as expected when checking in.The special highlight is the balcony and Master bedroom, the 20th floor apartment is very high, which gives you a spectacular view to the whole Ho Chi Minh City skyline. Especially at night, the twinkling city lights turn the scenery into an unforgettable experience, perfect for relaxing or romantic moments.Along with the heart of 5-star hotel style design, the apartment has an area of 70m2, 2 Master beds 1m8x2m, high-class independent bag spring mattress 24cm, large living room with 1 2m6 Sofa - 2 high-class Armchair chairs, 65 inch TV, dining table with 4 chairs, full set of kitchen utensils."If this unit is fully booked at your desired time, please refer to our profile. ChiHome still has many other options of apartments ready to serve. You can click on our profile photo to discover more empty apartments "This apartment is a corner, 2x high floor with a big balcony and a view of District 1 CBD river, can see fireworks on holidays such as April 30, September 2, Tet for December 30, Lunar New Year, full view of all the most beauty of Ho Chi Minh City, Sala District 2, Empire City, Marina. The most special is the Master Full glass L bedroom with super nice view. Every morning wake up, you will enjoy the Sunrise face to face, we designed to put the bed so that you can fully enjoy this beautiful drawing. The Opera Metropole Thu Thiem Saigon with an extremely prime location in the heart of Saigon, with a direct river view of the CBD District 1 of Ho Chi Minh City, here is a panoramic view of the city, you can watch the sunrise, sunset, night scene when the buildings get on the lights. Under the building is a walking street and Thu Thiem riverside park with entertainment activities day and night.Next to the Marina is Cafe StarBuck with stunning river views.This exquisite 70m2 2-bedroom apartment will definitely bring luxury, comfort, relax, spectacular city view and high-class amenities – the perfect paradise for discerning travelers looking for an unforgettable experience.<> 01 LIVING ROOM: with a BIG BALCONY– 01 grand SOFA + 2 Armchair chairs Tea table– 65 inch SMART GOOGLE TV (FREE Youtube/Netflix)– Balcony coffee table + chairs– Beautiful city skyline and Saigon river view.<> 01 MASTER SUITE (Bedroom + Bathroom):– Take care of clothes in the steam cupboard– 01 KING bed 1m8x2m with high standard independent bag spring mattress 24cm ( Price: 30 million VND) and full cotton sheets– Spacious Wardrobes– Amazing City Skyline & Saigon River View District 1<> 01 SINGLE ROOM (Bedroom):– 01 KING bed 1m8x2m with high standard independent bag spring mattress 24cm ( Price: 30 million VND) and full cotton sheets– Wardrobe– Amazing City Skyline & Saigon River View District 1+) 01 fully equipped KITCHEN:– Cooking and dining utensils for 4 people (Double induction cooker, oven, kettle, washing machine and dryer, tea kettle, tea pot, coffee filter…)– Dish washer– * * * * Mini barGuest access– 4 Modern Elevator– Central air conditioning system– Check in with smart lock– Free WiFi–  Towels, shampoo, shower gel, conditioner, toilet paper, hair dryer, steam iron.– Very reasonable price service: Cleaning, Booking Tours, Tickets…Other things to note- Guests' passport photo is required during check-in.- Please maintain good condition of the interior- Smoking and parties are not in the house.- Luggage storage is not guaranteed and requires advance notice. - Please inform us in advance if you plan to bring strangers home.- If needed, we can help prepare extra mattress + pillow- Check-in time: 2 PMEarly check-in is subject to the apartment's availability (please inform in advance, not guaranteed)- Check-out time: 12 Noon Hours:Late check out is subject to the room availability of the apartment (please inform in advance, not guaranteed)- title: Perfect sunset city view | common space shared
description: This is a perfect choice if you are looking for a place with fresh air and almost localize.I have a cozy-clean and private bedroom with a great view by a super wide glass window (share common space: living room, kitchen) in the unit. My place is in Tan Phu district nearby Tan Son Nhat Airport, Dam Sen Water Park, Supermarket, Chinatown, etc. All facilities available (kitchen, balcony, microwave, and washing machine), a safe environment with security accessible 24/7.The spaceMy private room with a Queen bed comfortably fits 2 located in a quiet neighborhood. It has a wide window that is very airy. Moreover, there are many facilities: Towels, water, coffee... totally freeGuest accessAccess to the bathroom outside (next to the bedroom), shared kitchen, strong wifi, and complimentary bottled water.During your stayI give my guests space, but am available when neededOther things to noteContact me for help you may need during your stay. I will try my best to help you.

title: L1| Large and Quiet Private Room | Central Dist 7
description: Welcome to Zenni Stay — your peaceful city escape. Here you’ll find quiet, calming energy & city views. I speak English & Vietnamese, and love sharing local experience. Zenni Stay isn’t just a place — it’s a feeling. Come and feel it!

title: WinDy Home Apartment Tillia T2C

title: | Spacious Bunk Bed & Clean | D.1 Local Saigon| B5
description: This is a 6-bed mixed dorm where you can share the space with fellow travelers while enjoying your own private corner. Each bed is thoughtfully prepared with a curtain, reading light, locker, blanket, pillow, and towel, ensuring both comfort and privacy. The dorm is designed to provide a cozy, well-equipped shared space while still giving you a sense of personal retreat.In addition, enjoy a common area on the ground floor for dining, socializing, or working, plus free motorbike parking.The spaceIt's not a hotel or a guesthouse, just my little home. I want to share a cozy space with all the comforts, it still has everything you need for a comfortable and affordable stay./This is a mixed dormitory with 6 beds, suitable for both males and females. Security cameras are installed throughout the house to ensure the safety of all guests, without intruding on guests’ private areas/  Free on-site parking./ Smart lock: each guest is provided with a unique password for the door lock./ The room is located on the second floor of the house, accessible by stairs./ Toilet: We have 3 restroom areas: Inside the room, outside, and on the ground floor./ Living room: A place where you can chat, eat, and interact with other guests./ Laundry: Laundry service is available at 30k/kg./  Internet: Enjoy free wifi everywhere in the house./  Safety: To ensure convenience and safety for all guests, we have installed a camera system throughout the house to prevent unpleasant incidents./ Cleaning: We clean daily and change sheets weekly for long-term guests.~~ I hope the info above gives you a good scoop on what my place is all about and brings much value and benefit to your trip ~~Guest accessSure, let's make it more universally simple:/ Curtains - Your privacy./ Reading light - Light for books./ Hangers - For clothes./ Locker - Secure your things./ Bath essentials - Shampoo and Shower Gel/ Workspaces - Talk, Eat, Drink./ Hairdryer/ Iron (on request)Other things to note/ We kindly ask that there be no smoking, vaping, or use of weed and stimulants within the premises/ The air conditioner's resting time: from 11 am to 2 pm./ We have 3 toilet areas (1 inside the room - 2 outside the room). After 10 pm, please use the toilet outside to avoid disturbing other guests sharing the room./ For guests checking out after 9 pm (please pack your belongings before 9 pm)./ Due to some sensitive reasons, and not wanting to have a bad smell in the bathroom, we kindly request not to use toilet paper in the toilet, instead, please use the bidet spray. We appreciate your understanding.

title: Olive Corner – Calm & Cozy Studio- D3
description: Hiding in the quiet alley right in District 3 – the central area of Saigon, Sunny House is an ideal choice if you are looking for a modern, private living space but still close to all utilities.With a minimal but functional design, each studio is well invested from the light, the quality of the mattress bed to the high-class furniture.A small place for you to breathe lightly and rest in the middle of Saigon** If you don't see available on your desired date, message me directly to arrange the same roomThe spaceCentral location – Easy to move: • Turtle Lake – 10 minutes • The Notre Dame & Independence Hall – 10 mins • Ben Thanh Market & Nguyen Hue Walking Street – 15 mins • Car to the end of the alley, walk 30m to the house Highlighted amenities: • Parking area (up to 4) • Luggage storage area, waiting for check-in • Large shared kitchen full of utensils • Free washing, drying & ironing  Room space (3 types of area: 16m² – 22m² – 40m²): • Queen size bed, air-conditioner, small fridge, desk • 40m² room with extra bathtub & Netflix • Private toilet, strong hot and cold water. • Iron, hair dryer, kettle, travel head switch socket. • Digital password door gate. Housekeeping  • Stay for 4 or more days to clean the room and change the drap for free Free common areas: • 1st floor: shared kitchen, washing machine, dryer, iron, living room Contact & support: • Available for in-person assistance from 8:00 – 11:00 every day • Outside the above hours, can still be reached via Airbnb or phone Note: As a rule, you need to send a photo of your ID/Passport and Visa (if you are a foreigner) before you check in.

title: Cheap service room in District 1 - S2
description: My house in District 1 - Central location, 400m from the US Embassy, 800m  from Notre Dame Cathedral, 1km from the Independence Palace, other famous placesMy house in a quiet alley, 50m from the main road.You will have an interesting local experience with many utilities, 24-hour stores, restaurants, cafes, eateries, bakeries, bars aroundThe house has 4 floors. Your room is on the 2nd floor - named S2, the bathroom is shared with 1 other guest in the opposite room.Welcome to my home!The spaceYou will stay in a small room (12m2), on the 2nd floor - S2.The room you are staying in will have:- Queen size high mattress: 1m6x2m- 2 towels and 2 face towels, 2 welcome spring water- air conditioner, electric fan and full-body mirror- wardrobe with hangers, spare blankets, ironing board, hair dryer, comb- desk, table lamp, 32-inch television with Netflix Premium, Youtube PremiumPlease contact me if you need more sheets, towels during your stay.I will clean the room, change the gas, blankets, towels for you for free once a week if you stay for more than 12 days.Bathroom (6m2) shared with 1 room opposite, cleaned every day, with: water heater, shampoo, shower gel, toothpaste (no toothbrush)The house has cameras: outside the house, in the fashion store on the groundfloor, in the corridors of all floors, and the laundry areaGuest accessShared laundry area on the 3rd floor of the house1. Washing machine:- there is a manual for using machine on the right side of the machine.- free laundry detergent is available on the table next to the machine- the drying hook is available on the table, on the left side of the machine if you want to dry clothes with natural light, the drying area is on the right side of the washing machine.2. Dryer:If you don’t dry clothes, use a dryer to dry, which is set to dry for 60 minutes.3. Send luggage before check-in and after check-out:- You can send luggage to the staff at Little Paris store- If you arrive earlier than the store is open, ask me to send you instructions for luggageDuring your stayI will let guests have their own space. Guests will check in/out by themselves without having to meet the host.I am always happy to help if you have any requests. Please contact me by airbnb if you have any other concernsOther things to note- You will check in - check out by yourself.- There is no parking space for motorbikes and cars overnight, you have to park your car in the parking lot 300m away from your house (motorbike: 20k / car: 80k). The house has a common yard with neighbors, on the left side of the house for motorbikes to move conveniently during the day.- The house uses stairs, so you should consider if you are afraid to go stairs.- Small rooms are most suitable for 1 person, and up to 2 people.- The bathroom and toilet will be shared with another room on the same floor.- Near the house, 30 meters away, there is a place to rent a motorbike without keeping your identity documents, the price is 150,000 VND/day, the deposit fee is 1 million (this fee will be refunded when you return the bike to them)

title: Apartment in Korea Town, District 7
description: 3 bedrooms apartment, 2 bathrooms, 1 living room, 1 kitchen, 1 laundry room. Nice view.The spaceWELCOME TO APARTMENT WITH A FANTASTIC VIEW.- The apartment is on the 20th floor, right in Korea town (Phu My Hung) has: 1 living room, 1 kitchen, 3 bedrooms, 2 toilets, 1 laundry room.- Convenient location to go to other districts in Saigon, especially - near Secc Saigon Exhibition and Convention Center Secc- The apartment can host 6 adults.- Full facilities: free swimming pool, convenience store at ground floor, ......- Fully furnished, modern style, comfortable.* LIVING-ROOM:- Sofa set and sofa table, TV.- Iron, Hair Dryer.KITCHEN- Dining table with 6 chairs.- Refrigerator.- Electric stove.- Water kettle.- Cooking tools: Pots, pans, cups, forks, bowls, spoons, chopsticks, knives, drinking glasses, wine glasses.- Rice cooker.- Oil-free baking pot (this one functions as a microwave)- Dishwashing liquid.BEDROOM 1:- Beds, quilts, pillows, linens and towels.- Closet, hangers.- 1 set of drap is in the drawer of the bed as a backup when you need it urgently.BEDROOM 2:- Beds, blankets, pillows, linens, towels.- Closet, hangers.- Air conditioner.- 1 set of drap is in the drawer of the bed as a backup when you need it urgently.BEDROOM 2:- Beds, blankets, pillows, linens, towels.- Wardrobe.- Air conditioner.- 1 set of drap is in the drawer of the bed as a backup when you need it urgently.2 BATHROOMS/TOILETS- Hot water.-toilet paper.- Shampoo, body wash.- Hair comb, toothbrush, toothpaste.LAUNDRY:-Washing machine.- Laundry detergent, clothes hangers, clothes drying pole.CITY VIEW BALCONYPARKING SPACE IN THE BASEMENT (If you have a vehicle and the building security has a parking fee) SERVICE:- Pool: At the 8th floor of the condominium (free of charge), the pool is open from 6am to 9pm every day, except on Tuesdays.- Convenient store at ground floor.- Cleaning service: Free 1 time for guests staying 7 nights. When guests stay long-term, we will clean once a week for free. - Service: Wireless internet, cable TV with 100 + channels, free Netflix.- Taxi service at the door.Come and enjoy your stay. This is your house!!!!!OTHER THINGS TO NOTE:- Check-in time is: After 2pm and self-check in. We will send instructions, apartment password so that you can check in by yourself. - Self-checkin instruction will be send to your inbox on Airbnb Application Application prior to arrival. - The check out time is before 12 noon of your departure dates.- You can reach to the apartment by Taxi or Grab or private car from the airport. - Drug use is not allowed to use in our house. THE BUILDING - New, well managed apartment with security guards, 24/24 camera system in the common areas (parking, lobby, lift,......)- Foreigners come to stay to travel and work a lot.- The location of the building is convenient to other districts. You can also easily and quickly connect to shopping malls, tourist attractions entertainment in the city, city center, food experience, ……..Some of the places to visit we recommend to you are like:* Opposite the apartment/ building is a commercial center, Vivo shopping center (one of the big shopping malls in Ho Chi Minh city).* The location of the building is located in a neighborhood where Koreans are located a lot.* 3, 4 mins to Saigon Fair and Exhibition Center Secc Saigon Exhibition and Convention Center by Taxi or motorbike* 2, 3 mins to Crescent Mall shopping centre by Taxi or motorbike.* 3 mins to “Anh Sao” bridge, which is the center of Phu My Hung.* 10 mins to go to riverside fishing restaurant, experience western food* 10 minutes to Bui Vien street, 12 mins by Taxi or motorbike: Where there is nightlife (bars, beer clubs, food, …….)* 12 minutes to Nguyen Hue walking street, 14 minutes by Taxi or motorbike: Where there is street music and the square.* From Duc Ba Church, Independence Palace, Ben Thanh Market: 15 mins by Taxi or motorbike. You can easily call taxi/ grab/ grab motorbike to go anywhere to explore our city. You can also book a short tour to do sightseeing and experience Can Gio, …..Check out our "Guidebook" in "My Profile" for more interesting places. WE ARE ALWAYS TRYING OUR BEST TO SUPPORT OUR GUESTSWE 'RE VERY PLEASED TO HOST ALL POLITE CUSTOMERS AND KEEP THE APARTMENTTHANKS FOR YOUR CHOOSING.

title: Wabi Sabi + Cement Bathtub + Netflix Near Bui Vien
description: Discover our Wabi Sabi room, a peaceful retreat perfectly located in the city center. It's in a quiet, middle-class area yet just five minutes from Ben Thanh market and one minute from Starbucks, with abundant street food nearby. Enjoy a 100-inch projector with Android TV and Premium Netflix. Situated on the main road in a secure, renovated private building, it’s a 100% safe escape from the bustle.The space*This property has 4 unique rooms. The spaces on the 2nd, 3rd, and 4th floors share the same design. The 1st-floor room is unique, offering a different layout and an expanded balcony (see the final 25 photos to compare). All rooms have the same square footage and amenities.*IMPORTANT: PLEASE LET US KNOW WHICH ROOM YOU PREFER ( SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY ) . REFER TO THE LAST 25 PHOTOS FOR THE 1ST FLOOR OPTION. IF NO PREFERENCE IS STATED, A ROOM WILL BE RANDOMLY ASSIGNED TO YOU.*Entrance is through a beauty saloon but rest assured you have privacy. Why choose our apartment? ?We offer three compelling reasons to stay with us: 1. An unbeatable LOCATION, 2. A private, comfortable APARTMENT with all you need, and 3. The BEST PRICE you'll find for this quality in this area.✔ LOCATION : Our apartment is perfectly centered in Ho Chi Minh. You are just a 5-minute walk from Ben Thanh Market and 15 minutes from Pham Ngu Lao (Backpacker Street). Located on a main thoroughfare, everything is at your fingertips. This prime spot is ideal for tourists, saving you significant time and money on transport.✔ COMFORTABLE APARTMENT : Find your oasis in our newly renovated building, tucked away in a safe, wide, and short alley. This area has been home to middle-class locals since independence, and the residents (mostly kind seniors) are incredibly welcoming. You'll be in safe hands, with two boutique shops right in the alley. You get the entire apartment, offering an authentic Saigon experience. Isn't that the point of travel? Live like a local, chat with the super-friendly neighbors, and enjoy a surprisingly quiet home right in the city's vibrant heart.✔ UNBEATABLE PRICE: We offer incredible value. Similar private apartments nearby easily cost double our price—feel free to compare :) Why pay more? Here, you can unwind with a movie on our Dolby Vision projector (with Android TV, Netflix, and YouTube) or simply soak your cares away in our beautiful bathtub.Sleeps : Max 3 Guests ✔ 2 on the Bed ✔ 1 on a floor mattress ( 1.2m x 1.8m )Amenities:▶ Cinema experience with a full range of movies, Free Netflix Premium, and a Dolby Vision Projector. Perfect for a romantic movie night, even from the bathtub!▶ Relax in our soaking bathtub with hot water, the perfect way to unwind after a day of exploring.Wine List Ask us for our wine menu. We can source nearly any wine at a reasonable price, letting you relax with the perfect glass and some background music.▶ Free High-Speed 50Mb/s WiFi & fully Air Conditioned RoomAnd some amenities like:Essential toiletries (Wipes, toothpaste, toothbrush) (*)Shampoo, shower gel (*)Hair dryerComplimentary in-house laundry service▶ Shared Washing Machine (Or let our cleaner handle your laundry for free!)▶ Full Kitchen: Equipped with a refrigerator, electric stove, pots, pans, and all the necessary cooking utensils.▶ Amazing local food surrounds you 24/7. You will never go hungry here!▶ Immerse yourself in the local Vietnamese way of life. Just step outside to soak in the vibrant sights and sounds of the culture.▶ Walk everywhere! We are close to Ben Thanh Market, Japanese Town, Reunification Palace, and Vincom Plaza (all under 20 mins on foot). Most other key attractions are only a 10-minute walk (approx. 500m).▶ Discover the city's attractions and enjoy the energy of Saigon.Love what you see? BOOK US NOW AND EXPERIENCE OUR DEDICATED CUSTOMER SERVICEGuest access- Guest access is available 24/7.  - Self-check-in is easy with a smart lock, allowing you to check in and out at any time without worry.  - There is no elevator.  - The property is located in a newly renovated private building, centrally situated in Ho Chi Minh City. Please note that it is not a 5-star luxury condo.  - There is a hair salon on the Ground floor called Muot Hair Salon. They are a friendly team, and you can easily enter the building to access your apartment.Other things to note**All bookings are strictly non-refundable. Airbnb has given plenty of notice when you're paying and accepting the terms and conditions. Please verify your booking details before booking. Thank you. ****Please note that due to the natural progression of a cement bathtub and the nature of the cement, the bathtub will appear rustic and have spots that are part of how cement reacts to water. But rest assured—it's totally clean and safe and we disinfect it. The bathtub is made from a mixture of concrete and cement, so there is nothing dirty about it. You can view it in the last photo.Due to popular demand, we are offering additional services to help our guests and for your convenience with low prices.1. Bus Or Train Ticket Purchase ( Mui Ne, Nga Trang, Da Lat, Danang )2. Motorcycle Rental 3. Airport Pickup Service ( They will wait for you until you arrive and bring you to our doorstep ) 4. Tour Package ( 1 day - 3 days tour, Food Tour, Walking Tour )5. Personal tour guide ( experimental service). We offer a tour guide who will follow you around for 6 hours and he will translate everything between you and food vendors and shop owners or anyone basically and ensure you’ll get good prices and not be cheated. This service is based on feedback from our constant guests being overcharged especially if you’re a Westerner. Please send us a message and we will arrange everything for you. It’s part of our service to provide you with an easy, budget-friendly, and relaxing trip - you don’t have to worry about anything.

title: PIN Boutique - Studio | Kitchen | Washer | Dryer
description: PINhome – Peaceful little corner in the heart of Saigon  VN: Located on Truong Quyen Street, District 3 – where the nostalgia and modern vitality of Saigon are located in the shape of an elegant, gentle Vietnamese house hidden in the middle of the young street. Every room, from Saigon Sol - Danang Sol to Hanoi Sol-PINhome is not only a place to stay, but a memorable stop where you find peace in the heart of the dynamic city.Guest accessLong day trips are more comfortable with a washer & dryer at the common area, always ready to keep your fresh and fragrant clothes.Other things to noteThe house has 3 floors with wide and comfortable stairs, during office hours there are always people willing to help with luggage and a friendly smile. You can choose floor 2–3 to enjoy fresh air, natural light, or 1st floor for convenient transportation – we always try to arrange the best for you.

title: Giấy-Dó Studio in central of Saigon | Em’s Home 1
description: Welcome to Em's Home. This is a small apartment located in an old building constructed in the 1950s. We have renovated it into a unique serviced apartment by using local materials and repurposing old materials in a new design. Looking out the balcony,  you can enjoy a picturesque landscape of Saigon. The old and new architectural works are combined harmoniously, which creates a pleasant view of Vietnam's most vibrant city. We hope you feel at home when staying here.The space- Our unit is on the 4th floor of historic building. Access is via stairs (NO ELEVATOR/LIFT), but the view and design of the room will definitely not disappoint you once you've climbed up. If you have heavy luggage and need assistance, just let us know. We will help you to bring them up.-Especially, a small garden with a bathhub  built-in at the balcony.- One Queen size bed with a comfortable mattress.- A washing machine is also ready.- An air-conditioner, a private bath, a kitchen and a 50-inch Google wireless TV  with high-speed Wi-Fi, Netflix are included.- Just a short walk to Bui Vien street, Ben Thanh market. The building of “Nguyễn Thị Nghĩa street” is surrounded by full of boutique coffee shops and restaurants. The apartment is just a few minutes away from many of the city’s main tourist attractions, especially Ben Thanh market. Take your time to enjoy some essences of the city and see you around!Guest access-This is self check-in/check-out apartment. House key code will be provided before the trip.Other things to note-Our studio is located in an old building that was constructed in the 1960s in Saigon, so sometimes you might face some cleanliness issues that’s out of our hands (inside the studio is very warm and clean). It’s very convenient for wandering around the downtown area and can enjoy local atmosphere.-Please consider it if you are a girl traveling alone and a lot of heavy luggage. But assure you that this place is safe for everyone.-Since the apartment is located in the city center and on a main road, there may sometimes be some noise. Please consider If you’re a light sleeper. We have prepared earplugs in case you need.

However, for guests staying 7 days or more, a weekly cleaning is included in the price of the room. If you’d like additional cleaning during your stay, it is available upon request for an extra fee.

title: Luxury–Near Airport,CityCenter apt w Hotel Amenity
description: Welcome to Sai Gon <3I am pleased to offer my cozy and modern apartment to be your “home away from home” for your trip to Ho Chi Minh City. We share the same facilities/building with Holidays Inn so it is great for business and leisure travelers looking for a convenient location!My home is a brand new 1-bedroom apartment centrally located in the heart of the city, only 3 km away from the airport and 6km from the city center (Ben Thanh Market, Saigon Square, the Notre Dame, etc..).The spaceThe apartment: Located in the charming Cong Hoa (Republic) street, the apartment offers a unique experience in this robust and energetic city: ☆ Living:- Laptop friendly workspaces- Equipped with unlimited high-speed WiFi- Sofa and a balcony with city view - 40" Smart TV☆ Kitchen:- Good-sized kitchen complete with cookware, pots, pans, utensils, bowls, plates, etc.- Basic appliances include refrigerator, microwave, induction stove and boiling kettle.-Complimentary Coffee/Tea sachets- 4-seater dining table☆ Bedroom:- Fully air-conditioned- Comfortable new King mattress with quality bedding- 1 sofa bed with foldable mattress in the living room for another person.- Closet with hangers - Iron & Ironing Board-Vanity table ☆ Bathroom:- Equipped with European rain shower for a spa-like experience!- Mirror, quality towels, hairdryer and complimentary shampoo & shower gel, liquid hand soap- High-Pressure Hot Water Shower- Washing Machine with complimentary detergentGuest access☆ Facility + FREE use of gym and swimming pool+ Convenient store right downstairs ☆ Guest access:- Security camera in the building- Accessible only using access cards dedicated to each level and apartment- Electronic door lock for easy access into the unitOther things to note1/ No party is allowed2/The condo doesn’t allow pets either (sorry furry friends T_T)3/ Don't bring any strangers home.4/ CHECK-IN Time: The official check-in time is after 2PM. Early check-in is not guaranteed, depending on the apartment's availability and must be informed upon your arrival.5/ CHECK-OUT Time: The official check-out time is not later than 12 noon. Late check-out is not guaranteed, depending on the apartment's availability and must be informed in advance.6/ Luggage keeping is only applicable with advance notice 7/ Please TURN OFF all AC, lights and electrical outlets before leaving the apartment.8/ No drugs, no prostitute. THEY ARE ILLEGAL IN VIETNAM.9/Please LOWER your voice after 11PM to avoid disturbing others.10/Please KEEP all items in good condition & clean as your own home. 11/ No durian in the apartment please## Helpful Q&A:Q: How far is the APT from the airport by taxi & how much does it cost?A: Approximately 5-10 mins and costs USD $2 ≈ VND 50,000 (Please take official taxi brands such as MaiLinh, Vinasun and Grab)Q: Late check in & Early check in?A: Please let me know your ETA, I’ll work to accommodate you.Q: How do I get a cellphone SIM card?A: You can buy it at the airport in Vietnam for very cheapQ: How must does it cost to rent a motorbike in HCMC?A: Around $7 per day.Please feel free to message me if you have any other questions.

title: The RetroMetro Suite G with Bathtub by Circadian
description: Go back to the Retrofuture with our vibrant & fun space-age apartment!This quiet 50sqm unit is filled with cool design touches, custom furniture, and amazing amenities.The room features:-Spacious living room-Work desk and chair-Huge bathroom+bathtub-Extensive coffee+tea bar-300 Mbps wifi We are in the peaceful Tan Dinh neighborhood, near many cafes and restaurants, and close to the famous Pink Church.The spaceOur interior designer had one goal for this apartment: to capture the optimism of a bygone age, when people dreamed of flying cars and trips to Mars.The result is a playful space centered around sleek furniture, vibrant colors, and oversized artwork.We've paired the design with a layout that maximizes your comfort and convenience.The 50qm space features a living room, floating bed, a full kitchen, dining table, workspace and a beautiful standing bathtub. This unit also has a small enclosed courtyard and lightwell, further brightening up the room.We have every amenity you could want for a short or long-term stay:- Floating king bed with 4 pillows- Hotel-quality bed linens and towels- Spacious sofa and coffee table- Dining table with 4 high chairs- Work desk and work chair- 50 inch Smart TV with Netflix- Vinyl record player with a set of albums and audiophile speakers- Ultrafast 300Mbps wireless internet- Complimentary coffee and tea bar with several coffee and tea makers, and fresh Arabica beans and tea leaves- Filtered drinking waterFull kitchen including:- Standing refrigerator with freezer- Stove, microwave and water kettle- Full set of pots and pans, plates, bowls, cups and utensils- Basic condimentsThe huge ensuite bathroom features:- Rain shower with hand spray- Bathtub- Bidet toilet- Toiletries provided including toothbrush, soap and shampooThere's also a washer and dryer in the building. This amenity is shared with the guests in the other 6 rooms on our properties.Other amenities are available upon request including:-Toaster-Rice cooker-Blender-Baby crib, monitor and other devicesOur unit is on Nguyen Phi Khanh street, within walking distance of the Pink Church and Le Van Tam Park.If this room is not available for your dates, we have 6 other units at this location. Please contact us directly and we can help you book a stay.Guest accessGuests will have the entire unit to themselves, including bathroom, kitchen and coffee bar. The only shared amenities is the washer/dryer located on the ground floor.Other things to notePlease note there is a renovation for the coffee shop on the ground floor, and is expected to finish on November 21st. The heaviest stage has been completed.  Work hours are from 8AM to 5PM, Monday to Saturday (break from 12PM - 1PM), with less disruptive work on Saturday. Please message us if you have any questions or need any support.This unit is on the ground floor. The building is open 24 hours a day (no curfew). There is no elevator.Please message us first if you are interested in having a photoshoot at our unit.

title: Victoria Villa•Central D1• Karaoke/Billiards/Movie
description: Welcome to Vinhome Golden River Victoria Villa by TrueStay , a luxurious mansion in the heart of District 1. Just steps from top attractions, restaurants, and shopping, it’s perfect for exploring Saigon. Enjoy a private karaoke room, home cinema, billiards table, spacious living areas, and lush balconies with city views. Ideal for large families or groups seeking comfort, fun, and unbeatable central convenience.The space🛌 Bedrooms & Bathrooms7 air-conditioned bedrooms with premium mattresses and hotel-quality linens5.5 modern bathrooms, including bathtub and walk-in showersLarge windows in every room, bringing in natural light🎉 Key amenities✅ Private karaoke room with premium sound system✅ Home cinema with large screen and comfy sofa seating✅ Professional billiards table for hours of fun✅ High-speed Wi-Fi & smart TV in the living room✅ Fully equipped kitchen: large fridge, stove, oven, microwave, cookware✅ Spacious balcony with greenery and city views✅ Washer & dryer available for your convenience🚪 Guest accessGuests will have exclusive access to the entire villa and all amenities: karaoke room, cinema, billiards, kitchen, dining, and laundry facilities. Free parking on-site (subject to availability).Guest accessWe offer following facilities:1. Free Swimming Pool ( maximum 4 guests using per time, register with us 15 minutes in advance )2. Free Gym ( maximum 2 guests using per time, register with us 15 minutes in advance ) ** Pool and Gym are Public and Not Locate in your Villa ** Within a short walk or quick ride, you’ll find:1.Saigon Riverfront & Bach Dang Wharf (2 mins): Perfect for morning jogs or evening strolls.2.Nguyen Hue Walking Street (5 mins): Bustling with restaurants, street performers, coffee shops, and vibrant nightlife.3.Ben Thanh Market (7 mins): Iconic shopping spot for local crafts, souvenirs, and authentic Vietnamese street food.4. Notre-Dame Cathedral & Central Post Office (10 mins): French colonial landmarks you can’t miss.5. Saigon Opera House (7 mins): Great for catching a cultural show or simply enjoying the stunning architecture.6. Shopping malls (Vincom Center, Takashimaya – 5–10 mins): High-end brands, cinemas, and dining options.7. Local convenience: 24/7 convenience stores, supermarkets, pharmacies, spas, ATMs, and banks within 2–5 minutes’ walk.🚖 Transportation:Easy access to taxis, Grab, and buses for exploring the entire city.About 20 minutes by car to Tan Son Nhat International Airport.🏙️ Atmosphere:The Bason neighborhood strikes a unique balance: lively yet sophisticated, bustling during the day but calm and safe at night. Whether you want to explore Saigon’s energetic streets or unwind on a quiet riverside walk, you’re perfectly situated here.🍽️ Dining & Nightlife:The area is packed with dining choices, from famous Vietnamese eateries to Michelin-guide restaurants, rooftop bars with panoramic views, and cozy cafés along the river.🎨 Culture & Experience:Museums, art galleries, and historic landmarks are within easy reach, giving you endless opportunities to immerse yourself in the rich history and vibrant contemporary culture of Ho Chi Minh City.Other things to note1📱 Internet & Work: High-speed Wi-Fi available throughout the villa, perfect for remote work or streaming.🧺 Housekeeping: Cleaning service every 2 days included for stays over 3 nights. Daily cleaning available upon request (extra fee).🚪 Access: Private villa entrance with smart lock; guests have 100% exclusive access to all amenities.🚖 Airport transfers: Private airport pickup/drop-off can be arranged with advance notice (additional cost).🐾 Pets: Small pets allowed on request; please notify us when booking.👶 Families with kids: Baby cot and high chair can be provided upon request.🎉 Events: Small gatherings for registered guests are allowed; loud parties with outside visitors are not permitted without prior approval.🔇 Quiet hours: Please respect neighbors by keeping noise down after 11 PM.💧 Water supply: Complimentary bottled water provided on arrival; tap water is not drinkable.🛎️ Support: Our team is available 24/7 by phone or message for assistance or local recommendations.💼 Luggage: Early check-in or late check-out may be arranged if possible; luggage storage may available upon request.🚘 Parking: Free parking for 1–2 cars on premises; please inform us if you plan to bring vehicles.

title: Central Studios 9rm 18 ppl @Ben Thanh by Circadian
description: *Please message us BEFORE reserving so to confirm availability for your dates*The building with 9 minimalist studios is located in a quiet alley in downtown Saigon, in walking distance to major tourist attractions, close to many cafes, restaurants, shopping and nightlife. The units feature fully equipped kitchens, large beds, spacious bathrooms and lots of amenities: Smart TV w/ Netflix, bluetooth speaker, superfast wifi, & bidet toilet. The building has an elevator and washer and dryer.The spaceOur property is perfect for large groups as we have 9 separate studios, each with queen or king beds and ensuite bathrooms. We also have a washer/dryer machine and some parking space for motorbikes.Each studio is normally rented out as a separate Airbnb listing so each also includes a kitchen and small desk and chair.The building has a ground floor and 4 upper floors with an elevator. Here's the layout:> Ground floor: the only studio with a king bed. Please note it has no window.>1st to 3rd floors: two studios per floor, the front studio has a low platform bed and floor to ceiling windows, the back studio has a normal bed with a large window. >4th floor: two studios, the front studio has a normal bed and a big balcony, the backroom has a normal bed and a small balcony.               Other amenities include:-  40 inch Smart TV with Netflix-  Go-gle bluetooth speaker-  Laptop safe-  Ultrafast wireless internet -  Complimentary coffee and tea bar with several coffee and tea makers, and fresh Arabica beans and tea leaves-  Filtered drinking water-  Hotel-quality bed linens and towels-  Work desk with chair and plush armchair-  Full kitchen>>> Refrigerator with freezer>>> Stove, microwave and water kettle>>> Complete set of pots and pans, plates, bowls, cups and utensils>>>Basic condiments-  Ensuite bathroom with>>>Rain shower with hand spray>>>Bidet toilet>>>Toiletries provided including toothbrush, soap and shampooThe building is in a quiet alley in the downtown area across from a Starbucks and the New World Hotel. It is within walking distance of major tourist sites. We are at the end of the closed alley so there's minimal traffic outside.You will find many cafes, restaurants, shopping and bars on the nearby streets of Nguyen Trai, Le Lai and Ly Tu Trong.Guest accessGuest will have full access to the building. It is not shared with anyone else.Other things to noteThe building is located in an alley, so cars will drop you off at the alley entrance. title: #1 cozy apartment next to Ben Thanh market - 3 BR
description: The condominium offers room for up to 7  and is very conveniently located within 5 minutes to the popular Ben Thanh Market. In the immediate vicinity (10 minutes walking) you will find, the Independence Palace, Notre Dame, War Museum, Bui Vien Walking Street, Dong Khoi Shopping Street several dining establishments, grocery stores etc.The spaceThe 120m² apartment is on the 18th floor of a new residential building right next to the Ben Thanh Market and The Fine Art Museum (about 5 walking minutes). It offers comfortable space for 7 people and also includes a large balcony of about 6m².The kitchen is fully equipped and includes everything you need to cook!The master bedroom is furnished with a double bed (180x200), a coffee table, a large desk, Sony sound system and ample closet space.  The bathroom offers both hot bathtub and shower.There are two more additional bedrooms, one with a 160x200 double bed and one with 140x200 double bed, closet and table.The living room is fully equipped with Television (cable TV with over 100 channels) as well as free Wi-Fi. Data SIM is available upon request!The sofa can comfortably accommodate one for sleeping.** Premises3 double beds (180x200, 160x200, 140x200), dining area, TV, large desk, plenty of storage spaceFully equipped kitchen2 Bathrooms incl. title: D1_4BR_Ben Thanh Complex_Bathtub x Skylight Garden
description: Step into a piece of SAIGON's history with our home, just steps from the iconic BEN THANH Market.Our location offers easy access to the city's FAMOUS ATTRACTIONS and MUST-TRY RESTAURANTS, all within a short walk. Despite being in the bustling city center, our home is a PEACEFUL RETREAT, remaining QUIET and PRIVATE.Immerse yourself in the perfect blend of HISTORY and modern convenience. Stay with us and enjoy the quintessential SAIGON experience, where TRANQUILITY meets VIBRANT CITY LIFE.The space--ABOUT BEN THANH QUARTER--During your Ho Chi Minh City travel journey, wandering around Ben Thanh Market should be one of the TOP activities on your bucket list. As an ICONIC symbol of Ho Chi Minh City, Ben Thanh Market is a must-visit place for travelers who are enthusiastic about the BEAUTIFUL French, hundred years of history architecture and want to immerse themselves in the hustle and bustle of this energetic city. The market and the quarter has EVERYTHING you want to FIND and things you want to EXPLORE with hundreds of kiosk inside and boutiques/restaurant surrounding: dried & fresh food, fruit, seafood, clothes, cosmetics, utensils, artisanal boutiques, coffee,  massage, street food,...-- ABOUT THE HOUSE---Located just in front of the market west gate, the old property, formerly belonging to the famous richest Saigonese Hui Bon Hua, is a part of the long old story of Ben Thanh quarter. Thank to the DIAMOND location, every amenities you need is just at your doorstep 24/7: Convenient store, coffee, restaurant, massage, market, currency exchange,...In order to renovate and host you, our friend from afar, the house has been refurbished to be UNIQUE & STYLISH but no less COMFORTABLE with MODERN and COMPLETE equipment, but still keeping its brick walls and especially its wide SKYLIGHT in the middle of 2 blocks. It means you will be able to simultaneously experience the antiquity of a HISTORIC building and a spacious, modern, comfortable apartment, as well as EXCITEMENT and PRIVACY in one same vacation. This listing contains 02 separated unit in a same building, so 4 floors of total 250 sqm space, subtly arranged and carefully equipped, the house can host up to 15 people and make you feel free like home after a long day exploring the city.-- ABOUT THE NEIGHBORHOOD---This prime District 1 location places you at the epicenter of the city's cultural scene. Walk to Saigon's iconic landmarks & atrractions, including:- Ben Thanh Market- Saigon Notre-Dame Basilica- Saigon Central Post Office- Independence Palace (Reunification Palace)- War Remnants Museum- Ho Chi Minh City Museum- Bitexco Financial Tower Skydeck- Tan Dinh Church- Jade Emperor Pagoda- Bach Dang Wharf Park- Saigon Waterbus stop- Independence Palace- Nguyen Hue Walking Street- Nha Rong Wharf- Ho Chi Minh City Museum of Fine Arts- Saigon Opera House- The Hop-on Hop-off Bus Tour- Nguyen Van Binh Book Street- Saigon Zoo and Botanical Gardens- Cho Lon Market, Mong Bridge- Rach Ben Nghe Bridge- Thien Hau Temple- Museum of Vietnamese History.- Explore the bustling shops of Vincom Center Dong Khoi and Takashimaya Saigon, or soak up the vibrant atmosphere of Bui Vien Walking Street and Chinatown.These are a few of the many convenience stores and cafes located near your apartment:Convenience stores:-Cheers Phan Chu Trinh (45 Phan Chu Trinh, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City) - Located right at your doorstep, this Cheers outlet offers a wide range of convenience items, snacks, and beverages. Open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.-Circle K Ben Thanh (57-59 Phan Chu Trinh, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City) - Just a short walk away, Circle K Ben Thanh is another convenient option for your daily needs. Open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.-Vinmart+ Ben Thanh (107-109 Phan Chu Trinh, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City) - A Vinmart+ store is a combination of convenience store and grocery, offering fresh produce, household items, and a wider selection of products compared to other convenience stores. Open 7AM to 11PM daily.Coffee shops:-The Workshop - Coffee & Coworking Space (17 Nguyễn Văn Tráng, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City) - This cozy coffee shop offers a great ambiance for both working and socializing. They serve delicious coffee, tea, and pastries. Open 8AM to 8PM daily.-Cộng Cà Phê Ben Thanh (49-51 Phan Chu Trinh, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City) - Experience Vietnamese coffee culture at Cộng Cà Phê, known for its traditional décor and authentic coffee recipes. Open 7AM to 10PM daily.-The Vintage Emporium Cafe (35 Phan Chu Trinh, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City) - This unique cafe combines a vintage bookstore with a cozy coffee shop, offering a relaxing atmosphere to enjoy your coffee and books. Open 7:45AM to 6PM daily.During your stay, immerse yourself in the city's cultural scene with a variety of exciting events happening in August.- Vietfoo & Beverage SECC: 799 Nguyen Van Linh, District 7, August 8-10- Ghibli in Town 2024: Ho Chi Minh City Conservatory of Music, August 2- Lô cô art market: 40B Nguyen Van Troi, Phu Nhuan District, August 3- IKEBANA EXHIBITION: 70 Ngo Duc Ke, District 1, August 2- Pet Run: Thanh My Loi Urban Area, District 2, August 24- Cinephile "Tôi thấy hoa vàng trên cỏ xanh": S.Pace, District 1, August 9Ben Thanh Quarter offers more than just a place to stay; it's an experience. Book your stay today and discover the epitome of TRANQUILITY meeting VIBRANT CITY LIFE in the heart of Saigon, where unforgettable events await.Guest access--THE FACILITIES YOU CAN ENJOY --- Check in/ Check out easy with SMART LOCK- Located just on the GROUND floor so it's suitable for even elderly and children- All space has Daikin Air-conditioning--Unit 01--* LIVING ROOM:- Long sofa and stylish tea table- 70 INCH Smart TV- Cozy and relaxing fireplace- Working desk & banquet- Beatiful lobby with skylight* BEDROOM 1:- 01 QUEEN BED with 25cm mattress and full cotton bedding- Wardrobe*BEDROOM 2:- 01 KING BED with 25cm mattress and full cotton bedding- Clothes hanger* FULL KITCHEN:- Induction stove + Cooking/Dining utensils (Pan, pot, bowl, dishes,...)- Microwave- Washer + Dryer* 01 WC* DINING AREA* PATIO/BALCONY with high chair and table-- Unit 03--* LIVING ROOM:- Double sofa bed and stylish tea table- Single sofa- 55 INCH Smart TV with netflix- Cozy and relaxing fireplace- Working desk & banquet- Beatiful lobby with skylight* MASTER BEDROOM 1 (ensuite bathroom with stylish BATHTUB and BATH CABIN) :- 02 KING BED with 25cm mattress and full cotton bedding- Wardrobe- Large window with long bench*BEDROOM 2:- 01 QUEEN BED with 25cm mattress and full cotton bedding- 50 inch TV with netflix- Wardrobe* FULL KITCHEN:- Induction stove + Cooking/Dining utensils (Pan, pot, bowl, dishes,...)- Microwave- Oven- Washer + Dryer* DINING AREA* PATIO with Sky garden and Pinic table/chair===> The free benefits you will have while staying in my apartment:+) Free laundry+) Free towel, shampoo, shower gel, bed sheet, toothbrush+) Free wifi+) Free Netflix+) Free welcome water+) Extremely reasonable pick-up private car for 2 ways ( Modern clean car: Peugeot 3008, Mitsubishi Xpander, Honda Civic, Mazda3, Mazda 6, Chevrolet Colorado, etc...)Other things to noteNote 1:  Please confirm your check in timeNote 2:  Usual check-in time is 14.00 pm while check-out is not later than 11.00 am. However, EARLY check-in or LATE check-out could be offered for FREE upon avaibilityNote 3: On the check in date, we will send you the code of doorNote 4: We have well furbished and equipped properties in Vinhomes Landmark/ the Marq district 1 and Old quarter Hanoi city ( 1-2-3-4 Bedrooms) too, please text us to find the perfect match to your searchNote 5: Please help us and the planet save energy and water ^^ Note 6: We hope you can help us to water the plants in the morning ( before 11 am) or afternoon (after 4 pm). The plant will be so happy.

Spread over a royal area of 138m², the apartment opens to three holiday paradises with 1 Super King bed (2mx2m), 2 King beds (1m8x2m) – each bed is a masterpiece with a premium 24cm independent bag spring mattress. The L balcony is dotted with 4 relaxing chairs and exquisite tea table, where you sip coffee from the riverside Starbucks, watching the walking street and Thu Thiem waterfront park bustling day and night.Why Riverside Opulence?This is the pinnacle of luxury, where amenities and golden location in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City are in perfect harmony. title: Ben Thanh Tower Loft Penthouse panorama view
description: Modern loft, well-equipped and spacious apartment just a few steps from Ben Thanh Market, convenience stores, massage services, coffee shops, bakeries, restaurants, street food, ATMs, and hangouts within walking distance. Everything you need is nearby. Explore every nook and cranny of this uniquely beautiful city, you are at the city's heart.The space"YOUR HOME AWAY FROM HOME"This PENTHOUSE apartment is located on the 19th floor of Ben Thanh Tower (another name: The One Saigon serviced apartment) and is equipped with everything you need for an enjoyable stay:- High Floor Apartment with City View - QUEEN BED - SIZE is firm, comfortable- KITCHEN with dining table, complete kitchen equipment- EN-SUITE BATHROOM includes hot water, shower, mirror, towels, soap, toilet paper, shampoo, and hairdryer- You also have a WASHING MACHINE for your laundry; we prepare an iron and ironing board and clothes drying rack - Free Wi-Fi, cable TV, and coffee & tea.- Kitchen with dining table, induction cooker, microwave, refrigerator, storage, cooking pans, glasses, plates, and utensils.A modern, fully furnished, and spacious building just a few minutes from Ben Thanh market, with great views overlooking the city center.Everything you need is nearby. Enjoy a wonderful day in the sun, explore every nook and cranny of this uniquely beautiful city, visit France's magnificent historical architects, find a cafe to drop in, and then always come back and feel at home.Guest accessGuests have 24/7 access to the building, including:- Check in at reception, please present your passport/ID card with the same name as the reservation- The building has two gates, main gate at 45 Dang Thi Nhu Street- Reception works from 07:00 to 19:00 daily- There is a security guard in the lobby to support you 24/7. Security guards are ready to communicate with you and can talk to you through the gogle translate tool, If you need help, don't hesitate to talk with them- The building has three lifts that our guests can use- GREAT rooftop pool with a direct city view. The pool area on the 21st floor is ready to use from 6:00 to 21:00 daily.- The fitness club on the mezzanine floor is open from 6:00 to 12:00 and from 13:00 to 22:00 (12:00 to 13:00 closed for cleaning)- The lobby has many chairs, so guests can rest while waiting for check-in or check out- Guests can leave their suite case at the front desk and take it before 20:00@another note: ***NO SMOKING in the room. Smokers could ONLY smoke on the balcony.***Animals are not accepted into the building.We can support you to set up a small, cozy party in apartment ( birthday, honeymoon or aniversary,...) with food and beverage, depending on your needs.Other things to noteUnlike many other spaces in Ho Chi Minh City, guests have no curfew. You can walk in and out as you please and take advantage of the other facilities in the building, such as the gym, poolThe building also has other advantages:* Di Mai restaurant on the ground floor serves a Vietnamese fusion menu.* You can also use the rooftop swimming pool. The swimming pool is open to you from 6:00 am to 9:00 pm.* Gym on the M floor is also a favorite place of our customersWe offer several fee-based services such as:1. Airport pick-up/drop-off service to help you enjoy the door-to-door transfer service $16-$25 /way depending on guest's arrival time (we recommend this service if this is the first-time visiting Ho Chi Minh City)2 / NO DAILY CLEANING, we will free cleaning every 3 days,the cleaning fee is $30 each time (including linen change). Towels will be provided for free if you need more, please consider when using them to save the environment.Please note that you will have to pay for bed linen, and towels if they are stained with blood, lipstick, and mascara according to the price list in the room3/Extra floor mattress/Extra bed: to prepare an additional floor mattress, remember to register the number of guests. A floor mattress will be provided accordingly.4/Laundry service, luggage storage, and tours advice at the front desk

title: Victoria Vinhome Mansion • Central D1 • For VIP
description: Welcome to  Bason Grand Villa by TrueStay , a luxurious mansion in the heart of District 1. Just steps from top attractions, restaurants, and shopping, it’s perfect for exploring Saigon. Enjoy a private karaoke room, home cinema, billiards table, spacious living areas, and lush balconies with city views. Ideal for large families or groups seeking comfort, fun, and unbeatable central convenience.The space🛌 Bedrooms & Bathrooms7 air-conditioned bedrooms with premium mattresses and hotel-quality linens5.5 modern bathrooms, including bathtub and walk-in showersLarge windows in every room, bringing in natural light🎉 Key amenities✅ Private karaoke room with premium sound system✅ Private Home cinema with large screen and comfy sofa seating✅ Private Professional billiards table for hours of fun✅ High-speed Wi-Fi & smart TV in the living room✅ Fully equipped kitchen: large fridge, stove, oven, microwave, cookware✅ Spacious balcony with greenery and city views✅ Washer & dryer available for your convenience🚪 Guest accessGuests will have exclusive access to the entire villa and all amenities: karaoke room, cinema, billiards, kitchen, dining, and laundry facilities. Free parking on-siteGuest accessWe offer following facilities:1. Free Swimming Pool ( maximum 4 guests using per time, register with us 15 minutes in advance )2. Free Gym ( maximum 2 guests using per time, register with us 15 minutes in advance ) ** Pool and Gym are Public and Not Locate in your Villa ** Within a short walk or quick ride, you’ll find:1.Saigon Riverfront & Bach Dang Wharf (2 mins): Perfect for morning jogs or evening strolls.2.Nguyen Hue Walking Street (5 mins): Bustling with restaurants, street performers, coffee shops, and vibrant nightlife.3.Ben Thanh Market (7 mins): Iconic shopping spot for local crafts, souvenirs, and authentic Vietnamese street food.4. Notre-Dame Cathedral & Central Post Office (10 mins): French colonial landmarks you can’t miss.5. Saigon Opera House (7 mins): Great for catching a cultural show or simply enjoying the stunning architecture.6. Shopping malls (Vincom Center, Takashimaya – 5–10 mins): High-end brands, cinemas, and dining options.7. Local convenience: 24/7 convenience stores, supermarkets, pharmacies, spas, ATMs, and banks within 2–5 minutes’ walk.🚖 Transportation:Easy access to taxis, Grab, and buses for exploring the entire city.About 20 minutes by car to Tan Son Nhat International Airport.🏙️ Atmosphere:The Bason neighborhood strikes a unique balance: lively yet sophisticated, bustling during the day but calm and safe at night. Whether you want to explore Saigon’s energetic streets or unwind on a quiet riverside walk, you’re perfectly situated here.🍽️ Dining & Nightlife:The area is packed with dining choices, from famous Vietnamese eateries to Michelin-guide restaurants, rooftop bars with panoramic views, and cozy cafés along the river.🎨 Culture & Experience:Museums, art galleries, and historic landmarks are within easy reach, giving you endless opportunities to immerse yourself in the rich history and vibrant contemporary culture of Ho Chi Minh City.Other things to note1📱 Internet & Work: High-speed Wi-Fi available throughout the villa, perfect for remote work or streaming.🧺 Housekeeping: Cleaning service every 2 days included for stays over 3 nights. Daily cleaning available upon request (extra fee).🚪 Access: Private villa entrance with smart lock; guests have 100% exclusive access to all amenities.🚖 Airport transfers: Private airport pickup/drop-off can be arranged with advance notice (additional cost).🐾 Pets: Small pets allowed on request; please notify us when booking.👶 Families with kids: Baby cot and high chair can be provided upon request.🎉 Events: Small gatherings for registered guests are allowed; loud parties with outside visitors are not permitted without prior approval.🔇 Quiet hours: Please respect neighbors by keeping noise down after 11 PM.💧 Water supply: Complimentary bottled water provided on arrival; tap water is not drinkable.🛎️ Support: Our team is available 24/7 by phone or message for assistance or local recommendations.💼 Luggage: Early check-in or late check-out may be arranged if possible; luggage storage may available upon request.🚘 Parking: Free parking for 1–2 cars on premises; please inform us if you plan to bring vehicles.

title: 4-bed Penthouse in D1 by Palace - Bitexco View
description: Enjoy nearly 360 degree panoramic views of iconic landmarks from our 180-square-meter penthouse. Whether it's the Independence Palace, the Landmark 81, or the Bitexco Tower, each view is a testament to the city's charm.Unwind in comfort with your friends and loved ones, surrounded by the vibrant energy of Saigon. Allow us to curate your experience according to your preferences and desires, ensuring every moment exceeds your expectations. Get in touch today to begin your unforgettable getaway.The spaceSailing Tower was Saigon’s first modern high-rise, built in 2010— it’s not your typical new-build filled with identical condos. While the exterior may show its age, the apartments we manage here are spacious, clean, and thoughtfully maintained. If you're after comfort, character, and the best location in the city, this is your spot. Prefer something sleek and shiny? We’ve got those too—but Sailing Tower is all about soul and spaceThe 180 sqm apartment plus balcony is spacious and perfect for friends, couples, families, and business guests. There are four bedrooms, of which two have en-suite bathroom, a home gym and wellness room, a large living room, and a dining space overlooking the city of Saigon.We warmly welcome you to a home where you can relax after a full day exploring the city. Our guests will enjoy:- Spacious & private bedrooms, furnished with King/Queen beds, comfortable mattresses and pillows, 100% cotton bed linens- Three bathrooms with all travel essentials: shampoo, conditioner, soap, hair dryer, and large bath towels. - Six Air Conditioning units throughout the apartment to ensure comfort- Large LED Smart TVs with free access to local and international TV channels, YouTube & Netflix enabled- A fitness room where you can practice yoga, meditation, cycling and weight-lifting - A home office for those who miss work while traveling- Fully equipped kitchen with gas stove, electric oven, microwave, dishwasher, fridge and freezer- Nescafe coffee maker & drinking water (so we can all reduce the use of plastic bottles!)- En-suite Washer and Dryer, iron & iron boardAt Homes By IDG (I Do Good), we prioritize your needs above all else. With a range of properties across Saigon, we strive to cater to every requirement our guests may have. Just send us a message!Guest accessThe apartment is on a high floor of a mix-used commercial and residential building, as such it is very safe and well maintained. Our guests will have exclusive access to the whole apartment and shared amenities of Sailing Tower, plus:- Other services available upon request: airport transfer, daily housekeeping, currency exchange, grocery delivery, car/bike rental- 24/7 security on the ground floor- Secured building with surveillance cameras in the lobby and hallway, heat detectors, hard-wired smoke alarms and a computer controlled access system- Amenities access can be restricted based on last minute building maintenance / repairs or condominium policy changesOther things to note•	Airport Pick-up/Drop-offAvailable 24/7. We can’t wait to host you!★★ BEDROOMS ★★Each luxurious en-suite bedroom features elegant furnishings, comfortable bedding, plenty of storage space, and ample natural light, creating a serene sanctuary for relaxing after a long day of working or exploring the local attractions. ✹ Primary bedroom: King-sized bed, Smart TV, dedicated work desk, private balcony, ensuite bathroom✹ Second bedroom: King-sized bed, ensuite bathroom, window, dedicated work desk✹ Third bedroom: Queen-sized bed, bathroom located next door, window, dedicated work desk✔ Brand new & comfortable mattresses and pillows ✔ 100% cotton bed linens✔ Room-darkening shades★★ BATHROOMS ★★The bathrooms are designed with luxury and relaxation in mind. Featuring real marble and sleek, modern finishes, each bathroom offers a spa-like experience with high-quality fixtures and ample space to freshen up. Essential toiletries and fresh towels are provided for your convenience.✹ Bathroom 1 (ensuite to the primary bedroom): Large single vanity, shower and bathtub✹ Bathroom 2: (ensuite to the second bedroom) Large single vanity, walk-in shower✹ Bathroom 3: (lower level next to the third bedroom) Large single vanity, walk-in shower✔ Fresh Large towels✔ Shampoo, conditioner, and body/hand wash✔ Hair dryer★★ KITCHEN & DINING ★★The sophisticated kitchen is fully equipped with new appliances, perfect for preparing delicious meals during your stay (when you’re not trying one of the many restaurants nearby). ✔ Full-size fridge and freezer✔ Stainless steel oven and stove✔ Microwave✔ Nescafe machine and kettle✔ Rice cooker ✔ Al fresco - dining table for 6★★ LIVING ROOM ★★The tone of this luxurious building is set from when you walk into the beautiful lobby. The duplex offers a spacious living area with plenty of room for your group to relax. Lounge on the elegant furniture, watch some TV, or plan your next excursion in the city.✔ Comfortable sofas✔ 65" Smart TV✔ Super fast wifi✔ Private balcony access★★ OUTDOOR SPACE ★★The inviting balcony with its own pool offers your own private oasis. Step outside to unwind and take in the sun while you sip hot coffee or a cool cocktail. Ready for some more activity? Head for a refreshing swim in the infinity pool, work out in the gym, or relax in the steam or sauna room. ✔ Private balcony with comfortable furnishings and your own pool!✔ Shared outdoor infinity pool and gym/steam room/sauna★★ ACTIVITIES/ATTRACTIONS ★★There are numerous exciting activities to enjoy in Saigon, and our home offers the perfect base for exploring. From famous attractions to exploring the cultural scene, you'll find plenty of options to suit your interests. Here are some thrilling activities waiting for you during your stay:✔ Cultural and Historical Attractions:The War Remnants Museum offers a poignant look at Vietnam’s history through extensive exhibits on the Vietnam War. The Independence Palace, a significant historical site, played a crucial role during that era. Don't miss the Saigon Notre-Dame Cathedral Basilica, a stunning example of French colonial architecture and an iconic symbol of the city's heritage.✔ Dining and Shopping:Discover the vibrant atmosphere of Ben Thanh Market, where you can shop for local goods, souvenirs, and enjoy delicious street food. Head to Saigon Square for trendy clothing and accessories at bargain prices. For a more upscale experience, explore Dong Khoi Street, lined with high-end boutiques, art galleries, and chic cafes, offering a sophisticated shopping experience in the heart of the city.All these activities and more are within your reach when you book with us!★☆ Reserve Your Dates Now – The Perfect Getaway Awaits! ☆★Guest access✹ PARKING:  There is paid parking available on-site✹ WORK FROM HOME: There is fast wifi available throughout the apartment plus TWO dedicated work desks✹ FAMILY: Traveling with little ones? We’ve got you covered with a few supplies including a Pack ’n play/travel crib, highchair, and babysitter recommendations, available for rent/upon request.✹ NO PETS: We have a no-pet policy due to allergies.✹ SERVICES: We offer our guests personalized services including airport transfer, housekeeping, currency exchange, grocery delivery, car & bike rental + tour packages✹ LARGER GROUPS: Whether you're traveling with a large group or seeking alternative dates, our wide variety of properties can accommodate your needs.Other things to note•	Airport Pick-up/Drop-offAvailable 24/7. Please notify us in advance to arrange this service. •	HousekeepingFor stays of 5 nights or longer, enjoy complimentary housekeeping every 2-3 days, including surfaces cleaning and changing towels. If you’d like fresh sheets and a full cleaning service, please contact us for pricing. Daily housekeeping is also available upon request. •	Fresh TowelsEach guest receives 2 sets of bath and hand towels plus 1 pool towel. Towels are changed during housekeeping. For fresh towels in between, use the ensuite washer/dryer or contact us for pricing. •	Early Check-InEarly check-in is available (2 PM instead of 4 PM) if the apartment is ready. For arrivals before 11 AM, please contact us about booking the previous night for a special offer.•	Late Check-OutIf available, we offer up to 2 extra hours past our 11 AM check-out policy. A half-day fee applies after 1 PM, and full day charges start at 5 PM.•	Luggage StorageArriving early? You can drop off your luggage at 12 PM upon availability. Departing late? We can store your luggage until 2 PM, upon availability. Let us know in advance for smooth arrangements.•	Pre-arrival Prior to your stay, we require you to complete and sign our rental conditions.
