title: Elegant Retreat | High-floor Duplex Private Pool
description: Experience a stay in the heart of Saigon where luxury, privacy, comfort & convenience meet. Our spacious duplex apartment features amazing sunset views of the city, a private pool on deck, access to amenities such as an infinity rooftop pool, gym and sauna. Located next to the Japanese Embassy, our guests enjoy easy access to iconic landmarksBen Thanh Market - 8 min driveWar Remnants Museum - 8 min walkNotre Dame Cathedral - 5 min driveBook For Lasting Memories — See Details BelowThe space☆☆ HIGHLIGHTS ☆☆✹ 1,400-square-foot duplex apartment (130m2), unobstructed view of the sunset and city✹ 2 spacious bedrooms; 1 king, 1 queen✹ 2 full en-suite bathrooms; 1 half bathroom on the main floor: modern finishes, marble throughout✹ Private small pool in the balcony – your own oasis in the city✹ Al fresco dining - open floor plan w/ large windows + natural sunlight✹ Fully equipped kitchen w/ stainless appliances✹ Bright living room w/ stylish decor✹ Smart TV + free wifi✹ Washer + dryer + dishwasher✹ Central A/C and Heating✹ Exclusive access to shared gym, sauna, infinity rooftop pool✹ 24/7 security guardsEager to Read More?Here Are A Few Kind Words from Some Of Our Guests:“Incredible stay and location and what a beautiful apartment! Amazing stay and host, will come here again for sure. Best airbnb we stayed in, in all of Vietnam!" - Fayana“Nice, clean and big space for the three of us. Located in a quieter part of district 3, so close enough to all the main attractions but far enough out to get a quiet nights sleep. Would recommend if you are looking to stay somewhere modern close to the center of town.” - Yiltan💙 Like what you see? Save our listing! Click the heart (❤️) on the top right to add it to your favourites—so you can easily find us when you're ready to book. We can’t wait to host you!★★ BEDROOMS ★★Each luxurious en-suite bedroom features elegant furnishings, comfortable bedding, plenty of storage space, and ample natural light, creating a serene sanctuary for relaxing after a long day of working or exploring the local attractions. ✹ Primary bedroom: King-sized bed, Smart TV, dedicated work desk, private balcony, ensuite bathroom✹ Second bedroom: Queen-sized bed, ensuite bathroom, floor-to-ceiling windows.✔ Comfortable mattresses and pillows✔ 100% cotton bed linens✔ Room-darkening shades★★ BATHROOMS ★★The bathrooms are designed with luxury and relaxation in mind. Featuring real marble and sleek, modern finishes, each bathroom offers a spa-like experience with high-quality fixtures and ample space to freshen up. Essential toiletries and fresh towels are provided for your convenience.✹ Bathroom 1 (ensuite to the primary bedroom): Large single vanity, shower and bathtub✹ Bathroom 2: (ensuite to the second bedroom) Large single vanity, walk-in shower✹ Bathroom 3: (lower level where the open plan living/dining room is) Single vanity✔ Fresh towels✔ Shampoo, conditioner, and body/hand wash✔ Hair dryer★★ KITCHEN & DINING ★★The sophisticated kitchen is fully equipped with new appliances, perfect for preparing delicious meals during your stay (when you’re not trying one of the many restaurants nearby). ✔ Full-size fridge and freezer✔ Stainless steel oven and stove✔ Microwave✔ Dish Washer✔ Nescafe machine and kettle✔ Rice cooker ✔ Al fresco - dining table for 6★★ LIVING ROOM ★★The tone of this luxurious building is set from when you walk into the beautiful lobby. The duplex offers a spacious living area with plenty of room for your group to relax. Lounge on the elegant furniture, watch some TV, or plan your next excursion in the city.✔ Comfortable sofas✔ Smart TV✔ Free wifi✔ Private balcony access★★ OUTDOOR SPACE ★★The inviting balcony with its own pool offers your own private oasis. Step outside to unwind and take in the sun while you sip hot coffee or a cool cocktail. Ready for some more activity? Head for a refreshing swim in the infinity pool, work out in the gym, or relax in the steam or sauna room. ✔ Private balcony with comfortable furnishings and your own small pool!✔ Shared outdoor infinity pool and gym/steam room/sauna★★ ACTIVITIES/ATTRACTIONS ★★There are numerous exciting activities to enjoy in Saigon, and our home offers the perfect base for exploring. From famous attractions to exploring the cultural scene, you'll find plenty of options to suit your interests. Here are some thrilling activities waiting for you during your stay:✔ Cultural and Historical Attractions:The War Remnants Museum offers a poignant look at Vietnam’s history through extensive exhibits on the Vietnam War. The Independence Palace, a significant historical site, played a crucial role during that era. Don't miss the Saigon Notre-Dame Cathedral Basilica, a stunning example of French colonial architecture and an iconic symbol of the city's heritage.✔ Dining and Shopping:Discover the vibrant atmosphere of Ben Thanh Market, where you can shop for local goods, souvenirs, and enjoy delicious street food. Head to Saigon Square for trendy clothing and accessories at bargain prices. For a more upscale experience, explore Dong Khoi Street, lined with high-end boutiques, art galleries, and chic cafes, offering a sophisticated shopping experience in the heart of the city.All these activities and more are within your reach when you book with us!★☆ Reserve Your Dates Now – The Perfect Getaway Awaits! ☆★Guest access✹ PARKING:  There is paid parking available on-site✹ WORK FROM HOME: There is fast wifi available throughout the apartment plus a height-adjustable desk✹ FAMILY: Traveling with little ones? We’ve got you covered with a few supplies including a Pack ’n play/travel crib, highchair, and babysitter recommendations, available for rent/upon request.✹ NO PETS: We have a no-pet policy due to allergies.✹ SERVICES: We offer our guests personalized services including airport transfer, housekeeping, currency exchange, grocery delivery, car & bike rental + tour packages✹ LARGER GROUPS: Whether you're traveling with a large group or seeking alternative dates, our wide variety of properties can accommodate your needs.Other things to note•	Airport Pick-up/Drop-offAvailable 24/7. Please notify us in advance to arrange this service. •	HousekeepingFor stays of 4 nights or longer, enjoy complimentary housekeeping every other day, including surfaces cleaning and towels change. If you’d like to include fresh sheets and a full cleaning service, please contact us for pricing. Daily housekeeping is also available upon request. •	Fresh TowelsEach guest receives 2 sets of bath and hand towels plus 1 pool towel. Towels are changed during housekeeping. For fresh towels in between, use the ensuite washer/dryer or contact us for pricing. •	Early Check-InEarly check-in is available (2 PM instead of 4 PM) if the apartment is ready. For arrivals before 11 AM, please contact us about booking the previous night for a special offer.•	Late Check-OutIf available, we offer up to 2 extra hours past our 11 AM check-out policy. A half-day fee applies after 1 PM, and full day charges start at 5 PM.•	Luggage StorageArriving early? You can drop off your luggage at 12 PM upon availability. Departing late? We can store your luggage until 2 PM, upon availability. Let us know in advance for smooth arrangements.•	Pre-arrival Prior to your stay, we require you to complete and sign our rental conditions.

Separate bathroom with modern Gessi shower set and premium Axent automatic toilet upgrade.2nd Master Bedroom (20m²): Royal space with 1m8x2m King bed high independent bag spring mattress 24cm with topper (worth 2500 usd). Especially this Master room with private balcony with direct view of the highest building in Ho Chi Minh City is Lanmark 81, The Hallmark office building, The Galleria, villa area and Bason bridge Private bathroom with full high-end equipment.3rd and 4th Single Bedroom: A masterpiece with a king bed 1m8x2m (worth 2000 usd), a wide wardrobe as a treasure, and the view is similar to the 2nd master bedroom.Amenities That Goes Beyond ImaginationThe corner apartment on the 1x floor owns the private lobby and elevator PL.B06 up to the house, providing the ultimate isolation. In the meantime, you may use the ensuite washer/dryer to keep them fresh during your stay. * Early Check-InIf the apartment is available, you are welcome to enjoy 2 hours of early check-in (i.e. at 2PM instead of 4PM). Guests who arrive in the morning before 11AM are encouraged to book the night before, reach out to us for special offer for the additional night.* Late Check-OutIf the apartment is available, we can offer up to 2 hours later than our policy of 11AM. From the 3rd hour, we will charge half day till 5pm and full day from 5pm onward* Luggage StorageIf your flight arrives earlier than check-in time, you can drop off luggage at 12PM. If your flight leaves later than check-out time, we can help to keep your luggage until 2:00PM. Please let us know in advance so we can make necessary arrangementsIf you encounter any issues with the apartment, require additional items, or are having trouble finding something in your new home, don't hesitate to reach out to us. We're here to help! Your comfort and satisfaction are our priorities.Furthermore, if you have any suggestions on how we can enhance our service quality, please share them with us. We're dedicated to continually learning and improving based on our guests' feedback. Your input is invaluable to us!

title: New! Ben Thanh Luxe Retreat–4BR Complex Central D1
description: ✨Stay in the heart of Saigon’s heritage, just steps from the iconic Ben Thanh Market.Our home offers the perfect mix of history and modern comfort — close to top attractions and local dining, yet tucked away for peace and privacy.Experience the true spirit of Saigon, where vibrant city life meets serene retreat.The space✨Exploring Ben Thanh Market is a must when visiting Ho Chi Minh City.As the city’s iconic landmark, it showcases century-old French architecture and the vibrant local spirit. The market and its surrounding streets offer everything you can imagine — from local food, fruits, seafood, clothes, cosmetics, and handicrafts to cozy cafés, massage shops, and street food stalls.✨Situated right in front of Ben Thanh Market’s west gate, this historic house once belonged to the famous Saigonese millionaire Hui Bon Hoa. Thanks to its prime location, you’ll find all essential amenities just steps away — convenience stores, restaurants, cafés, and more.Recently refurbished, the house blends heritage charm with modern comfort: preserved brick walls, a spacious skylight, and full contemporary facilities. Here, you’ll experience the character of history and the comfort of modern living — in a space that’s both exciting and private.Guest access▪️Located right on the GROUND floor so it's suitable for even elderly and children▪️Daikin Air-conditioner in every spaceThe whole space is a complex of 02 separate units:✨UNIT no.01A cozy and stylish home featuring a bright living room with a long sofa, 70-inch Smart TV, fireplace, work desk, and skylight lobby. The two bedrooms include one queen bed and one king bed with premium 25cm mattresses and full cotton bedding. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen with stove, microwave, washer, and dryer, plus a dining area, bathroom, and a relaxing patio/balcony with high chairs and table.✨UNIT no.03Spacious and elegant, this unit offers a modern living room with double sofa bed, single sofa, 55-inch Smart TV (Netflix), fireplace, and skylight. The master bedroom has two king beds, an en-suite bathroom with bathtub and shower, while the second bedroom features a queen bed and 50-inch TV. The full kitchen includes an oven, washer, and dryer. Enjoy dining indoors or unwind on the patio with a serene sky garden.✨Benefits provided:+) Free laundry+) Free towel, shampoo, shower gel, bed sheet, toothbrush+) Free WiFi+) Free Netflix+) Free welcome water+) Reasonable pick-up private car for 2 ways ( Modern clean car: Peugeot 3008, Mitsubishi Xpander, Honda Civic, Mazda3, Mazda 6, Chevrolet Colorado, etc...)Other things to note1️⃣ Please confirm us your check-in time in advance.2️⃣ Check-in: 2PM | Check-out: 11AM (early/late upon request, subject to availability)3️⃣ Door code for self-check-in will be provided on check-in day4️⃣ Passport photo required before check-in5️⃣ No parties or illegal activities6️⃣ If possible, please water the plants in the morning (before 11 AM) or afternoon (after 4 PM) — they’ll love it! 💧

title: Family Retreat in TWO apartments w Rooftop Pool
description: Start your trip right by staying at our homes in District 1 managed by our experienced  host team with more than 2000 reviews. Security: The building has 24/7 security guards, surveillance cameras in the lobby and hallway, heat detectors, hard-wired smoke alarms, and a computer-controlled access systemPersonalized services offered by our team: airport transfer, housekeeping, currency exchange, grocery delivery, car & bike rental, tour packagesOther things to note•	Airport Pick-up/Drop-offAvailable 24/7. We can also order new towels for you for a small fee per set if you'd like more frequent change of towels without having to wash them yourselves.•	Early Check-InEarly check-in is available (2 PM instead of 4 PM) if the apartment is ready. For arrivals before 11 AM, please contact us about booking the previous night for a special offer.•	Late Check-OutIf available, we offer up to 2 extra hours past our 11 AM check-out policy. title: Saigon Riverside Eco - Retreat - 4 BR
description: Escape to Birdy Home Saigon, a unique riverside eco-villa surrounded by lush greenery along the Dong Nai River. This private 1,500m² retreat blends nature and luxury, offering families and friends a peaceful getaway in Saigon’s green oasis. Book the entire property for an unforgettable eco-luxury experience, with full modern amenities, an infinity pool, and serene gardens. Relax in style, immerse yourself in birdsong, and enjoy the ultimate privacy.The space🌞 Have a nice day, dear guest!• You’re probably curious about what’s inside this villa, where it’s located, and why it could be the perfect choice for your next getaway.• Let me walk you through all the details below!🌿 This villa has 4 bedrooms. From the outside, you’ll notice the place is spacious, with an airy facade and a simple, modern design. The surrounding area is peaceful and filled with greenery, creating a relaxing and pleasant atmosphere. From the moment you arrive, you’ll feel like you’ve found a gentle and comfortable retreat.👨‍👩‍👦‍👦 It’s an ideal choice for a group of close friends or a large family seeking a private, cozy, and well-equipped space to unwind, gather, or simply enjoy quality time together. With multiple bedrooms and a spacious shared living area, everyone can enjoy both privacy and connection.🍳 The kitchen is fully equipped, allowing you to cook your own meals and enjoy them just like at home. Everything you need is ready — you just have to arrive and start enjoying your stay.🏊‍♂️ After a day of exploring or hanging out with friends, what could be better than cooling off in the villa’s private swimming pool? Clean and always ready, it’s the perfect spot to unwind at any time.Guest access🛋️ The living room is a place for people to gather and chat comfortably together. The space is spacious, airy, and has a stable air conditioner, making you comfortable even on hot days. The sofa is soft and wide, suitable for lying down, chatting or watching TV with family and friends. The TV here has Netflix and YouTube, you just need to log in to your account to watch movies and listen to music as you like. We have also prepared clean indoor slippers for you to use as soon as you enter, keeping the space neat and comfortable.🍳 Right next to the living room is the kitchen area - where you can comfortably cook like you are at home. The kitchen is fully equipped with modern appliances such as induction cooker, range hood, large refrigerator, rice cooker, microwave, and basic cooking utensils. Whether you want to cook a simple breakfast or prepare a full meal for the whole group, this kitchen space can meet your needs. Everything is clean, easy to use and neatly arranged so you don't have to spend a lot of time searching.🍽️ The dining area is spacious, with enough space for 10 people to sit comfortably, very suitable for family meals or group gatherings. The cozy, intimate atmosphere makes the meal more intimate and fun.🏊‍♂️ Outside is a large, clean swimming pool with a constantly operating water filtration system. This is the ideal place for you to soak and relax after a long day of traveling or exploring the city. Whether it's a cool morning or a quiet evening, you can fully enjoy this private space - no need to go out, no need to share with anyone else.🛏️ Each bedroom is fully prepared to make you feel comfortable like you're at home. The spacious king bed allows you to stretch out and rest comfortably, and the private air conditioning keeps the space cool and comfortable. There is also a small, pretty dressing table for you to prepare every day. The space is simple, neat but cozy enough for you to truly relax.🚿 The bathroom in each room has a shower and a hot and cold water system for both the hand wash and the shower. The water is carefully filtered, ensuring cleanliness and safety when used. Necessary personal hygiene products such as shower gel, shampoo, hand sanitizer, etc. are prepared, along with clean towels in each room.🌀 There is a separate laundry area, where you can comfortably wash and dry your clothes during your stay. The washing machine and dryer are fully equipped, helping you always have clean clothes every day.Other things to note🕑 Check-in / Check-out time:+ Check-in time: 14:00+ Check-out time: 11:00+ Early check-in / late check-out subject to room availability.​🛂 Please send your passport & visa/stamp photo at check-in (required by law). Info is confidential.🎥 I have installed a security camera outside the entrance for your safety. If you are not comfortable, please let me know and I will turn it off immediately.🐞 There are no bed bugs, mosquitoes or cockroaches in the house, but in the tropical climate of Viet Nam, sometimes mosquitoes or cockroaches can enter when the door is open. Please close the door when going out to avoid them.🚭 No smoking in the villa.🔒 Please protect your personal belongings.👉 THINGS TO DO IN BIRDY HOMENestled in the vibrant and fast-growing Long Phuoc area, Villa Birdy Home offers a perfect blend of convenience and cultural immersion. With easy access to transportation, your adventure in Thu Duc’s dynamic shopping, dining, and cultural scene begins right here.🛍️ Modern Shopping:* Vincom Mega Mall Grand Park (10 minutes): Explore 50,000m² of retail with over 120 international brands.* Vincom Plaza Le Van Viet (20 minutes): Enjoy seven floors of diverse shopping, dining, and entertainment.🍷 International and Vietnamese Cuisine (10 minutes away), Savor a world of flavors near Villa Birdy Home:* Global Dining: Indulge in Sushi Vinroll (Japanese), GoGi House (Korean BBQ buffet), Chilli Thai, Pizza 4P’s (Italian-Vietnamese fusion), or Kichi Kichi (conveyor belt hot pot).* Authentic Vietnamese: Try Pho Thin for Hanoi-style pho, An Hoa & Duyen Mai for spicy Bun Bo Hue, Thang Long Quan for Cha Ca La Vong (Hanoi grilled fish), or Duyen Ngo for fresh spring rolls and vermicelli.🎭 Local Cultural Experiences (10 minutes away)* Long Phuoc Market: Immerse yourself in daily local life and sample authentic street food.* Grand Park Night Market: Discover 160 stalls with vibrant street art performances.🏯 Must-Visit Attractions* Ao Dai Museum (5-10 minutes): A “Mini Hoi An” showcasing Vietnam’s iconic traditional dresses.* Buu Long Pagoda (20 minutes): One of the world’s top 10 most beautiful Buddhist sites, as recognized by National Geographic.* Suoi Tien Cultural Park (15-20 minutes): A globally beloved theme park with over 150 attractions.✨ Villa Birdy Home is your gateway to Thu Duc’s rich culture, diverse cuisine, and modern conveniences. Whether you’re seeking global flavors, local traditions, or spiritual landmarks, everything is just minutes away. We’re here to guide you with personalized recommendations for attractions and dining to make your stay unforgettable.

title: GRAND 6BR 500m² SKY VILLA for wonderful trip/byRAY
description: From the moment I stepped into this 500m² penthouse, I was determined to make it the most luxurious, modern Airbnb in Thao Dien. With Italian interiors, soaring ceilings, a private rooftop, large pool, gym, BBQ area, and kids’ play zone, this 6-bedroom, 1-entertainment room haven offers 5-star comfort. Above a vibrant mall, near unique dining and the serene Saigon River, it’s the perfect spot for families and groups to book instantly and feel thrilled with their stay.The spaceWhy You’ll Love This Skyvilla?•  Sprawling 3-Story Penthouse: One of Saigon’s largest at 500m², offering expansive, luxurious living space.•  Prime Thao Dien Location: Nestled in the heart of Thao Dien, surrounded by Saigon’s finest restaurants, upscale bars, and premium cafes.•  Exquisite Italian Design: High-end Italian furniture and modern interiors for an elegant experience.•  Five Luxurious Bedrooms: Each designed to 5-star standards with stunning Saigon River views.•  Dedicated Work & Play Spaces: An entertainment room for productivity and fun.•  Cinematic Experience: 200-inch projector and high-fidelity music room.•  Private Rooftop Retreat: Unwind with a private BBQ garden and breathtaking city vistas.•  Premium Amenities: 75-inch large-screen TV and a state-of-the-art modern kitchen.•  Exclusive Services: Optional private chef and premium limousine airport transfers (additional fees).•  Dedicated Staff Space: Separate maid’s room for added convenience.Guest accessThe Penthouse  offers a range of premium in-house amenities exclusively for its residents. Here’s what you can enjoy:Swimming Pools: The complex features a family pool and a dedicated children’s pool designed as an Olympic-standard infinity edge. With a length of 50 meters and views overlooking lush gardens, these pools provide an excellent environment for relaxation and fitness.Shopping Center: The in-house shopping center adds convenience for residents, offering a variety of retail and dining options within easy reach.Surrounding AmenitiesThe project is surrounded by a remarkable array of entertainment, cultural, and shopping facilities, including:World-Class Educational Institutions: Renowned schools such as International School Ho Chi Minh City, ACG School, and British International School are nearby. Additionally, you’ll find Hibs Thảo Điền, IPS International School, and Saigon Star SSIS, ensuring excellent educational opportunities for your children.Entertainment and Cultural Facilities: The area offers a vibrant selection of entertainment and artistic amenities. Notable spots include Metro supermarket, An Nam Gourmet, and An Phú supermarket. Shoppers can also enjoy the Parkson shopping center, An Phú cinema, and Co.opMart, providing a diverse shopping experience.This diverse range of amenities enhances your living experience, making the project a prime choice for families and professionals alike.Other things to noteLocated in An Phú, Thảo Điền, our penthouse offers a unique lifestyle in the heart of Saigon’s vibrant international community. Surrounded by top-tier restaurants and picturesque spots, you’ll enjoy a rare blend of luxury, culture, and serenity. Special rates available for long-term stays—contact us for details!

title: City skyline at dawn-Penthouse The One SaiGon 197
description: Modern loft, well-equipped and spacious apartment literally just a few steps from Ben Thanh Market. Everything you need is nearby. Explore every nook and cranny of this uniquely beautiful city, you are at city's heart.The space"YOUR HOME AWAY FROM HOME"This PENTHOUSE apartment is located on the 19th floor of Ben Thanh Tower (another name: The One Saigon serviced apartment) and is equipped with everything you need for an enjoyable stay:- High Floor Apartment with City View - QUEEN BED - SIZE is firm, comfortable- KITCHEN with dining table, complete kitchen equipment- EN-SUITE BATHROOM includes hot water, shower, mirror, towels, soap, toilet paper, shampoo, and hairdryer- You also have a WASHING MACHINE for your laundry; we prepare an iron and ironing board and clothes drying rack - Free Wi-Fi, cable TV, and coffee & tea.- Kitchen with dining table, induction cooker, microwave, refrigerator, storage, cooking pans, glasses, plates, and utensils.A modern, fully furnished, and spacious building just a few minutes from Ben Thanh market, with great views overlooking the city center.Everything you need is nearby. Enjoy a wonderful day in the sun, explore every nook and cranny of this uniquely beautiful city, visit France's magnificent historical architects, find a cafe to drop in, and then always come back and feel at home.Guest accessGuests have 24/7 access to the building, including:- Check in at reception, please present your passport/ID card with the same name as the reservation- The building has two gates, main gate at 45 Dang Thi Nhu Street- Reception works from 07:00 to 19:00 daily- There is a security guard in the lobby to support you 24/7. Security guards are ready to communicate with you and can talk to you through the gogle translate tool, If you need help, don't hesitate to talk with them- The building has three lifts that our guests can use- GREAT ROOFTOP POOL with a direct city view. The pool area on the 21st floor is ready to use from 6:00 to 21:00 daily.- The fitness club on the mezzanine floor is open from 6:00 to 12:00 and from 13:00 to 22:00 (12:00 to 13:00 closed for cleaning)- The lobby has many chairs, so guests can rest while waiting for check-in or check out- Guests can leave their suite case at the front desk and take it before 20:00@another note: ***NO SMOKING in the room. Smokers could ONLY smoke on the balcony.***Animals are not accepted into the building.We can support you to set up a small, cozy party in apartment ( birthday, honeymoon or aniversary,...) with food and beverage, depending on your needs.Other things to noteUnlike many other spaces in Ho Chi Minh City, guests have no curfew. You can walk in and out as you please and take advantage of the other facilities in the building, such as the gym, poolThe building also has other advantages:* Di Mai restaurant on the ground floor serves a Vietnamese fusion menu.* You can also use the rooftop swimming pool. The swimming pool is open to you from 6:00 am to 9:00 pm.* Gym on the M floor is also a favorite place of our customersWe offer several fee-based services such as:1. Airport pick-up/drop-off service to help you enjoy the door-to-door transfer service $16-$25 /way depending on guest's arrival time (we recommend this service if this is the first-time visiting Ho Chi Minh City)2 / NO DAILY CLEANING, we will free cleaning every 3 days,the cleaning fee is $30 each time (including linen change). Towels will be provided for free if you need more, please consider when using them to save the environment.Please note that you will have to pay for bed linen, and towels if they are stained with blood, lipstick, and mascara according to the price list in the room3/Extra floor mattress/Extra bed: to prepare an additional floor mattress, remember to register the number of guests. Relax and enjoy the state-of-the-art entertainment system, or unwind with a book in your serene private space.This apartment is part of a premium residence, offering an array of high-end amenities. Enjoy the rooftop swimming pool, upscale gym, relaxing sauna, children’s play area, and a grand lobby that welcomes you home.Guest accessGuests have full access to all apartment facilities and shared amenities:Rooftop Pool: Dive into our pool with panoramic city views.Gym & Sauna: Stay fit and relax with top-tier equipment and wellness options.Children’s Play Area: Perfect for families with young ones.Luxury Lobby: Experience a grand entrance every time you return.Other things to noteThis apartment is ideally suited for those wishing to immerse themselves in the vibrant life of Saigon. Enjoy the charm of Thi Sách Street, with its array of exquisite dining options inspired by Local and International cuisine. As a resident in the heart of the city, you’re just moments away from the bustling energy of cafes, shops, and cultural landmarks. Discover why District 1 is the perfect place for your next adventure.

title: Penthouse Duplex in District 1 - Pool & Gym
description: Enjoy a peaceful escape at our Duplex Penthouse with a stunning view of Saigon. An oasis in a bustling city, our Penthouse offers a secure and family-friendly environment, just a 5-minute taxi ride from Ben Thanh Market and Bui Vien Street.Relax in our new luxury Penthouse featuring plush new beds, fresh linens & a dedicated host team. We warmly welcome you to a home where you can relax after a full day exploring the city:-  Two King Sized Bedrooms with Ensuite Bathrooms on the First Floor and a separate Queen Sized Bedroom with a Full Bathroom on the Duplex Ground Floor ensure separation and comfort for all guests. - Brand new & Comfortable mattresses, pillows with 100% cotton bed linens- All travel essentials for light travelers: shampoo, conditioner, soap, hair dryer- Large bath towels- Three Large Smart TVs with access to local and international TV channels, Netflix, YouTube and Chromecast Access- Fully equipped kitchen with glass top stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, electric kettle, fridge and freezer- Nescafe espresso maker and drinking water (so we can all reduce the use of plastic bottles!)- Washer, dryer, iron & iron boardAt Homes By IDG (I Do Good), we prioritize your needs above all else. Plus our dedicated team to assist you in:- Other services: airport transfer, daily housekeeping, currency exchange, food delivery, bike rental, luggage storage- Early Check-In and Late Check Out upon availability and with an additional fee- For late-night and early-morning arrival guests, please let us know if you request a grocery service, and we will stock the fridge for you- 24/7 security on the ground floor- Secured building with surveillance cameras in the lobby and hallway, heat detectors, hard-wired smoke alarms, and a computer-controlled access system- Amenities access can be restricted based on last minute building maintenance / repairs, in which case, we are committed to promptly communicate the maintenance schedule to you once we are informed by the building management teamOther things to note•	Airport Pick-up/Drop-offAvailable 24/7. We can also order new towels for you for a small fee per set if you'd like more frequent change of towels without having to wash them yourselves.•	Early Check-InEarly check-in is available (2 PM instead of 4 PM) if the apartment is ready. For arrivals before 11 AM, please contact us about booking the previous night for a special offer.•	Late Check-OutIf available, we offer up to 2 extra hours past our 11 AM check-out policy. A half-day fee applies after 1 PM, and full day charges start at 5 PM.•	Luggage StorageArriving early? You can drop off your luggage at 12 PM. Departing late? We can store your luggage until 2 PM. title: The Saigon Escape: Modern 3BR, Central & Serene
description: Experience the best of HCMC from our prime District 1 home, just 5 minutes on foot from Ben Thanh Market and opposite Central Market & 23/9 Park. The neighborhood boasts fantastic shopping, a culinary journey through Indian & Vietnamese restaurants, and a well-equipped paid gym nearby. Our 3-bedroom house is a haven of light and air, meticulously designed for both luxury and a genuine local feel. It's the perfect spot to immerse yourself in Saigon's vibrant culture while enjoying calm comfort.The spaceExperience Saigon's Heart: Your Tranquil 3-Bedroom Oasis Steps to Ben Thanh MarketWelcome to your exceptionally private and peaceful haven, perfectly nestled in the vibrant pulse of Ho Chi Minh City's District 1! Discover the unique blend of absolute tranquility and unparalleled convenience, promising an unforgettable stay right in the true center of Saigon.📍 Unbeatable Prime Location: Downtown Delights at Your Doorstep!You'll be astonished by the profound quietness of our home, despite being mere steps away from the city's most iconic attractions. A short stroll (just 500 meters!) is all it takes to discover:-Ben Thanh Market: Saigon's iconic historical landmark, a bustling hub for unique souvenirs, local crafts, and incredible street food.-Bui Vien Walking Street: Experience the city's lively and famous nightlife – perfect for vibrant energy and entertainment.-Nguyen Hue Walking Street: A grand, modern boulevard ideal for leisurely strolls, people-watching, and admiring impressive architecture.-Metro Station: Providing quick and easy access to explore other fascinating parts of the city.-Directly Opposite September 23rd Park: Our house boasts a prime position directly opposite this lush, expansive public green space! Explore its unique Central Market (underground market) and dive into the diverse Asiana Food Town, where an endless array of local and international culinary delights await.🏠 Spacious & Artfully Designed LivingThis house reflects our passion, with every detail meticulously crafted to maximize natural light and ensure a refreshing, airy ambiance. Spanning a generous total area of 260m² across one ground floor, one mezzanine level, and three upper floors, our home offers incredibly spacious and comfortable living. It comfortably hosts up to 10 guests, ensuring privacy and convenience for everyone in your group.Thoughtful Architecture: Designed by an architecture enthusiast, every corner is bright, welcoming, and exudes understated elegance.Expansive Living Area: An ideal spot for relaxing, socializing, and gathering together after a day of exploration.🛏️ Your Comfort is Our Priority: 3 Private BedroomsWe've fully equipped our home to make you feel completely at ease, just like your own place, after a long day of city adventures:- 3 Private & Comfortable Bedrooms: Each room is thoughtfully arranged with high-quality beds to ensure a restful night's sleep for all.- Luxurious Master Sanctuary: Our highlight bedroom features an exceptionally spacious and modern ensuite bathroom, complete with a relaxing hot tub and an indulgent rainfall shower from the ceiling. It's the perfect escape to unwind and rejuvenate.- Total of 4 Modern Bathrooms: Providing ample convenience for all guests, complete with refreshing hot/cold showers.✨ Modern Amenities for a Seamless Stay-Fully Equipped Kitchen & Dining Area: Perfect for preparing your own meals or enjoying a leisurely breakfast.- High-Speed Wi-Fi Connection: Stay effortlessly connected to the world.- Full Air Conditioning System: Ensuring a cool and pleasant environment throughout your stay.- TV with YoutubeCome and experience unparalleled convenience, sophisticated living spaces, and rare tranquility right in the heart of Saigon. We can't wait to welcome you to your home away from home!Guest accessMake yourselves comfortable – the whole house is for your use.Other things to noteCheck-In:-Check-in time: 2 PM-Early check-in: Subject to availability. Please inform us in advance for consideration.Check-Out:-Check-out time: 11 AM-Late check-out: Subject to availability. Please inform us in advance for consideration.Self Check-In:To ensure a seamless arrival, kindly follow the guidelines in the arrival guide.Luggage Storage:Luggage storage is not guaranteed and requires prior notification.Passport Requirement:Please provide a copy of your passport upon check-in.Visitors:As part of our safety policy, bringing unregistered or unfamiliar guests to the property is not permitted.Prohibited Activities:Parties and illegal activities are strictly prohibited. Guests who violate these rules will be asked to leave.⛔️ WARNING:- Drugs and prostitution are strictly prohibited.- No smoking in your house (you can smoke outside the balcony)Extra Bedding:We can provide extra mattresses and pillows upon request. Please let us know in advance.🌟 🌟 🌟 Important Legal Requirements for Your Stay in Vietnam:(Please note: These are mandatory regulations set forth by Vietnamese State Law. We kindly request your full cooperation in providing the necessary information to ensure a comfortable and compliant stay for everyone in Vietnam.)👉 Prior to your arrival, please send clear photos of the passports or Vietnamese Citizen IDs (CCCD) for all guests in your party. This allows us to complete the required temporary residence registration in accordance with state regulations.👉 We rigorously enforce residence registration as our area is subject to administrative checks for temporary stays, public order control, and the prevention of social issues. With 4 bedrooms in total, you’ll have plenty of space to relax and enjoy your stay.	•	Bright Living Areas:The cozy living rooms are furnished with comfortable sofas, flat-screen TVs, and stylish accents, providing a perfect spot to unwind after a day of sightseeing.	•	Fully Equipped Kitchens:Each apartment comes with a modern kitchen, complete with an induction stove, microwave, refrigerator, and all necessary utensils, making it easy to prepare home-cooked meals or snacks.	•	Modern Bathrooms:Each bathroom features a rain shower, high-quality toiletries, and hot water, ensuring a spa-like experience.	•	Private Balconies:Enjoy the stunning views of the city from your own private balcony, a great place to sip your morning coffee or unwind in the evening.	•	Flexibility for Larger Groups:When you book both apartments, you’ll have a total of 4 bedrooms, 2 kitchens, 4 bathrooms, and 2 living rooms, offering plenty of space for everyone to relax and spend time together, with separate areas for privacy.Prime Location in District 1:	•	Perfect for Exploring Ho Chi Minh City:Situated in District 1, Zenity offers easy access to major attractions such as Nguyen Hue Walking Street (10 minutes), Ben Thanh Market (10 minutes), and the Bitexco Financial Tower (10 minutes).	•	River Views:The Saigon River is just minutes away, offering a serene escape from the city’s hustle and bustle, and ideal for a peaceful stroll or river cruise.	•	Restaurants & Cafes:The neighborhood is packed with trendy cafes, delicious local eateries, and vibrant nightlife, making it perfect for those who want to explore the culinary scene.Building Amenities:	•	Infinity Pool & BBQStay active or unwind in the infinity pool	•	BBQ Area & Green Spaces:Relax in the outdoor spaces or have a BBQ with friends and family in the designated area.	•	24/7 Security & Professional Management:Enjoy peace of mind with around-the-clock security and a dedicated management team ensuring your stay is seamless and comfortable.Why Choose This 4-Bedroom Option?This 4-bedroom apartment combination at Zenity is the perfect choice for larger groups or families who seek the convenience of shared space with the luxury of privacy. With its stylish design, prime location, and excellent amenities, your stay in Ho Chi Minh City will be unforgettable. Book now and enjoy a relaxing, comfortable, and luxurious stay in the heart of Saigon!Guest accessPremium Amenities at Zenity, District 1Located in the heart of District 1, Zenity offers a luxurious stay with top-tier amenities:	•	Infinity pool: Relax with panoramic views of the city.	•	Modern gym: Fully equipped to meet all your fitness needs.	•	Outdoor BBQ area: Perfect for cozy gatherings and parties.	•	Children’s play area: A safe and fun space for kids.	•	24/7 security and concierge services: Ensuring comfort and safety throughout your stay.Zenity is not just a place to stay—it’s a lifestyle. Book your apartment today to experience these exceptional amenities!Other things to notemportant Information for Your Stay at Zenity, District 1Thank you for choosing Zenity as your home away from home! To ensure a smooth and enjoyable stay, please take note of the following important details:1. Check-In and Check-Out Times	•	Check-in: After 3:00 PM.	•	Check-out: Before 12:00 PM.	•	If you need an early check-in or late check-out, please inform us in advance (additional fees may apply).2. Occupancy Rules	•	The apartment accommodates a maximum number of guests as specified in your booking.	•	Please notify us if there are additional guests. Extra fees may apply for additional occupants.3. Cleanliness and Amenities	•	Please keep the apartment clean and return it in a tidy condition.	•	All amenities (pool, gym, BBQ area, etc.) are available for guests. Please follow the specific rules for each facility.	•	Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the apartment. A designated smoking area is available outside the building.4. Security Guidelines	•	While Zenity has 24/7 security, you are responsible for your personal belongings.	•	Always lock the door when leaving and avoid leaving valuables behind.5. Prohibited Activities	•	No loud parties or events, especially after 9:00 PM, to maintain a peaceful environment for other residents.	•	Pets and illegal substances are not allowed in the apartment.6 Share Your Experience	•	We’d love to hear from you! title: Luxe 8BR RAYVilla/Perfect choice for Groups/3000m2
description: Welcome to Ray Villa, a luxurious riverside sanctuary in Phú Đông, just 16km away from the center, perfect for family gatherings or friends’ retreats. With eight spacious bedrooms accommodating 6 to 20 guests, this exquisite villa features a private pool, and modern amenities. Explore vibrant local cuisine at nearby restaurants and indulge in unforgettable experiences. Immerse yourself in this serene oasis where cherished memories await, and experience the true essence of luxury living in SaigonThe spaceDiscover Ray Villa: A Luxurious Riverside Retreat in Phú ĐôngRay Villa, a stunning 8-bedroom luxury villa designed for families and groups seeking both comfort and elegance. Our villa expertly combines modern architecture with inviting interiors, creating a stylish and relaxing atmosphere.Key Features:Spacious Bedrooms: Each of the eight bedrooms is thoughtfully designed with plush bedding, ample storage, and tasteful decor, ensuring every guest enjoys restful nights and rejuvenating mornings.Luxurious Bathrooms: The villa includes 8 modern bathrooms, complete with premium fixtures and amenities, allowing guests to refresh and unwind in comfort.Open Living Areas: The living spaces feature an open-concept layout that encourages social interaction. Enjoy movie nights on the large flat-screen TV or simply relax with panoramic views of the surrounding landscape.Gourmet Kitchen: Our fully-equipped kitchen boasts high-end appliances, including a stove, oven, refrigerator, and dishwasher, making meal preparation a delightful experience. The spacious dining area accommodates everyone, perfect for family meals and gatherings.Outdoor Paradise: Step outside to discover your own private oasis. Enjoy a refreshing swim in the pool, hold a BBQ session in the outdoor dining area, or simply lounge on the comfortable outdoor furniture as you soak in the serene riverside ambiance.Recreational Amenities: Stay active in our outdoor gym or unwind in the sauna. For entertainment, we provide a karaoke room and billiards table to ensure fun-filled evenings with family and friends.Secure Parking: Convenience is key; we offer free underground parking for your vehicles, along with 24/7 security for peace of mind.A Unique Experience Awaits:Ray Villa is located in the picturesque neighborhood of Phú Đông, surrounded by enchanting local culture. Just a stone's throw away, you’ll find an array of charming restaurants, delightful cafes, and exciting outdoor activities, including kayaking and scenic river cruises. Guests can also enjoy the easy access to local markets and landmarks, making this the perfect base for exploring the vibrant life of Ho Chi Minh City.We strive to provide you with everything you need for an unforgettable stay. Our dedicated team is always on hand to assist you, whether you need restaurant recommendations or help with arranging local experiences.Experience the essence of luxury living in Saigon at Ray Villa, where comfort, style, and community come together for the perfect getaway!Guest accessAt Ray Villa, we prioritize your comfort and convenience by providing you with full access to all amenities and facilities during your stay. Here’s what you can enjoy:Private Villa Access: Guests will have exclusive access to the entire villa, ensuring privacy and a sense of home throughout your time with us.Swimming Pool: Dive into the refreshing waters of the private swimming pool, perfect for relaxing or enjoying family fun under the sun.Outdoor Dining and BBQ Area: Take advantage of the outdoor dining space to enjoy meals al fresco, and feel free to use the BBQ facilities to create memorable cookout experiences.Fully Equipped Kitchen: The gourmet kitchen is yours to use, equipped with all necessary appliances and utensils for meal preparation. Enjoy cooking your favorite dishes just like at home.Recreational Spaces: Access the outdoor gym for your workouts, and wind down after a long day in the sauna or the cozy karaoke room for entertaining evenings with friends and family.Parking and Security: Benefit from secure underground parking for your vehicles, along with 24/7 security for your peace of mind.Convenience Services: Our dedicated team is just a message away. Whether you need assistance with local recommendations, arranging transportation, or any other requests, we are here to ensure your stay is seamless and enjoyable.Experience the ultimate luxury and relaxation at Ray Villa, where every detail is designed with your comfort in mind. We invite you to unwind and create wonderful memories in this serene oasis.Other things to noteRay Villa is an oasis for families and groups, comfortably accommodating 6 to 20 guests with eight spacious bedrooms. Enjoy stunning river views and the peaceful ambiance that surrounds you. Discover vibrant local culture with charming restaurants and cafes just moments away. Take advantage of complimentary electric scooters for exploration, or indulge in kayaking and river cruises. With modern amenities like an outdoor gym, karaoke room, and billiards, every moment is filled with joy. Join us in this paradise, where unforgettable memories await!

title: Sunny 1-Bdr Apt | Canal View | Peaceful Retreat
description: HN HOMES – Warm resort in the middle of SaigonBeautiful little apartment that opens to a cozy and poetic space in the heart of Saigon. This is the ideal place for you to relax your mind, read a few pages of books, enjoy your morning coffee, and enjoy the rare peace in the middle of the city that is always in motion.The space- The building has elevator and motorbike parking. - Open space, full of natural light The apartment is designed to be open, making the most of the natural light through the big windows. Every morning, let the gentle sunshine awaken you, accompanied by the cool breeze from the river, bringing relaxation and fresh energy. - Romantic view by the window - Riverside park with many green areas and full sports equipment to help you have energetic stays - You will see the gentle river, where each boat winds by as peaceful touches in the heart of the vibrant city. This is the perfect space to sip a cup of coffee, read a good book simply to let yourself in the quiet moments. - The space is very suitable for you to have long business trips, bringing creativity with work efficiency when staying. - HN HOMES is located in a prime central location, easy to move, just a short distance from famous attractions: • BenThanh Market ~3 km • Independence Palace ~2.5km • Notre Dame Cathedral of Saigon ~2 km • Saigon Central Post Office ~2km • Nguyen Hueệ Walking Promenade ~3 km • War Remains Museum ~2.5 km• Bùi Viện Street ~4 km • Botanical Garden Saigon ~2 km • Landmark 81 ~5 kmGuest access- The apartment is designed with 1 bedroom separating separate kitchen.- Working desk, soft big bed integrated in smart furniture system full of clean blankets, pillows. 1 sofa bed 1.6m long that can be reclined into a bed for children.- Bathroom with hot and cold water system using solar energy, soap, shampoo, towels and necessary personal things.- Kitchen : With induction cooker, refrigerator, microwave, electric cooker, kettle and full cooking utensils, the kitchen helps you prepare cozy, loving meals with your own hands.- In-room washing machine and hanging area outside the window, vacuum cleaner in the kitchen cabinet.- Iron, Hair Dryer and Hangers are available in the cabinet- In addition, you can also enjoy the types of tea, coffee, cake, candy and some convenient instant dishes, providing a diverse culinary experience and amenities right at the apartment.- Modern entertainment with Smart TV connected to Netflix, high speed Wi-Fi and airy air conditioned space.- Free motorbike parking on the G floorOther things to note- Be sure to keep the door secure whether you are inside or out of the house. You can take the set of keys with you for the duration of your stay.The lock set you have: Room card, roller door lock. - The automatic rolling door will be closed after 24:00 hours at night, if you check in later, let me know the schedule clearly, I will support you- If you have a motorbike, leave it on the G floor of the building (the parking lot is completely free) and lock the door carefully.- You respect our house, our neighbors. To ensure an enjoyable stay and not affect the local.- After 22pm is quiet time, you help us not to talk too loudly. Local residents sleep early to prepare for the next early morning.- Please send an image of your ID (Cccd/passport) upon arrival so that we can register your stay. This is the law, but also for your own safety.- Do not smoke and use banned substances at the room.- Please clean up cooking utensils after use.- In case you damage, lose or damage the property or its contents. Customers are kindly requested to compensate the apartment with the exact value of the damaged property at the time of the damage.

title: BRAND NEW, Studio 2, Balcony, Sky pool, Sauna, Gym
description: This modern studio apartment is located in District 4 – just a 5–7 minute drive to District 1.The space is fully equipped with a Queen-size bed, a smart TV with Netflix, a private washer and dryer, and a beautiful balcony overlooking the river.The building offers excellent amenities, including 2 free swimming pools (1 outdoor and 1 rooftop pool on the 14th floor), a modern gym, and a quiet co-working space.Our Studio located near traditional market, as well as Family Mart and 3 Sạch Market.The spaceWe believe a perfect stay starts with the smallest details — and every corner of this apartment is thoughtfully prepared to bring you comfort, care, and a touch of elegance.🍽 Fully-equipped kitchen – for warm home-style mealsThe modern kitchen includes all the essentials: cooking utensils, a microwave, an oven, and a spacious fridge – perfect for a light bite or a cozy dinner at home.🚿 Modern bathroom – like your private spaEnjoy a refreshing hot shower with high-pressure water, quality shampoo and body wash, and a hairdryer. Everything is clean and ready, designed for you to recharge in a stylish and private setting.🛏 Elegant bedroom – your cozy retreatThe queen-sized bed comes with freshly laundered, hotel-standard linens. You’ll also find a smart TV with free Netflix, ideal for relaxing movie nights in.🧴 Clean towels – always readyWe provide 2 clean towels per stay. If you need more, we’re happy to offer 2 additional towels free of charge.👔 Washer & dryer inside the apartmentLaundry is easy and convenient with your own washer and dryer, along with detergent and fabric softener – all prepared for your use.📶 High-speed Wi-Fi – work or unwind with easeWhether you’re working remotely or streaming your favorite shows, reliable Wi-Fi is always ready to keep you connected.Guest access- 2 swimming pools (Olympic lap pool on ground floor and a sky infinity pool on 14th floor)- Sauna and steam room is on 14th floor- Coworking space is also on ground floor- A modern gym is on ground floor- Luxury lobby with free wifi- Jumping Arena, skating area for kidsOther things to noteHouse Rules – Please Read Carefully Before BookingWe are committed to providing a peaceful, respectful, and secure environment for all our guests and residents. Kindly take note of the following house rules:1. SECURITY & COMMUNICATION - If you need assistance, please contact our designated host directly. - Please do not approach building staff or display booking details in public areas to ensure security and privacy for all guests. - We never visit your apartment without prior notice. Do not open the door for strangers, especially at night.2. QUIET HOURS & COURTESY TO NEIGHBOURS - Quiet hours are strictly observed from 11 PM to 7 AM. Please minimize noise during this time to respect the tranquility of the surroundings. - Always keep the door closed to limit noise and maintain privacy for everyone. 3. VISITORS & OCCUPANCY - All staying guests are required to provide valid passport/ID card copies for registration with local authorities. Only registered guests are permitted to stay overnight.  No smoking, no parties & absolutely no illegal activities.  Hosting unregistered guests & Violation of law may result in fines of up to 20,000,000 VND per person, and the booking holder will be responsible for any penalties imposed. 4. TOWELS & AMENITIES - Each booking includes 2 towels. Maximum 2 additional towels can be provided upon request. - Daily towel changes and daily cleaning are not included in the standard rate & available as additional paid services. Please contact us if you’d like to request them. 5. HOUSEKEEPING & CHECK-IN/OUT TIMES Check-in: After 3:00 PMCheck-out: By 12:00PMThis schedule ensures our cleaning team can prepare the apartment for the next guest on time.6. ELECTRICITY USAGE - Please help us conserve energy by switching off air conditioning, lights, and TV when leaving the apartment.- Excessive electricity use (e.g. leaving A/C running all day or cryptocurrency mining) may incur a surcharge or a public review comment.- Mining of Bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies is strictly prohibited.7. OTHERS - A penalty of $20 will be charged for any lost or unreturned access card to cover the cost of replacement.- Use the service lift for large luggage and avoid waiting in the lobby with bags.- Wear a cover-up over swimwear in all public areas. Dry off before entering elevators or hallways.Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. We truly appreciate you helping us maintain a welcoming and respectful space for all.

title: 3BR Retreat with Pool & Gym - District 1
description: Experience urban serenity at our modern home, just a 5-minute taxi ride to Ben Thanh Market and Bui Vien Street. title: Lovely  loft The One Sai Gon - Ben Thanh Tower 914
description: Modern loft, well-equipped and spacious apartment just a few steps from Ben Thanh Market, convenience stores, massage services, coffee shops, bakeries, restaurants, street food, ATMs, and hangouts within walking distance. Everything you need is nearby. Explore every nook and cranny of this uniquely beautiful city, you are at the city's heart.The space"YOUR HOME AWAY FROM HOME"This PENTHOUSE apartment is located on the 19th floor of Ben Thanh Tower (another name: The One Saigon serviced apartment) and is equipped with everything you need for an enjoyable stay:- High Floor Apartment with City View - QUEEN BED - SIZE is firm, comfortable- KITCHEN with dining table, complete kitchen equipment- EN-SUITE BATHROOM includes hot water, shower, mirror, towels, soap, toilet paper, shampoo, and hairdryer- You also have a WASHING MACHINE for your laundry; we prepare an iron and ironing board and clothes drying rack - Free Wi-Fi, cable TV, and coffee & tea.- Kitchen with dining table, induction cooker, microwave, refrigerator, storage, cooking pans, glasses, plates, and utensils.A modern, fully furnished, and spacious building just a few minutes from Ben Thanh market, with great views overlooking the city center.Everything you need is nearby. Enjoy a wonderful day in the sun, explore every nook and cranny of this uniquely beautiful city, visit France's magnificent historical architects, find a cafe to drop in, and then always come back and feel at home.Guest accessGuests have 24/7 access to the building, including:- Check in at reception, please present your passport/ID card with the same name as the reservation- The building has two gates, main gate at 45 Dang Thi Nhu Street- Reception works from 07:00 to 19:00 daily- There is a security guard in the lobby to support you 24/7. The pool area on the 21st floor is ready to use from 6:00 to 21:00 daily.- The fitness club on the mezzanine floor is open from 6:00 to 12:00 and from 13:00 to 22:00 (12:00 to 13:00 closed for cleaning)- The lobby has many chairs, so guests can rest while waiting for check-in or check out- Guests can leave their suite case at the front desk and take it before 20:00@another note: ***NO SMOKING in the room. Smokers could ONLY smoke on the balcony.***Animals are not accepted into the building.We can support you to set up a small, cozy party in apartment ( birthday, honeymoon or aniversary,...) with food and beverage, depending on your needs.Other things to noteUnlike many other spaces in Ho Chi Minh City, guests have no curfew. The swimming pool is open to you from 6:00 am to 9:00 pm.* Gym on the M floor is also a favorite place of our customersWe offer several fee-based services such as:1. Airport pick-up/drop-off service to help you enjoy the door-to-door transfer service $16-$25 /way depending on guest's arrival time (we recommend this service if this is the first-time visiting Ho Chi Minh City)2 / NO DAILY CLEANING, we will free cleaning every 3 days,the cleaning fee is $30 each time (including linen change). Towels will be provided for free if you need more, please consider when using them to save the environment.Please note that you will have to pay for bed linen, and towels if they are stained with blood, lipstick, and mascara according to the price list in the room3/Extra floor mattress/Extra bed: to prepare an additional floor mattress, remember to register the number of guests. title: Luxurious SkyVilla/PerfectforGroup/4Bed+1Riverview
description: The moment I stepped into this stunning 180m² Sky villa, I knew it was perfect for transforming into a luxurious Airbnb retreat. Ideal for families or groups of 6-10, this spacious home features 4 bedrooms and a dedicated office space. Located in the vibrant Thảo Điền area, home to expatriates, professionals, and accomplished families, it offers serene river views. Designed in contemporary art style, the apartment exudes a modern, lively, and cozy atmosphere, promising an unforgettable stay.The spaceWHY CHOOSE THIS PLACE  : Our grand sky villa offers an exceptional blend of luxury, comfort, and serenity. As you step into the spacious living room, you're greeted by a breathtaking view of the tranquil Saigon River—a view typically reserved for the city’s elite. Our imported Italian sofa comfortably seats up to 12 people, perfect for gatherings and entertainment. Enjoy cinematic evenings with a 65-inch TV and a projector with a 120-inch screen, creating an ultimate movie experience.The fully-equipped modern kitchen caters to all your culinary desires, making it ideal for cooking enthusiasts or casual meal preparations. Each bedroom is adorned with premium mattresses and stunning river views, providing a serene retreat after a day of exploration.Vista An Phú boasts unrivaled amenities. Dive into the expansive swimming pool or unwind on sunbeds while soaking the sun’s warm embrace. A state-of-the-art gym fulfills all your workout needs, along with a BBQ area and a children’s playground for family enjoyment.Thảo Điền, known as one of Asia's most charming districts, invites you to explore its unique charm. Delight in artfully designed cafes and exclusive restaurants offering cuisines from around the world. The neighborhood’s sophisticated atmosphere reflects the area’s affluent residents, ensuring a peaceful and cultured environment.The apartment's prime location is just a mere 15-minute drive to District 1, placing you at the heart of Saigon’s vibrant cultural and commercial activities. Mornings can begin with a peaceful walk to coffee shops along the river, afternoons filled with shopping excursions at nearby malls, and evenings indulging in the local dining scene or taking a leisurely stroll under the city lights.Whether you’re a family or a group of up to 10 friends, this location serves as a luxurious base for enriching experiences and unforgettable memories. With its combination of top-tier amenities, unbeatable views, and a prime location, our apartment at Vista An Phú promises an unparalleled stay in Saigon’s most coveted district.Guest accessAs our valued guest, you will have full access to the entire apartment, providing a private and exclusive experience. This includes all four bedrooms, the spacious living room, and the state-of-the-art kitchen. Enjoy leisurely moments on the sofa with entertainment options like the 65-inch TV or the projector for a cinematic experience.Beyond the apartment, indulge in the luxury amenities Vista An Phú has to offer. Access the expansive swimming pool for a refreshing swim, relax on the sun-drenched loungers, or work out in our fully-equipped gym. Families can benefit from the children's playground, and the BBQ area is perfect for a delightful outdoor meal.Feel free to explore the beautiful Thảo Điền neighborhood, renowned for its exquisite restaurants, artistic cafes, and charming local shops—all within walking distance. Your stay with us ensures a seamless blend of luxury, comfort, and cultural exploration.Other things to noteCheck-in is flexible, and we will provide detailed instructions for a smooth self-check-in process.We kindly ask guests to respect our neighbors and keep. noise levels to a minimum, especially during late hours.The apartment is non-smoking. Smoking inside the unit is strictly prohibited.For safety reasons, please supervise children around the pool and balcony areas.We offer basic amenities such as towels, toiletries, and Wi-Fi. Feel free to ask for additional services or items if needed.Please inform us in advance if you plan to host a small gathering or have additional guests visiting during your stay.We strive to keep the apartment in top condition; we appreciate your cooperation in maintaining cleanliness and respecting the property.We strictly prohibit the use of illegal substances and any unlawful activities on the property. Any violations will result in heavy penalties according to Vietnamese law.

title: Lovely 4BR Penthouse/Perfect for Groups/600m2/.
description: Nestled in the heart of Thảo Điền, our stunning penthouse offers breathtaking views of the iconic Landmark 81, a symbol of the city’s vibrant ethos. From this vantage point, you not only enjoy a remarkable skyline but also experience the rich culture of Thảo Điền, where serenity envelops you in a way that few places in Saigon can offer.The spaceWelcome to our stunning penthouse, an inviting and spacious retreat designed for families and groups seeking a unique experience in the heart of Thảo Điền. This exceptional home features four large bedrooms and three luxurious bathrooms, providing ample space for everyone to relax comfortably.Unwind in the cozy living area complete with a 65-inch TV, high-speed Wi-Fi, and Netflix for your entertainment needs. Step outside to enjoy the outdoor sofa, perfect for soaking up the serene surroundings. You’ll love the inviting swimming pool, where you can take refreshing dips or lounge poolside, and the charming café area for those relaxing coffee moments.Stay active with outdoor space , or find your zen in the outdoor yoga space located on the rooftop ( under the construction) , offering breathtaking views of the city. For your convenience, we offer a free underground parking space and a private elevator to allow you easy access to your home away from home.The spacious kitchen is equipped with top-notch cooking appliances, including a dishwasher and a coffee machine, making meal prep a delight. We also provide a crib for little ones, ensuring that families feel at home with us.I have made every effort to describe this beautiful home through the photos and the details provided below. We can't wait to welcome you and ensure your stay is comfortable and memorable!Guest accessImmerse yourself in the tranquil ambiance that makes this neighborhood truly unique. Here, you'll find an array of charming restaurants and romantic eateries that cater to every palate, ranging from delightful local cuisines to exquisite international fare. Each dining experience is a journey, highlighting the eclectic flavors that define our diverse culinary landscape.Wander through the peaceful cafes adorned with unique designs, a perfect escape for a quiet afternoon or a thoughtful conversation. For those seeking vibrant nightlife, the nearby bars come alive with energy and promise unforgettable evenings. Thảo Điền is more than just a place to live; it’s a community that embodies the essence of life in Saigon, where culture, tranquility, and adventure intertwine.Experience this extraordinary lifestyle from the luxury of our penthouse, and let the charm of Thảo Điền envelop you during your stay.Other things to noteThis exquisite penthouse is the perfect retreat for families and groups of friends, comfortably accommodating 6 to 8 guests. With its spacious layout and multiple living areas, you’ll find plenty of room to relax, socialize, and enjoy quality time together.The design and amenities are thoughtfully crafted to create a welcoming atmosphere, ideal for both entertaining and unwinding. The open-concept living space, combined with the lush outdoor areas, makes it a fantastic choice for gatherings, celebrations, or simply enjoying a peaceful escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.Whether you’re planning a family vacation, a getaway with friends, or a special occasion, this penthouse provides the ideal setting for memorable moments and shared experiences. And remember, Raymond Holm is always by your side, acting as your guide to ensure you have everything you need for an unforgettable stay!

Loud gatherings, parties, or events are not allowed.Violation = immediate eviction with no refund⸻2. 🚭 No Smoking IndoorsSmoking inside the unit is strictly prohibited.Penalty: $200 + 1 night’s stay for deep cleaning and ventilation⸻3. 🔑 Lost Key CardPlease keep your key card safe.Lost card fee: 500,000 VND⸻4. 👥 Maximum OccupancyOnly registered guests are allowed to stay.Unregistered guests = extra charge or cancellation⸻5. 🔇 Quiet Hours: 10:00 PM – 8:00 AMPlease avoid loud noise during these hours.Noise complaints may lead to eviction⸻6. 🐾 No PetsPets are not allowed, unless approved in writing before check-in.⸻7. 🧼 Cleanliness & DamagePlease treat the home with care.Excessive mess or damage = extra cleaning or repair fees⸻8. ⏰ Check-Out TimePlease check out on time as listed in your reservation.Late check-out without approval = extra charge⸻9. 🔒 Security & SurveillanceFor safety, security cameras may be present in public/common areas only.There are no cameras inside the unit.⸻10. 🧯 Fire SafetyNo candles, incense, or open flames inside the unit.Violation = $100 fine + damage costs if applicable⸻11. 🛠 Maintenance IssuesReport any issues (leaks, damage, etc.) as soon as possible.Failure to report may result in guest liability⸻12. 🛏 Linen & TowelsTowels and linens are for in-room use only.Missing or permanently stained items = replacement cost⸻13. 🗑 Trash DisposalPlease dispose of your trash properly before check-out. There is trash bin room right outside the hallway.Excessive trash = extra cleaning fee⸻14. 📵 Internet & Streaming UseDo not use the internet for illegal downloads or pirated content.Violations = fines from service provider charged to guest⸻Thank you for your cooperation and understanding.We want you to have a comfortable and safe stay—please let us know if you need anything during your visit!

title: 6BR City Center Zenity with River View | Free Pool
description: Enjoy your perfectly comfortable stay in our 2 units of 3-bedroom apartment. Located on the high floor of ZENITY CAPITALAND building, which is right in the center of Saigon, these apartments offer modern and luxurious interior, mesmerizing skyline and city view, while easy-access to many city landmarks in District 1. Perfect for a whole group of friends and family.Free access to our pool and jacuzzi, while 24/7 security is as well provided. We look forward to welcoming you!The spaceAccommodates up to 14 guests (extra mattress and baby crib available upon request).There are 2 UNITS of 3-bedroom apartment in the SAME BUILDING (Zenity) that you will get, each apartment has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, living room, kitchen and laundry.There are ACs in every room. High-speed wireless Internet is provided.The 6 BEDROOMS:🛏️ 2 Master Bedrooms (+ Ensuite Bathroom with Bathtub)- King Bed with 25cm mattress & full cotton bedding- Office desk- City skyline and river view- Closet (with hangers)- Safe🛏️ 2 Double Bedrooms- Queen Bed- Closet (with hangers)🛏️ 2 Twin Bedrooms2 Single BedsCloset (with hangers)The 4 BATHROOMS:🛁 2 En-suites with Bathtub🛁 2 Shared Bathrooms with Walk-In ShowerAll bathrooms includes:- Hot water - Toiletries, such as shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, toothbrush and paste, etc. - Towels- WC rolls- Hair dryer- Iron and ironing boardThe 2 LIVING ROOM:- Large Sofa + Tea table- 60-Inch SMART TV with YouTube Premium, Netflix and Speaker- Office desk- Large balcony with panoramic city skyline and river viewThe 2 DINING AREA:- Large stone dining table- 6 seatsThe 2 KITCHEN:- Fully equipped with a double induction stove, toaster, oven, kettle, microwave, cooking utensil and dining wares for 6 people- A full-size fridge- Drinking waterThe 2 LAUNDRY AREA:- Washing machine- Dryer- DetergentGuest accessBuilding Amenities (card access 24/7):- Swimming Pool perfect for a refreshing dip.- 24/7 Security provides round-the-clock safety and peace of mind with our top-notch security system.- Children's Playground.Prime Location:- Situated on Vo Van Kiet Street, offering easy access to Districts 1, 4, and 5.- ATM nearby (200m).- Convenience store WinMart nearby (400m).- Dining at Pizza 4P's, just a short walk away, along with a variety of other options.Attractions:- Ben Thanh Market: A quick 6-minute drive to this bustling market, perfect for shopping and experiencing local flavors.- Bui Vien Street: Only a 4-minute drive to the vibrant nightlife and entertainment hub.- Opera House: 10-minute drive away, a venue for many high profile events and cultural-entertainment activities of the city.Other things to note- Hotline Support: Please kindly contact us during your stay, our customer support team is ready to help you 24/7.- Free 7-seat airport pick-up for booking of 5 nights or more, and also available upon request.- Housekeeping service is complimentary for bookings of 5 nights or more, and also available upon request.- We offer SIM cards, sightseeing tours, car and bike rental services.Our goal is to provide you with more than just a place to stay, but a truly wholesome experience.

title: Saigon1984 Vintage Home Central District 6bedrooms
description: Welcome to Saigon 1984! Our private 1980’s vintage home offers 6 bedrooms with enclosed bathrooms and a rooftop kitchen/living room suitable for small to large groups of friends, families or colleagues. Our prime location in Saigon center (District 1) is surrounded by popular tourist attractions, famous local restaurants, street foods and nightlife activities. Experience an authentic and unique local stay while enjoying modern lifestyle conveniences and the best sleeping quality.The spaceThis place was rebuilt from my childhood home in a personal attempt to bring back the authenticity of Old Sài Gòn that I’m always in love with. We offer an Indochine style inspired with reused or remade materials to bring back the famous colonial architecture of Old Sài Gòn, including the conical gate, red bricks, wooden doors and stairways. You’ll find antique and collectible furniture owned by my grandparents and friends, romantic flowery balconies looking down to the local neighborhood, 5-star beds and amenities for your sleeping pleasure, and a rooftop kitchen/living room with a large screen TV and Netflix ready. It’s great for group gatherings, having some beers, talks and fun while enjoying the vibe of old Saigon. We’re proud to share “my beloved Sài Gòn” with you and other guests around the world.Guest accessYou'll have the entire house just for your group.

title: 6 Bedroom Villa, Billiards – BBQ, Pool
description: Grand Villa – Luxury 6-bedroom villa, swimming pool & jacuzzi massage in Thu DucIt is located in Do Fa Thuan Street, An Phu Ward, Thu Duc, Grand Villa offers a high-end resort experience in a space of 1,250m². With 6 bedrooms – 7 beds – 6WC (of which 4 self-contained rooms), the villa is the perfect choice for families, large groups of friends, team building or private parties.The spaceFeaturing a luxurious private pool, a high-end infrared massage jacuzzi, and modern interior design, Grand Villa promises to bring you a memorable vacation.🏠 Space & Facilities6 spacious bedrooms, fully equipped with modern furniture and bright open windows.7 large beds, soft mattresses, bringing complete sleep for both family and group of friends.6 comfortable, clean bathrooms, including 4 en-suite rooms for privacy.Separate pool, luxury design – the perfect highlight for retreats and pool parties.Premium infrared massage jacuzzi, which relaxes and restores energy after long days.Soundproof karaoke room with standard sound stereo, ideal for entertaining sessions with friends.Billiards at the lobby and spacious garden BBQ area where the whole group can have a cozy outdoor party.The interior is luxurious, classy, focusing on every detail, bringing the feeling of being both modern and warm.📍 Nearby placesOnly 10 minutes to Vincom Mega Mall Thao Dien and Thao Dien area is famous for coffee, restaurants, bars.15–20 mins travel to District 1: Nguyen Hue Walking Street, Notre Dame Cathedral, HCMC Post Office.About 30 minutes to Tan Son Nhat Airport.Around there are many eateries, supermarkets and amusement parks in An Phu – Thu Duc.✨ Experience in Grand VillaGrand Villa is not only a place to stay but also a space for you to enjoy comfort, privacy and absolute relaxation. Here, every moment with family or friends becomes memorable – from outdoor BBQ party, entertainment with karaoke & billiards, to relaxing moments in the high infrared jacuzzi.📝 Note when stayingPlease keep the general hygiene and follow the villa rules.Limit high volume after 22h to ensure neighborhood tranquility.Guests can have a BBQ or party on the premises, please give a heads up for assistance.
