title: Double Penhouse 86 &Pool Private
description: The only complex of 2 penthouse apartments in Saigon on the 24th floor, next to each other includes:- 2 private pools, 2 private saunas, bbq-8 bedrooms, 11 double beds, 8 bathrooms- Good price, Worthy quality- Location right in the heart of Saigon, walking distance from Bui Vien walking street, West Pham Ngu Lao street, Ben Thanh market, Nguyen Hue walking street, shopping area, bar, about 5 minutes by car or you can walk explore the famous shopping and food streets of the street cityThe spaceDouble  Penthouse 86  is located in District 5, near Nguyen Van Cu and Tran Hung Dao streets. It only takes 5 minutes (by taxi) to Ben Thanh Market, District 1 and the center of Ho Chi Minh City. This location itself is also considered by locals as the city center, the penthouse has a beautiful view of the city, especially the Bitexco Financial Tower - the leading building in Vietnam, where the fireworks event is held. . In terms of traffic, the building is near the largest subway line in Vietnam. Cars, taxis, especially Grab/Uber can be easily taken at extremely cheap prices. For food & entertainment, there are many 24h mini shops, bars, pubs, toilets around...so it meets all the needs of customers.Regarding the Penthouse utility, there are:-There is 2 rooftop pool, a private swimming pool for guests-2 * sauna- bbq grill equipment-- can set up a karaoke room + a large-screen cinema room with a capacity of 20 people (charges apply)All free. The most important thing, there is 24/24 security and friendly residents.Double  Penthouse 86  is unique because:- suitable for large family,- Smart TV 60 " can watch (Netflix, Youtube, , movies, sports channels ...)- Modern kitchen (microwave, BBQ, kettle, toaster, large fridge, full kitchen equipment for large groups...)- Mattresses, bed sheets and towels of a 5-star hotel- Modern furniture and high quality★FAQ★Q: How long does it take from Airport to your house? And how much is taxi fee?A: [It takes around 25~30min by taxi and it costs around 10 USD][FYI, I recommend for you to use VINASUN Taxi as other taxi companies are not safe for foreign travellers]Q: How can I check-in & out? and what time is it?A: [I will send you detailed guideline for check-in and other information right after your reservation confirmed.][The official check-in time is 15:00 and check-out is 12:00]Q: Early check-in and late check-out is possible?A: [It is flexible, but actually it depends on other guest's schedule.]Q: Your penthouse is closed to center of the HCM city?A: [White Penthouse  is just near by center of the HCM city as it is located in District 5. It usally takes 3 minutes to District 1 by taxi.][FYI, most of tourist sites are in District 1 such as Ben Thanh market, Reunification Palace, BITEXCO Tower, Traveller-Street and so on]Q: How can I rent Motor bike?A: [We know numerous motor bike rental shop, so we can introduce you.]Guest accessRegarding the Penthouse utility, there are:-There is 2  rooftop pool, a private swimming pool for guests- 2 * sauna- bbq grill equipmentAll free. The most important thing, there is 24/24 security and friendly residents.Other things to noteRegulations to note: 1️⃣DECLARATION OF TEMPORARY RESIDENT:  *According to Vietnamese law, I will help registered your stayed. Your responsibility is to check the total people stay in the room overnight and sent to us all the information ( passport for foregein guest and ID card for Vietnamese ) If you need support, please contact hotline, we will support you.Note *** If you invited new guests to visit the apartment after 10pm, please send additional necessary documents  so that we can update new guest information. ‼️  there is extra people come to check registration stay and we didn't have any extra documents to update your stay, likethe building management or policemen come to check accommodation stay and find it lack of information, we do not take the responsibility. So if there is extra people come to stay overnight, please sent us extra passport/ Id number   2️⃣ POOL: ** To maintain the quality of the water pool, we have to come to clean the pool every Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday,  Estimated time after 12pm we will clean the pool, please note this information and allow us come to clean the pool.*Please do not turn off the water filter in the pool. Please be quiet at the pool area after 10PM to avoid disturb neighboor

This apartment is 110 sqm (big and wide) and located in Block A of a luxury and famous building of the center of SAIGON. ## PERFECT LOCATION ★ 05 mins to District 1, SAIGON SKYDECK 10 mins Bui Vien street; 10 mins to city centre and Ben Thanh market by taxi/Grab. Enjoy our rooftop pool, sauna, and gym whenever you wish to escape the hustle of the city.The 1100 sqft/ 100 sqm apartment is spacious and perfect for couples, families, and business guests. There is an en-suite master king-sized bedroom; a second bedroom with floor-to-ceiling glass windows and a beautiful large living space. The second bathroom with a deep bathtub is located just outside the second bedroomWe warmly welcome you to a home where you can relax after a full day exploring the city:- Comfortable mattresses, and pillows with 100% cotton bed linens- All travel essentials for light travelers: shampoo, conditioner, soap, hair dryer, and large pool and bath towels- Large QLED Smart TV with access to local and international TV channels, Netflix and Youtube- Fully equipped kitchen with glass top stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, electric kettle, fridge and freezer- Nescafe espresso maker and drinking water (so we can all reduce the use of plastic bottles!)- Washer, dryer, iron & iron boardAt Homes By IDG (I Do Good), we prioritize your needs above all else. With a range of properties across Saigon, we strive to cater to every requirement our guests may have. Just send us a message!Guest accessOur guests will have exclusive access to the whole apartment and shared amenities of the building, plus:- Other services available upon request: airport transfer, daily housekeeping, currency exchange, food deliver, bike rental, luggage storage- 24/7 security on the ground floor- Secured building with surveillance cameras in the lobby and hallway, heat detectors, hard-wired smoke alarms and a computer controlled access system- Amenities access is pay-per-use, charged by Avalon building management. Please let us know when you would like to use the pool and/or gym so we can register on your behalf. Amenities access can be restricted based on last minute building maintenance / repairsOther things to note•	Airport Pick-up/Drop-offAvailable 24/7. Please notify us in advance to arrange this service for a small additional fee•	HousekeepingFor stays of 5 nights or longer, enjoy complimentary mid-stay cleaning. Daily housekeeping is available upon request. The cleaning fee covers one time cleaning service upon check-out.•	Fresh TowelsEach guest receives 1 bath towel and 1 hand towel. Towels are changed during housekeeping. For fresh towels in between, use the ensuite washer/dryer. We can also order new towels for you for a small fee per set if you'd like more frequent change of towels without having to wash them yourselves.•	Early Check-InEarly check-in is available (2 PM instead of 4 PM) if the apartment is ready. For arrivals before 11 AM, please contact us about booking the previous night for a special offer.•	Late Check-OutIf available, we offer up to 2 extra hours past our 11 AM check-out policy. A half-day fee applies after 1 PM, and full day charges start at 5 PM.•	Luggage StorageArriving early? You can drop off your luggage at 12 PM. Departing late? We can store your luggage until 2 PM. Let us know in advance for smooth arrangements.•	Pre-arrival Prior to your stay, we require you to complete and sign our rental conditions.

title: *Landmark 81*6BR Combo 2 Unit*Free Airport Pickup*
description: In order to make your stay in Saigon (Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam) as pleasant as possible we provide the following services:• FREE Airport pick-up (for reservation from 2 nights, from Tan Son Nhat Airport to KAY'S HOME in Vinhomes Central Park from 8:00AM - 22:00PM)In case your arrival time is not during our service time, you can choose Airport Drop-off instead.• FREE GYM & Swimming Pool.The spaceVinhomes Central Park is the NEW LUXURY RESIDENTIAL area in town where you can see the mix between traditional and modern living styles, is known as the family friendly areas of the city. This is the perfect place to explore the LOCAL LIVING and is for those who enjoy the outdoor greenery.*The apartment (smart home) is at Landmark 81 which is a super-tall skyscraper in HCMC; the tallest building in Vietnam, second tallest building in Southeast Asia and the 14th tallest building in the world.***The apartment is fully furnished, completed privacy, quiet and secure.Includes 1 apartment with 4 bedrooms and 1 apartment with 2 bedrooms SAME BUILIDNG(suitable for families to travel and rest )It opens up to Cityview & Saigon River view.*Our apartment can host up to 14 people, ideal for business travelers, family (with kids and old people) or a group of friends.2,4km to Ben Thanh market.Why to STAY HERE?- BEDROOMS: 6 bedrooms with king bed/queen beds, fresh linens and towels are provided. Iron and make up vanity. Wardrobe and clothes hangers.- LIVING ROOM: LCD Television and sofa bed with great city view- BATHROOM: shower, hot water, towels, toilet papers, soap, hand soap, shampoo and shower set are all provided. - KITCHEN: large fridge, microwave, stove, kettle along with cooking utensils, full dinner set and glasses.- LAUNDRY ROOM: washing machine, washing power and outdoor clothes hangers- SWIMMING POOL (Outdoor/ Ground floor), GYM (1st floor): FreeOTHERS:•High speed wireless internet•Internet TV Cable with 100+ international and local channels•Air conditioning for entire house•Taxi service at the door•Cleaning and laundry service if required (paid, $15 for one time cleaning)•Luxury lounge with high speed Wifi (free)•24/7 building & home access•Smart key •Balcony with city view•Medical services (contact us for support if needed)•International power plug adaptors provided•Family/ Kid friendlyEverything is designed to unwind you from the moment you walk in. Come and enjoy your stay, feel Like Your Home!Guest accessYou are welcome to use the building facilities including:- The swimming pool on the ground floor (free). Opening hours: 6:00AM-12:00PM, 2:00PM-22:00PM- Lounge on the ground floor (free)- GYM and Yoga center on floor 1 (free)- Parking area on basement (paid)- Full building access 24/7Other things to note• FREE Airport pick-up (for reservation from 2 nights, from Tan Son Nhat Airport to The Tori's Host in Vinhomes Central Park from 8:00AM - 22:00PM)In case your arrival time is not during our service time, you can choose Airport Drop-off instead.*Damage deposit: 1000.000VND - The customers need to deposit an amount of 1000,000VND upon check-in and we will refund it when customers check out.* SELF CHECKIN: please get elevator card at mailbox & use passcode provied on Airbnb to enter the door* CHECK OUT: Please leave Elevator Card on the table, turn off all electricities and close the door.* GUIDEBOOK: please read our guidebook on Airbnb for more information for your trip: Where to visit, eat and shop!

title: @D1_BenThanhMarket_Vintage Style
description: Step into a piece of SAIGON's history with our home, just steps from the iconic BEN THANH Market.Our location offers easy access to the city's FAMOUS ATTRACTIONS and MUST-TRY RESTAURANTS, all within a short walk. Despite being in the bustling city center, our home is a PEACEFUL RETREAT, remaining QUIET and PRIVATE.Immerse yourself in the perfect blend of HISTORY and modern convenience. Stay with us and enjoy the quintessential SAIGON experience, where TRANQUILITY meets VIBRANT CITY LIFE.The space--ABOUT BEN THANH QUARTER--During your Ho Chi Minh City travel journey, wandering around Ben Thanh Market should be one of the TOP activities on your bucket list. As an ICONIC symbol of Ho Chi Minh City, Ben Thanh Market is a must-visit place for travelers who are enthusiastic about the BEAUTIFUL French, hundred years of history architecture and want to immerse themselves in the hustle and bustle of this energetic city. The market and the quarter has EVERYTHING you want to FIND and things you want to EXPLORE with hundreds of kiosk inside and boutiques/restaurant surrounding: dried & fresh food, fruit, seafood, clothes, cosmetics, utensils, artisanal boutiques, coffee,  massage, street food,...-- ABOUT THE HOUSE---Located just in front of the market west gate, the old property, formerly belonging to the famous richest Saigonese Hui Bon Hua, is a part of the long old story of Ben Thanh quarter. Thank to the DIAMOND location, every amenities you need is just at your doorstep 24/7: Convenient store, coffee, restaurant, massage, market, currency exchange,...In order to renovate and host you, our friend from afar, the house has been refurbished to be UNIQUE & STYLISH but no less COMFORTABLE with MODERN and COMPLETE equipment, but still keeping its brick walls and especially its wide SKYLIGHT in the middle of 2 blocks. It means you will be able to simultaneously experience the antiquity of a HISTORIC building and a spacious, modern, comfortable apartment, as well as EXCITEMENT and PRIVACY in one same vacation. This listing contains 02 separated unit in a same building, so 4 floors of total 250 sqm space, subtly arranged and carefully equipped, the house can host up to 15 people and make you feel free like home after a long day exploring the city.-- ABOUT THE NEIGHBORHOOD---This prime District 1 location places you at the epicenter of the city's cultural scene. Walk to Saigon's iconic landmarks & atrractions, including:- Ben Thanh Market- Saigon Notre-Dame Basilica- Saigon Central Post Office- Independence Palace (Reunification Palace)- War Remnants Museum- Ho Chi Minh City Museum- Bitexco Financial Tower Skydeck- Tan Dinh Church- Jade Emperor Pagoda- Bach Dang Wharf Park- Saigon Waterbus stop- Independence Palace- Nguyen Hue Walking Street- Nha Rong Wharf- Ho Chi Minh City Museum of Fine Arts- Saigon Opera House- The Hop-on Hop-off Bus Tour- Nguyen Van Binh Book Street- Saigon Zoo and Botanical Gardens- Cho Lon Market, Mong Bridge- Rach Ben Nghe Bridge- Thien Hau Temple- Museum of Vietnamese History.- Explore the bustling shops of Vincom Center Dong Khoi and Takashimaya Saigon, or soak up the vibrant atmosphere of Bui Vien Walking Street and Chinatown.These are a few of the many convenience stores and cafes located near your apartment:Convenience stores:-Cheers Phan Chu Trinh (45 Phan Chu Trinh, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City) - Located right at your doorstep, this Cheers outlet offers a wide range of convenience items, snacks, and beverages. Open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.-Circle K Ben Thanh (57-59 Phan Chu Trinh, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City) - Just a short walk away, Circle K Ben Thanh is another convenient option for your daily needs. Open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.-Vinmart+ Ben Thanh (107-109 Phan Chu Trinh, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City) - A Vinmart+ store is a combination of convenience store and grocery, offering fresh produce, household items, and a wider selection of products compared to other convenience stores. Open 7AM to 11PM daily.Coffee shops:-The Workshop - Coffee & Coworking Space (17 Nguyễn Văn Tráng, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City) - This cozy coffee shop offers a great ambiance for both working and socializing. They serve delicious coffee, tea, and pastries. Open 8AM to 8PM daily.-Cộng Cà Phê Ben Thanh (49-51 Phan Chu Trinh, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City) - Experience Vietnamese coffee culture at Cộng Cà Phê, known for its traditional décor and authentic coffee recipes. Open 7AM to 10PM daily.-The Vintage Emporium Cafe (35 Phan Chu Trinh, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City) - This unique cafe combines a vintage bookstore with a cozy coffee shop, offering a relaxing atmosphere to enjoy your coffee and books. Open 7:45AM to 6PM daily.During your stay, immerse yourself in the city's cultural scene with a variety of exciting events happening in August.- Vietfoo & Beverage SECC: 799 Nguyen Van Linh, District 7, August 8-10- Ghibli in Town 2024: Ho Chi Minh City Conservatory of Music, August 2- Lô cô art market: 40B Nguyen Van Troi, Phu Nhuan District, August 3- IKEBANA EXHIBITION: 70 Ngo Duc Ke, District 1, August 2- Pet Run: Thanh My Loi Urban Area, District 2, August 24- Cinephile "Tôi thấy hoa vàng trên cỏ xanh": S.Pace, District 1, August 9Ben Thanh Quarter offers more than just a place to stay; it's an experience. Book your stay today and discover the epitome of TRANQUILITY meeting VIBRANT CITY LIFE in the heart of Saigon, where unforgettable events await.Guest access--THE FACILITIES YOU CAN ENJOY --- Check in/ Check out easy with SMART LOCK- Located just on the GROUND floor so it's suitable for even elderly and children- All space has Daikin Air-conditioning--Unit 01--* LIVING ROOM:- Long sofa and stylish tea table- 70 INCH Smart TV- Cozy and relaxing fireplace- Working desk & banquet- Beatiful lobby with skylight* BEDROOM 1:- 01 QUEEN BED with 25cm mattress and full cotton bedding- Wardrobe*BEDROOM 2:- 01 KING BED with 25cm mattress and full cotton bedding- Clothes hanger* FULL KITCHEN:- Induction stove + Cooking/Dining utensils (Pan, pot, bowl, dishes,...)- Microwave- Washer + Dryer* 01 WC* DINING AREA* PATIO/BALCONY with high chair and table-- Unit 03--* LIVING ROOM:- Double sofa bed and stylish tea table- Single sofa- 55 INCH Smart TV with netflix- Cozy and relaxing fireplace- Working desk & banquet- Beatiful lobby with skylight* MASTER BEDROOM 1 (ensuite bathroom with stylish BATHTUB and BATH CABIN) :- 02 KING BED with 25cm mattress and full cotton bedding- Wardrobe- Large window with long bench*BEDROOM 2:- 01 QUEEN BED with 25cm mattress and full cotton bedding- 50 inch TV with netflix- Wardrobe* FULL KITCHEN:- Induction stove + Cooking/Dining utensils (Pan, pot, bowl, dishes,...)- Microwave- Oven- Washer + Dryer* DINING AREA* PATIO with Sky garden and Pinic table/chair===> The free benefits you will have while staying in my apartment:+) Free laundry+) Free towel, shampoo, shower gel, bed sheet, toothbrush+) Free wifi+) Free Netflix+) Free welcome water+) Extremely reasonable pick-up private car for 2 ways ( Modern clean car: Peugeot 3008, Mitsubishi Xpander, Honda Civic, Mazda3, Mazda 6, Chevrolet Colorado, etc...)Other things to noteNote 1:  Please confirm your check in timeNote 2:  Usual check-in time is 14.00 pm while check-out is not later than 11.00 am. However, EARLY check-in or LATE check-out could be offered for FREE upon avaibilityNote 3: On the check in date, we will send you the code of doorNote 4: We have well furbished and equipped properties in Vinhomes Landmark/ the Marq district 1 and Old quarter Hanoi city ( 1-2-3-4 Bedrooms) too, please text us to find the perfect match to your searchNote 5: Please help us and the planet save energy and water ^^ Note 6: We hope you can help us to water the plants in the morning ( before 11 am) or afternoon (after 4 pm). The plant will be so happy.***Here is our fb fanpage for Hanoi:Lovehanoi homestay <-- please check it out

title: Penthouse 2 King Beds next to Independence Palace
description: Welcome to Saigon at this expansive 130m² penthouse, boasting the best view of the Independence Palace and the park. Renovated with care using  vintage and modern pieces, it’s stylish and sustainable at the same time- 3 bedrooms with 2 King beds and 1 Queen bed- 2 full bathrooms with all essentials- Our dedicated team offers personalized in-person check-ins and is ready to assist you for a memorable stayBook For Lasting Memories In Saigon—See Details Below!The spaceSailing Tower was Saigon’s first modern high-rise, built in 2010— it’s not your typical new-build filled with identical condos. While the exterior may show its age, the apartments we manage here are spacious, clean, and thoughtfully maintained. If you're after comfort, character, and the best location in the city, this is your spot. Prefer something sleek and shiny? We’ve got those too—but Sailing Tower is all about soul and spaceThe 140 sqm apartment plus balcony is spacious and perfect for friends, couples, families, and business guests. There are three bedrooms, of which one has an en-suite bathroom, a large living room, and a dining space overlooking the city of Saigon.We warmly welcome you to a home where you can relax after a full day exploring the city. Our guests will enjoy:- Spacious & private bedrooms, furnished with King/Queen beds, comfortable mattresses and pillows, 100% cotton bed linens- Two bathrooms with all travel essentials: shampoo, conditioner, soap, hair dryer, and large bath towels. - Each room has its own AC, ensuring comfort for our guests- Large LED Smart TVs with free access to local and international TV channels, YouTube & Netflx enabled- A home office for those who miss work while traveling- Fully equipped kitchen with gas stove, electric oven, microwave, dishwasher, fridge and freezer- Nescafe coffee maker & drinking water (so we can all reduce the use of plastic bottles!)- En-suite Washer and Dryer, iron & iron boardAt Homes By IDG (I Do Good), we prioritize your needs above all else. With a range of properties across Saigon, we strive to cater to every requirement our guests may have. Just send us a message!Guest accessThe apartment is on the highest floor of a mix-used commercial and residential building, as such it is very safe and well maintained. Our guests will have exclusive access to the whole apartment and shared amenities of Sailing Tower, plus:- Other services available upon request: airport transfer, daily housekeeping, currency exchange, food deliver, bike rental, luggage storage- 24/7 security on the ground floor- Secured building with surveillance cameras in the lobby and hallway, heat detectors, hard-wired smoke alarms and a computer controlled access system- Amenities access can be restricted based on last minute building maintenance / repairs or condominium policy changesOther things to note•	Airport Pick-up/Drop-offAvailable 24/7. Please notify us in advance to arrange this paid service•	HousekeepingFor stays of 5 nights or longer, enjoy one complimentary mid-stay housekeeping service, including changing fresh towels. Daily housekeeping is available upon request. The cleaning fee covers one time cleaning service upon check-out.•	Fresh TowelsEach guest receives 1 bath towel and 1 hand towel. Towels are changed during housekeeping. For fresh towels in between, use the ensuite washer/dryer or drying rack. •	Early Check-InEarly check-in is available (2 PM instead of 4 PM) if the apartment is ready. For arrivals before 11 AM, please contact us about booking the previous night for a special offer.•	Late Check-OutIf available, we offer up to 2 extra hours past our 11 AM check-out policy. A half-day fee applies after 1 PM, and full day charges start at 5 PM.•	Luggage StorageArriving early? You can drop off your luggage at 12 PM. Departing late? We can store your luggage until 2 PM. title: HOT | 5BRs 4baths house walk to Bui Vien, BenThanh
description: Tucked away in a quiet alley District 1 - Saigon centre, this spacious town house offers the perfect mix of peace and convenience — just 5–10 minutes' walk to Bui Vien Walking Street. Ideal for large groups or families, the home features 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, and a generous private living room where everyone can relax and unwind.Capacity: group from 5 peoples - to maximum 14 peoples (5 larges beds and 3 sofa beds)The spaceNearby Attractions & Local Hotspots:📌 Bui Vien Walking Street (5–10 min walk): Bars, clubs, street food & nightlife.📌 Ben Thanh Market (~10 min drive): Souvenirs, food stalls & local culture.📌 Nguyen Hue Walking Street (~12 min drive): Cafes, shopping, and city views.📌 Independence Palace & Notre-Dame Cathedral (~10–15 min drive): Historic landmarks.📌 Bitexco Tower Skydeck (~10 min drive): Stunning 360° views of the city skyline.📌 Local eateries & cafés (within 500m): From authentic Vietnamese dishes to hidden coffee gems.** About the FULL premium 5 bedrooms 4 bathrooms HOUSE with 2 floors at District 1 centre🔍 01 LIVING ROOM on the ground floor that connected with full-equipped KITCHEN:- 01 large SOFA (sofa bed) that fit up-to 10 peoples + Tea table / living room- 60 Inch SMART TV ( Youtube & Netflix)- Cooking and dining utensils for 8-12 people (Single induction stoves, microwave, hot kettle, dining wares, cooker, pan & pot,…)- Dining table that fit up-to 6-8 peoples- Font-yard and large window🔍 01 BEDROOM on the groundfloor- 01 queensize bed with 15cm mattress & full cotton bedding / bedroom (can fit 2-3 people)- Private attached bathrooms - small size- Clothing rack & hangers🔍 02 large BEDROOM with large balcony- 01 QUEEN bed per bedroom & full cotton bedding / bedroom - + extra floor mattress (on request)- Private balnocy per room with outdoor picnic chairs & table (2-seats/room) to collect natural sunlight!- 1 room on 1st floor has private smart TV while the other room on 2nd floors large private attached bathrooms- Clothing racks & working desk - Private sofa bed that can turn into an single bed (allowed fit up-to 3 people / room) in reach room - Extra fee & advanced request for set-up!!!! 🔍 02 medium-size BEDROOM- 01 QUEEN bed per bedroom & full cotton bedding / bedroom- Window to collect sunlight although room indoor- Clothing racks & hangers🔍01 indoor LAUNDRY AREA:- Washer & Washing detergent- Clothes rack & hangers.- Private washing machine & drying machine

title: Scandi-Modern 3BR+2WC | District 1 | 5 min Bui Vien
description: Welcome to Serenity Living 🏠Your escape high above the bustling energy of Ho Chi Minh City. Nestled on the 27rd floor of the modern SOHO Residences, this cozy 3 bedrooms apartment is located in the heart of District 1, 300m away from Bui Vien offers the perfect balance of city convenience and peaceful comfort. It features 3 king size queen sized bed, one single bed, a large sofa, memory foam mattress, a full kitchen,4K 55’ smart tv , fast Wi-Fi, washer & dryer. Perfect for friends & familiesThe space🏠 Living Room, Dining, and Kitchen✔️ Smart TV✔️ High-speed internet✔️ Comfortable Modern Style Sofa✔️ Additional air mattress available to accommodate up to 8 guests.✔️ Dining area for 6 people✔️ Fully equipped kitchen:✔️ Refrigerator✔️ Microwave ~ Stove✔️ Cooking utensils and cutlery🛏️  Bedroom 1The first (Master bedroom) Has two  beds, featuring:✔️ Queen-sized beds dressed in plush✔️ Double-sized beds dressed in plush✔️ Premium Riotex bed linen and pillows✔️ 25cm thick mattresses✔️43 inch TCL Smart TV✔️ Two plush pillows✔️ Wardrobe✔️ Large shower bathroom✔️ Coat Hangers✔️ Iron✔️ Bedside Table + Reading Lamps🛏️  Bedroom 2This bedroom features a comfortable bed with wardrobe and breathtaking city views featuring:✔️ Queen-sized beds dressed in plush✔️ Premium Riotex bed linen and pillows✔️ 25cm thick Mattresses✔️ Two plush pillows✔️ Balcony overlooking the city skyline✔️ Peaceful Curtain Blinds✔️ Night stand with a reading lamp🛏️ Bedroom 3This bedroom features a comfortable bed with wardrobe and breathtaking city views featuring:✔️ Queen-sized beds dressed in plush✔️ Premium Riotex bed linen and pillows✔️ 25cm thick Mattresses✔️ Two plush pillows✔️ City skyline view✔️ Peaceful Curtain Blinds✔️ Night stand with a reading lamp🛁 Bathroom✔️ Modern design with walk-in shower✔️ High-quality towels and toiletries provided✔️ Hairdryer and basic essentials🌞 Balcony & 🧺 Laundry Area✔️  Private balcony with stunning panoramic views of the city✔️ Perfect for morning coffee or evening relaxationGuest access⭐️ Guests have full access to the apartment, including 3x queen sized bed, one double bed, a large sofa, a modern kitchen, living area, and private bathroom. The building also offers 24/7 security, a lobby area and elevator access. Located in District 1, you’re steps away from cafes, 7Eleven, FamilyMart, Circle K and city attractions such as :• Bui Vien walking street: 300m • Nguyen Hue walking street: 1.3KM• Ben Thanh Market: 800m• Saigon Center mall: 1KM• Vincom Dong Khoi center mall: 1.8KM• Museum of Ho Chi Minh 1.4KMOther things to note🌟 As per Airbnb new regulations in order to comply with local authorities we would kindly ask you to provide a Photo of each guest’s Passport that will be staying with you for this trip. - Please be respectful of the apartment as if it was your house.- No drugs/ smoking inside the apartment. - Keep noise down after 11:00pm.- early check-in, late check out can be offered upon requests and availabilities.- We can keep your luggages before check-in but not for check-out

title: Amazing 3BR, panoramic view, bath tub, Ben Thanh
description: This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit, located on quiet street at Ben Thanh Tower/ other name: The One Saigon. Standing here, you can see the whole town at a glance, only 3 mins ( around 400m) by walking distance, you'll behold many famous destinations of city such as Ben Thanh market, Bui Vien backpack st,Opera House, Museum of Fine Arts, Independence Palace...It's the best choice to enjoy your trips in Ho Chi Minh city.The spaceThis is 3 BEDROOMS, on 18th floor, around 130 m2, NEW AND MODERN WITH BATH TUB - WASHING MACHINE - DRYER MACHINE - HIGH FLOOR- BALCONY( 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms) - Have fun with the whole family at this stylish place.When you stay in here, you see all new furnished rooms with kitchen, comfortable bed, mattresses and beautiful bathroom. Best location at city heart center, comfort, and character in a brand new apartment. A vibrant neighborhood in the heart of Ho Chi Minh city. Free Wi-Fi, washing and dryer machine, cable TV and coffee & tea. The apartment is completely furnished with curtains, table, TV, shelves, closets, balcony, kitchen with burner stove, microwave, refrigerator, ample storage, cooking pan, glasses, plates and utensils. All you need for an easy move in whether for short or long stay. The bathroom includes hot water, shower, mirror, towels, soap, toilet paper, shampoo and hair dryer. You can stay our home comfortable feel like your home,  FREE GYM & POOL.- Swimming pool 6am-9pm on 22 floor. The pool will be closed for maintenance from Mar 25 - 31, 2024, so you can not use the pool during this time. Please consider before booking- Gym (6am -10pm) and DI MAI Vietnamese restaurant on ground floor. - Coffee shop, Mcdonald, Security 24/24hGuest accessThis is your space. You use the entire apartment on a floor, complete privacy.Lobby and the elevator, Gym, Pool are shared with pepole...You use Elevator card to access apartment. Go down lobby to ask security or reception help you access to Pool at 22 floor and Gym at up stairs Floors in Lobby area FOR FREE, security 24/24, free wifi at lobby.Other things to noteOur place is located in a heart of city. You will enjoy living in the high class neighborhood with atmosphere and character. This building and area around has a variety of amenities, convenience stores, massages, coffee shops, bakeries, restaurants, street foods, ATM and hangouts, within walking distance.  "Our guests reviewed that, staying here, you will:1. Have 24/24 security guard ( 2 layers, one by personnel, and another by smart card).2. Have access to all basic necessities ( Vinmart, Highland Coffee, McDonald or Lotteria, Pho Vietnam, ATM, Taxi, Intercity bus, etc.,)3. Not be bothered or disturbed by neighborhood.Other things are:1. No traffic jams.2. Clean & fresh air in Ho Chi Minh city.3. Very little surrounding noise.4. Fully equipped apartment.In summary, this is a worth place to stay in HCM city."

title: Saigon Skyline Suite next to Palace Garden
description: Welcome to our sun-filled sanctuary, a 140 sqm apartment, in the heart of vibrant Saigon. Immerse yourself in the stunning views, discover nearby attractions, and savour local and international cuisines in our top-rated central neighbourhood.- 3 Bedrooms / 2 Bathrooms With Comfortable Beds (1 ensuite)- Next to Independence Palace, the best location and best views in Saigon- Luxury Residence with Our Team Greeting You On Arrival- Complimentary Arrival SnacksAsk us for Airport Transfer!The space☆☆ HIGHLIGHTS ☆☆✹ 19th floor, 140 sq m high-rise apartment in the heart of Saigon, prime location in District 1✹ Sleep 6 in 3 spacious bedrooms: 1 king, 2 queens✹ 2 full bathrooms; essential toiletries provided✹ Full kitchen w/ modern appliances, Nescafé espresso maker✹ Bright, open living area w/ 55” smart TV ✹ Large dining table w/ seating for 6✹ High-speed wifi + 2 dedicated workspaces✹ Large balcony w/ comfortable seating✹ Breath taking views of the park, city skyline + PalaceEager to Read More?Here Are A Few Kind Words From Our Previous Guests:“I like the unit.  the unit is on 19th floor of sailing tower and the balcony view is great, location is walkable to various common sightseeing places and getting grab is very convenient.   communication with the host is no problem.   would definitely stay again!” –Jim“Fantastic experience staying at Thien’s beautiful city condo. All the amenities were wonderful , the building was convenient and safe and the views, oh the views, were breath-taking. I highly recommend this place and hope to be back.” –Silvia“This is a beautiful three bedroom  apartment in a spectacular Parkside location. The outdoor balcony is the perfect spot to enjoy an evening overlooking downtown Ho Chi Minh City” –Edward☆☆ YOUR HOME AWAY FROM HOME ☆☆This spacious 19th-floor apartment is managed by Homes by IDG, who are dedicated to community impact and sustainability. You’ll find the unit decorated with beautiful works of art created by local artists. Thoughtfully chosen vintage furniture adorns much of the living space, helping to reduce environmental impact. Each stay positively impacts local employment, especially for female entrepreneurs, mothers, and new migrant to the city. Do good, feel good, and stay better at this property.★★ BEDROOMS ★★Wake up to sun-soaked views of the Ho Chi Minh City skyline from the three spacious bedrooms. Enjoy plenty of natural light, stunning views, storage space, and a comfortable sleep. The primary bedroom has a private bathroom, and two of the bedrooms include a convenient workspace perfect for checking emails. ✹ Primary Bedroom: King-sized bed, wardrobe, work desk, spectacular views + ensuite bathroom✹ Bedroom 2: Queen-sized bed + wardrobe✹ Bedroom 3: Queen-sized bed, flat-screen TV, wardrobe + work desk✔ Comfortable bed + mattresses✔ 100% cotton bed linens★★ BATHROOMS ★★Both full bathrooms are modern, clean, and the perfect sanctuary after a busy day. Light a candle, pour a glass of wine, and enjoy a long soak in the tub or relax under the steady stream from the rain shower. Fresh towels and essential toiletries are provided, helping you to travel light! ✹ Bathroom 1: Private ensuite bathroom to primary bedroom w/ bathtub/shower combo✹ Bathroom 2: Full bath w/ rain shower✔ Essential toiletries provided (including shampoo, conditioner + body/hand wash)✔ Hair dryer✔ Fresh towels (1 large bath towel + 1 hand towel per guest)★★ KITCHEN & DINING ★★When you’re craving a home-cooked dinner, the kitchen has everything you’ll need to prepare delicious meals. Enjoy modern appliances, a Nescafe coffee machine, and a proper dining area. Of course, when you want to sample the incredible local cuisine, you are only minutes from fantastic restaurants.✔ Fully stocked kitchen w/ modern appliances✔ Nescafe coffee with a starter pack of coffee pods✔ Basic cookware & dinnerware✔ Dining table w/ seating for 6★★ LIVING ROOM ★★ Kick back on the sofa to watch a movie or read a book. For the best views, pour yourself a drink and slip out to the large balcony. ✔ 55” LED TV w/ Chromecast + access to local/international TV channels. Netflix enabled (you need your account)✔ Floor-to-ceiling windows w/ city skyline view✔ Direct access to the balcony★★ OUTDOOR SPACE ★★Enjoy a gentle sunrise, a dazzling sunset, or incredible night-time fireworks from the private balcony. Sit at the bistro table to enjoy your morning coffee, a glass of wine, or a late-night snack, watching the bustling city below.✔ Spacious balcony w/ outdoor seating + table✔ Panoramic views of Independence Palace + Palace Garden★★ ACTIVITIES/ATTRACTIONS ★★ Located on Pasteur, one of the most famous streets in Saigon, you’re mere steps away from endless entertainment, gourmet eating experiences, and shopping. Check out some of the top-rated activities nearby:Family-Friendly Attractions✔ The Golden Dragon Water Puppet Theater (0.5 km)✔ Tao Dan Park (0.85 km)✔ Saigon Zoo & Botanical Gardens (1.4 km)Cultural & Historical Sites✔ War Remnants Museum (0.45 km)✔ Independence Palace (0.29 km)✔ Notre-Dame Cathedral Basilica of Saigon (1.1 km)Outdoor Activities✔ 23/9 Park (1.9 km)✔ Saigon River Tour (2.3 km)✔ Bach Dang Wharf Park (2.9 km)Dining and Shopping✔ Ben Thanh Market (1.5 km)✔ L’Usine Café & Concept Store (1.9 km)✔ Saigon Square (2.1 km)★☆ Reserve Your Dates Now – The Perfect Saigon Getaway Awaits! ☆★Guest accessThe apartment is on a high floor of a mixed-use commercial and residential building, as such it is very safe and well-maintained. Our guests will have exclusive access to the whole apartment and shared amenities of the Sailing Tower, plus:- Other services available upon request: airport transfer, daily housekeeping, currency exchange, food delivery, bike rental, luggage storage- Early Check-In and Late Check Out upon availability and with an additional fee- For late-night and early-morning arrival guests, please let us know if you request a grocery service, and we will stock the fridge for you- 24/7 security on the ground floor- Secured building with surveillance cameras in the lobby and hallway, heat detectors, hard-wired smoke alarms, and a computer-controlled access system- Amenities access can be restricted based on last-minute building maintenance/repairs or condominium policy changesOther things to note• Airport Pick-up/Drop-offAvailable 24/7. Please notify us in advance to arrange this service.• HousekeepingFor stays of 5 nights or longer, enjoy one complimentary mid-stay housekeeping service, including a change of fresh towels. Daily housekeeping is available upon request. The cleaning fee covers one service upon check-out.• Fresh TowelsEach guest receives 1 bath towel and 1 hand towel. Towels are changed during housekeeping. For fresh towels in between, use the ensuite washer/dryer or drying rack.• Early Check-InEarly check-in is available (2 PM instead of 4 PM) if the apartment is ready. For arrivals before 11 AM, please contact us about booking the previous night for a special offer.• Late Check-OutIf available, we offer up to 2 extra hours past our 11 AM check-out policy. A half-day fee applies after 1 PM, and full day charges start at 5 PM.• Luggage StorageArriving early? You can drop off your luggage at 12 PM. Departing late? We can store your luggage until 2 PM. Let us know in advance for smooth arrangements.• Pre-arrival formPrior to your stay, we require you to complete a pre-arrival form and sign our rental conditions.

title: Spacious Suite with Saigon View in District 1

Enjoy the picturesque view of the city from the balcony and brightly lit living room.This home is professionally designed and managed by Homes By IDG, a Hospitality Group that manages urban luxury properties in Vietnam, Canada, and Greece. Start planning your trip by sending us a message here! We look forward to welcoming you at Sailing Tower, District 1.The spaceLive in the middle of hustle and bustle of Saigon's most famous street, Pasteur, and enjoy the picturesque city skyline right from your living room, you won't even need to go to Skydeck at BitexcoThe 150m2 apartment is spacious and perfect for couples, families and business guests. title: Private Plunge Pool Garden Duplex • Lakeview Park
description: Spacious Duplex | 4 Bedrooms, 4 Bathrooms | Private Plunge PoolGARDEN SANCTUARYOur home is a 2-story suite that hosts up to 8 guests. title: Honey Comb B1811 district 2
description: A comfortable and newly-furnished private room in an apartment located in District 2 is offered at an economical price. The place is good for couples, solo travelers and business travelers. With a modern design, you can immerse yourself in wonderful days or tired business trips. Masteri An Phu is located at Thao Dien Village where to many foreigner living here.The spaceKhông gian nơi ở Masteri An Phu is located at Thao Dien Village where to many foreigner living here. Masteri is one of the luxury apartment in town that you can enjoy when you are in this lovely Ho Chi Minh city. My apartment is on floor 18th, with 2 bedrooms, City View with 2 toilets, 1 kitchen, 1 living room, you get comfortable and relax feeling when you are on vacation or even in long time working period in Ho Chi Minh city. At MASTERI , you get a high-end residential, 24/7 security. - It is 10-20 minutes to city center, 25 minutes to airport. The place is far enough from tourist areas to get an authentic Vietnamese experience of life/ culture. But it is also easy to go to city center to enjoy an exuberant Saigon. It costs about 4-5$ for an Grab car ride to downtown, 2$ for an Grab bike ride or you can take a bus (only cost 6,000VND) like a local. Around 8$ for Grab car to/ from airport. Tương tác với khách Early check in may be available if there is no guest on the date before you arrive/or they check out early (please contact host for more info) To use the elevator and enter the building door you will need the access card that we provide. Please bring it with you when you leave the apartment. When you leave the apartment please don’t forget to turn off lights, airconditionings and close the door. Những điều cần lưu ý khác Check in any time after 2pm Check out by 12PM (noon) Before going out, please. - Close all the door and windows - Turn off all Air conditions, lights and water. - please wash all the dishes, cups and microwave after used.- there's a garbage room near the elevator. Please dispose all of your trash before leaving the apartment - no shoes inside the house, indoor shoes are provided.Guest access- Your own private bedroom is equipped with air conditioner, queen size bed, wardrobe, closet, work desk, chair and iron- Private bathroom is included in your bedroom with shower, hair dryer, towels and other essentials such as shampoo, shower gel, toilet paper. - Besides that, Living room with comfortable sofa, cable TV and a very nice bay window for reading pleasure. air conditioner in living room and there is an electric fan for breeze. -Kitchen with cooking utensils available for cooking meals. - High-speed wifi throughout the house. Tiện nghi khách có quyền sử dụng WIFI High speed unlimited wifi has been installed. Password will be given to you when you arrive. COMPLIMENTARY ITEMS Each guest will be provided with 1 bath towel. Shampoo, shower gel, laundry detergent, tissue and toilet papers, mineral water bottles , coffee and tea are complimentary for your convenience. CLEANING The place is professionally cleaned prior to your arrival. Bedsheets, quilt cover, pillow cover, bath towels and toilet floor mats are freshly laundered HOUSEKEEPING DURING YOUR STAY Should you require extra housekeeping service during your stay, it can be easily arranged for a small fee. 1 day advance notice needed to specify your preferred time of visit for the housekeeper. Khu vực lân cận Masteri An Phu apartment is located at Thao Dien village where much of Saigon's western expats settle, as well as wealthy Vietnamese. Thao Dien is fast developing district just about 10-15mins from city center. Surrounding with numerous restaurants, cafes and eating spots, with many situated along the edge of the Saigon River making it an ideal spot to wind down and relax. There are many luxury shopping malls located around Thao Dien : Vincom Mega mall , Estella Place...Other things to noteCách đi lại 1.GETTING AROUND: Application recommended : Google Map, UBER, GRAB UBER, GRAB: you can choose the options to pay by cash or Credit Card Mai Linh TAXI:38.23.23.23 VINASUN TAXI: 38.27.27.27 (Don't catch any others, they're not reliable) 2. TAKEAWAY DELIVERY (FOOD) Get the FOOD you love delivered fast, right to your door. Recommended websites /apps : https:// www.vietnammm.com/en/ https:// www.deliverynow.vn Please choose Tan Binh District to find the restaurants around. They mind call you to confirm what you orderl So please answer your phone ! 3. SIM CARD If you are travelling without 3G or 4G network, to avoid expensive international roaming, Local SIM CARD is recommended. The most common networks are Viettel Mobile, Mobifone and Vinaphone. A Vietnamese SIM card can be found anywhere on the streets on carts, at any phone shop, credit kios and at the airport on arrival. Of course, inside the flat, you have unlimited high speed WIFI. 4. LOCKER SERVICE You can ask the receptionist to keep your baggages after check out (11:00-16:30 or 19:00-23:00 ). Please inform me in advance so that we can ask them. 5 USD/ bag The airport nearby also has locker service if it is more convenient for you. 5. PARKING If you come by scooter/ bicycle/ car, you find the parking on the underground floor of the building. Be sure to get the number ticket and pay! 6. EMERGENCY NUMBERS Police: 113 , fire: 114: Ambulance - First Aid: 115

Perfect for travelers seeking comfort, local experiences, and relaxation.Details of our apartment:- Area: 150 m2- 1 spacious living room with a sofa, TV, and a fully equipped kitchen.- 5 bedrooms with 7 large beds, sized 1.6 meters x 2 meters (equivalent to Queen size).- 2 bathrooms including 1 en-suite bathroom in the master bedroom (with a bathtub) and 1 bathroom in the hallway near the living room.- 2 dining tables and 14-16 chairs.Moreover, the apartment is equipped with the following amenities:1) Special facilities:- Views from the living room and bedrooms: overlooking the cityscape and the Saigon River.- Balconies in the living room and bedrooms where smoking is allowed. Please close the door while smoking.- Bathtub.2) Other facilities:- High-speed internet throughout the apartment.- Smart TV with modern apps like YouTube, Netflix, or Cable TV.- Clean bed linens and towels, drinking water, toilet paper, shampoo, shower gel, hand soap, toothbrushes, and toothpaste.- Fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, refrigerator, electric kettle, dishes, utensils, pots, and pans, allowing you to showcase your cooking skills and enjoy great meals with friends and family.- Washing machine, laundry detergent, clothes hangers, and drying rack.- Iron and ironing board, hairdryer.- Air conditioning in all areas.- Hot water.- Information about nearby attractions.Everything is complimentary and exclusively for you, your friends, and your family. No sharing with anyone else.Guest accessIn addition to using the available amenities in the apartment, you can also enjoy the following facilities in the building completely free of charge.BUILDING FACILITIES:- Indoor swimming pool on the 2nd floor. No need to swipe the elevator card to access the 2nd floor.- Children's play area located on the same floor as the swimming pool.- Ample parking space in the spacious basement (with a fee)***All facilities are open from 6 am to 9 pm and are completely free of charge.***Remember to bring the access card provided when using the facilities.***The use of these building amenities is subject to the building management's policy at any given time. We will update you as soon as possible.- Elegant lobby area.- Reception desk available from 8 AM to 9 PM to assist with any building-related information.- Building security and technical staff operate 24/7 to ensure the smooth operation and safety of the residential area.SURROUNDING FACILITIES:- Taxi service available at the lobby area.- Bank-ATM-Pharmacy-Convenience store- Restaurants-Eateries-Cafes-Nearby market.Other things to noteIMPORTANT NOTICES:1)We provide suitable accommodations for people with disabilities. If you need more information, please feel free to ask.2)This is a serviced apartment so there will be no housekeeping and change of towels every day. You can use the cleaning tools and materials available in the apartment to clean up yourself as well as using the washing machine and the drying rack to wash and dry the towels and your clothes. If you need our cleaning service, the fee will be 200,000 VND / time and please notify us 3 hours in advanced. Cleaning staff will come to clean and collect the fee directly.3)We will provide you with a certain amount of towels, shampoo, shower gel, hand soap, toilet paper, water, tea and coffee. If you used up all that amount, you can buy more from the nearby convenience store.4)For safety reason, DO NOT OPEN the door for any strangers. If we need to meet you directly, we will send a message beforehand.5) Please note that the 16-seater vehicle cannot park in the apartment building's basement and must find parking outside.6)Key cards are required to get to the main gate and your floor. We will provide 2 cards for this apartment.7)The receptionists and the security guards are the building's staff, not ours. They don't keep elevator cards or luggage. Therefore, if you have any questions, please message us before asking the receptionist.8)If you have lots of luggage, please wait in the cafe or convenience store nearby because the building lobby has a limited number of seats.9)We offer free housekeeping for bookings longer than 4 nights. If needed, please notify us 1 day in advance.10)The use of amenities in this building depends on the Building Management's policy at different times. We will update you as soon as possible.THANK YOU SO MUCHMore Options in Saigon:5bedrooms District 1: https://www.airbnb.com/slink/drqwM2ek6bedrooms District 1:https://www.airbnb.com/slink/5BYwjzqv7bedrooms 9beds District 1:https://www.airbnb.com/slink/G6zKkT07

title: Affordable Vacation Home For Family City Center
description: Welcome to our spacious, centrally located home, perfect for families and groups seeking a relaxing and comfortable stay as a group. This property features seven modern, wood-inspired apartments, each designed with care to create a warm atmosphere.You will have full access from the Mezzanine Floor to level 3 of the building with a password door lock. Our ground floor will be a shared area dedicated to the bistro serving breakfast and lunch to the public.The spaceWelcome to Your Home Away from Home in Central Saigon!Located in the heart of downtown Ho Chi Minh City, these spacious seven studios are perfect for up to 14 guests, offering comfort, convenience, and thoughtful amenities:Features:- Comfortable Bedrooms: Fully air-conditioned with seven studios.- Modern Bathrooms: Equipped with towels, toilet paper, shampoo, body soap, and hairdryer.- Functional Kitchenette: Includes a microwave, mini fridge, sink, portable stove, plates, rice bowls, and utensils. (Note: Cooking condiments are not provided for hygiene reasons but can be purchased nearby.)- Convenient Living Space: Work desk, Smart TV, and dining table for work or leisure.- Laundry Facilities: In-building washing machine and dryer.- The ground floor features a cozy Vietnamese eatery, popular among locals for its delicious and affordable home-style meals during lunchtime (Mon-Sat). (In the future, we have plans to open for breakfast as well)- Within one-minute walking distance to multiple 24/7 convenience stores.- Nestled next to the serene Tao Dan Park, we offer the perfect blend of city living and nature's tranquility. Enjoy morning strolls or unwind in the peaceful surroundings just steps from your doorstep.Complimentary Perks:- High-speed Wi-Fi.- Welcome mineral water bottles (provided on check-in day).- Housekeeping every 2 days (except Sundays and holidays).- 24/7 security for your peace of mind.Short-term rental pricing includes 10% tax and utilities. (For stays over 30 days, utilities are billed separately.)Important Notes:To comply with local regulations, we must register all guests with the local authorities. Upon arrival, please provide your original passport or Vietnamese ID for registration. Your documents will be returned immediately after registration is completed.Experience a safe, comfortable, and hassle-free stay in the vibrant center of Saigon!Guest accessFrom Mezzanine onwards. The ground floor is a bistro that is opened to the public.𝗕𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗟𝗮𝘆𝗼𝘂𝘁:Our building consists of a ground floor, a mezzanine, and Levels 1-3. Please let us know in advance if you require help.Other things to note:Our building consists of a ground floor, a mezzanine, and Levels 1-3. It's a great place to grab a quick bite or stock up on supplies.-Circle K (238-240 Vo Van Kiet Street) - 1.5 km away, 6-minute drive. Open 7AM-10PM daily.-Circle K Nguyen Khac Nhu (69 Nguyen Khac Nhu Street): Open 24 hours, this Circle K location offers a similar selection of snacks, drinks, and everyday items as FamilyMart. It's also a convenient spot to grab a quick ATM withdrawal.-Circle K Thai Van Lung (11D1 Thai Van Lung Street): Open 24 hours, this Circle K outpost provides a well-stocked inventory of convenience items, including fresh food options. It's a great choice for those seeking a quick and affordable meal.*Cafes:-Trung Nguyen E Coffee (510 Vo Van Kiet Street): Open from 7AM to 10:30PM daily, this cafe serves up a variety of Vietnamese coffees, teas, and pastries. It's a popular spot for both locals and tourists. --The Workshop - Coffee & Coworking Space (17 Đ. Nguyễn Văn Tráng, Phường Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Thành Phố Hồ Chí Minh) - 1.1 km away, 5-minute drive. It's a great place to relax and people-watch.-KEI Coffee Diamond (CS7 Block C, Diamond Riverside, 1646A Vo Van Kiet Street): Open from 6:30AM to 9PM daily, this cafe specializes in high-quality coffee and features a modern, minimalist design. It's a popular spot for coffee connoisseurs.This prime District 1 location puts you right at the center of the city's vibrant cultural scene.
